column3: Yeni sɔɔrɑ sɑ kɑ ɡiɑ nɡe mɛ kĩrɑ sɑ̃ɑ, domi Kirisi u win wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ bɛsɛn sɔ̃. Nɡe mɛyɑ, n mɑɑ weenɛ su bɛsɛn tiin wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ bɛsɛn berusebun sɔ̃.

Yesu u rɑ n wiɡibu kĩ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ hɑnduniɑɔ, yen sɔ̃, bu sere tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ te ko te bɑ rɑ nɛɛ Gɔɔ sɑrɑribu, u bu win kĩi bɑkɑru sɔ̃ɔsi. Domi u yɛ̃ mɑ win sɑɑ yɑ turɑ u kɑ doonɑ hɑnduniɑn di u dɑ win Bɑɑbɑn mi.
Berɑ̀ Gusunɔ u kɑ mɔru mɔ̀ sere wɔ̃ɔ weeru. Beyɑ be bɑ torɑ mɑ bɑ ɡbisukɑ ɡbɑburu sɔɔ.
I koowo bii mɛm nɔwɔbu kpɑ i ku de bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑrun dɑɑ yu kɑ kɔdɛ mɛnnɑ ye i rɑɑ mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ i ǹ ɡɑ̃ɑnu yɛ̃.
Domi Gusunɔ u tɔmbu kpuro kɛnisi mɛm nɔɔbu sɑriru sɔɔ, kpɑ u kɑ be kpuro wɔnwɔndu kuɑ.
Mɑ nɑ nɔɔ ɡɑɡu nuɑ ɡɑ sɑ̃ɑre ɡɑ wee hunde koni nnɛ yen min di ɡɑ nɛɛ, ɑlikɑmɑ kilo tiɑn ɡeerɑ sɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ teerun sɔmburun ɡobi. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ ɔɔsu kilo itɑn ɡeerɑ nɛ. Adɑmɑ ɑ ku ɡum kɑ tɑm sɑnku.
I bɛɛn tii kɑwo Yinni Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ kpɑ u bɛɛ suɑ wɔllɔ.
Domi u tɔ̃ru yi tè sɔɔ u koo hɑnduniɑɡibu kpuro siri dee dee kɑ durɔ win sɑɑbu wi u ɡɔsɑ, mɑ u nùn bɑɑwure sɔ̃ɔsi ye u nùn seeyɑ ɡɔrin di.
Mɑ tɑbu kowobu bɑ sɑ̃ki tundu bɔkɑnɑ bɑ kɑ nùn sinɑ furɔ kuɑ bɑ doke win wirɔ. Bɑ mɑɑ nùn ɡurumusu swɑ̃ɑbu sebusiɑ.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ nɑ kĩ ɡɔmini kpɛmminu nu durɔbu suɑ kpɑ bu bibu mɑ, kpɑ bu ben yɛnu nɔni doke kpɑ bu ku rɑɑ bɛsɛn yibɛrɛbɑ ɑyeru deriɑ bu kɑ bɛsɛn kɔ̃sɑ ɡere.
I ɡesi nɑɑnɛ dokeo mɑ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ, mɑ Bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛ sɔɔ. Ǹ kun mɛ, i nɑɑnɛ dokeo sɔmɑ ye nɑ kuɑn sɔ̃.
Yerɑ bɑ ɡɔɔ kɑ ɡɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yee te suɑ bɑ kpɛ̃ɛ dɔ̃ɔ bwee te sɔɔ. N deemɑ, dɔ̃ɔ bwee terɑ tɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔɔ yiruse.
Ù n kuɑ mɛ, u koo rɑɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔrɑ nɔn dɑbinu sɑɑ toren di. Adɑmɑ u duɑ tɛ̃ nɔn teeru sɑnɑm dɑ̃ɑkim mɛni sɔɔ u kɑ torɑru wunɑ sɑnɑm mɛ u kɑ tii wɛ̃ nɡe ɑbɔru.
mɑ u kɑ bu tɛmɑnɑ wɔ̃ɔ weeru ɡbɑburɔ.
Yen sɔ̃ nɛɡibu, ì n mɛnnɑ i kɑ di, i de i mɑrunɑ.
Nɑ kpɑm mɛɛrɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm te, tɑ yĩreru nɔɔbɑ tiɑse kusiɑ. Mɑ tem mu yĩirɑ kɑ dɑm, mɑ sɔ̃ɔ tĩrɑ niki niki nɡe beku wɔ̃ku sinumɡiru, mɑ suru swɛ̃rɑ kom kom nɡe yɛm.
Tɔn kurɔbu ɡɑbu bɑ ben tɔmbu wɑ bɑ wurɑmɑ ɡɔrin di. Bɑ ɡɑbu tɔ̃yɑ kuɑ bɑ kɑ ɡo. Bɑ yinɑ bu bu fɑɑbɑ ko bu kɑ wɑ bu se bu du wɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ te tɑ burɑm bo.

Adɑmɑ Pɔlu u polisi be sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑɑwo, bɑ sun so bɑtumɑ sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ sun siri, mɑ bɛsɛn tii sɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Romuɡibu. Yen biru bɑ sun kɑsɑ kuɑ pirisɔm dirɔ. Wee tɛ̃ bɑ kĩ bu sun yɑrɑ ɑsiri sɔɔ? Aɑwo, sere bu nɑ ben tii bu sun yɑrɑ.
Domi woodɑ yenibɑ be bɑ nɛɛ, “I ku rɑ sɑkɑrɑru ko, i ku rɑ tɔnu ɡo, i ku rɑ ɡbɛni, i ku rɑ binɛ ko,” kɑ woodɑ kpuro ye yɑ tie, yɑ wɑ̃ɑ ɡɑri yini sɔɔ mi bɑ nɛɛ, “A wunɛn tɔnusi kĩɔ nɡe wunɛn tii tii.”
Bɑɑwure wi u yĩiyɔ binin bweseru mɔ, u tii sɑ̃rɑsiɑmɔwɑ, nɡe mɛ Kirisi u sɑ̃re.
Nɑ nuku dobu mɔ Gusunɔn woodɑ sɔɔ nɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ,
I de bɛɛn nukurɑ n do Yinni sɔɔ bɑɑdommɑ. Nɑ kpɑm wure nɑ ɡerumɔ, i de bɛɛn nukurɑ n do.
Ye nɑ sĩirɑ n kɑ wɑ wi u kɑ mɑn ɡɑri mɔ̀, yerɑ nɑ dɑbu wurɑɡinu nɔɔbɑ yiru wɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Gusunɔ u bɔ̃ruɑ u nɛɛ, “bɑ ǹ sisi bu kɑ mɑn wɛ̃rɑ mi nɑ wɛ̃re,” berɑ̀ u kɑ yɑ̃ mɑ n kun mɔ be bɑ ǹ nùn mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Be bɑ mɑn ɡbiiye mi kpuro, ɡbɛnɔbu kɑ wɔrobɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Yɑ̃ɑnu kun ben ɡɑri swɑɑ dɑki.
Bɛɛ sɔm kowobu, i bɛɛn yinnibu wiru kpĩiyɔ kɑ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛ bɑkɑbu, n ǹ mɔ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔn ɡeobu kɑ be bɑ du tɔnɑ, ɑdɑmɑ kɑ be bɑ sɛ̃n tii.
Yen biru bɑ kɑ durɔbu ɡɑbu nɑ be bɑ nùn seedɑ weesuɡiɑ diisi bɑ nɛɛ, durɔ wini u rɑ n bɛsɛn sɑ̃ɑ yee dɛɛrɑru kɑ Mɔwisin woodɑ sɑnkumɔwɑ.
Ye kpuro Gusunɔn min diyɑ yɑ wee wi u kɑ win tii sun dorɑsiɑ Kirisin min di, mɑ u sun ɡɔrɑ su kɑ de ɡɑbu bu dorɑ kɑ wi.
Nɛɡibu, i Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu yɑɑyo be bɑ ɡɑri ɡeruɑ kɑ Yinnin yĩsiru. I ben suuru sɑɑrio ye bɑ kuɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ bɑɑwure wi u Yinnin yĩsiru sokɑ dɔmɑ te, u koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ.”
bɑ nɛɛ, ɑmi. Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinniwɑ u siɑrɑbu kɑ ɡirimɑ kɑ yɛ̃ru kɑ tɑkɑru kɑ bɛɛrɛ, kɑ dɑm, kɑ yiiko mɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Ami.
I ku kɑsu i tii ko kurɔ burɑbu kɑ bɛɛn serin tɑrɑ, kɑ wurɑbɑ, kɑ yɑ̃ɑ burɑnu.

Yen sɔ̃, ɑ ku bɛsɛn Yinnin seedɑ dibun sekuru ko, ɑ ku mɑɑ nɛn tiin sekuru ko nɛ wi nɑ wɑ̃ɑ pirisɔm dirɔ win sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ ɑ de sɑ n bɔnu mɔ sɑnnu nɔni swɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑn sɔ̃ nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ u nun yen dɑm wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Ben sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nun nɛn tii wɛ̃ kpɑ ben tii bu mɑɑ kɑ ko wunɛɡibu kɑ ɡem.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, u yɑndo kpɑ u ye yɑ nùn tie tɑ̃sisiɑ yu sere ɡbi mɑm mɑm. Domi nɑ wɑ mɑ win kookoosu kun dɛnde sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ nɛn Yinnin mi.
Yerɑ ɡɔrɑdo itɑse u win yoruku wisi dɑɑ bɑkɑnu kɑ bwii sɔɔ, mɑ nim mu ɡɔsiɑ yɛm.
Win min diyɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɑɑbu sɑ durom mɛ wɑ mɛ̀ sɔɔ sɑ yɔ̃ dim dim, mɑ sɑ nuku dobu mɔ yèn sɔ̃ sɑ yĩiyɔ sɑ ko bɔnu wɑ Gusunɔn yiiko sɔɔ.
I de i n yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm mɑ be bɑ kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑmɔ tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ dɑɑ disinuɡiɑɡibu, ben ɡoo kun bɔnu wɑsi Gusunɔ kɑ Kirisin bɑndu sɔɔ. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ binɛɡii, domi binɛɡii sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe bũu sɑ̃ɔ.
Kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebɑ Aburɑhɑmu u Gusunɔn sokuru wurɑ mɑ u swɑɑ wɔri u dɔɔ tem ɡɑm ɡiɑ mɛ Gusunɔ u koo nùn wɛ̃ nɡe tubi mɑ u dɔɔ mi u ǹ yɛ̃.
I ku de tɑm mu bɛɛ ɡo, domi mi sɔɔrɑ dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ wɑ̃ɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i de Hunde Dɛɛro u n bɛɛ yibɑ.
Tɔn dɑbirɑ koo ben dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ swĩi, kpɑ ben sɔ̃, ɡɑbu bu ɡem swɑɑ wɔmɛ.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ, Kirisin min diyɑ bɛsɛ kpuro, sɑ ko kpĩ su dɑ Bɑɑbɑn wuswɑɑɔ kɑ Hunde turo win somiru.

Adɑmɑ ye n sɑ̃ɑ tɔn tuko nɑɑnɛ dokeobuɡiɑ sɑ bu woodɑ yiiyɑ mɑ sɑ bu yen tireru mɔrisiɑ sɑ nɛɛ, bu ku bũu sɑ̃ɑ dĩɑnu di, bu ku yɑɑ yɛm di, bu ku yɑɑ tem ye bɑ wĩiru tɛmɑ bɑ kɑ ɡo, bu ku mɑɑ kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑ tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ.
Yerɑ Piɛɛ u nɛɛ, Anɑniɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ derɑ Setɑm duɑ wunɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ mɑ ɑ Hunde Dɛɛro weesu kuɑ, mɑ ɑ tem mɛn ɡobin sukum tii yiiyɑ.
Sɑ ǹ ko sɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe bibu be bɑ koo kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi kpɑɑru bɑɑtere bɔrikiɑ nɡe woo ɡunɑ, ǹ kun mɛ be bɑ nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ mɑ bɑ bu swɑɑ nim wiɑmɔ kɑ bwisi.
Bɛɛ, i ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ ɡem sɑriruɡibɑ kun kpɛ̃ bu ɑyeru wɑ bɑn te Gusunɔ u swĩi sɔɔ? I ku de bu bɛɛ nɔni wɔ̃ke. Kurɔ dɑmɑ kowobu kɑ bũuɡibu, kɑ sɑkɑrɑ kowobu kɑ be bɑ kɑ ben tɔn durɔsibu kpunɑmɔ
Su ku mɛnnɔsu sinɑ nɡe mɛ n sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑbun dɔɔnɛ. Adɑmɑ su dɑm kɛ̃ɛnɑ n kere, yèn sɔ̃ i wɑɑmɔ mɑ Yinnin tɔ̃ru tɑ turuku koomɑ.

Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i hɑnduniɑn kĩrun ɡɑ̃ɑnu kpuro ɡoowo ni nu sɔmburu mɔ̀ bɛɛ sɔɔ, niyɑ kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑbu tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ, kɑ dɑɑ disinuɡiɑ, kɑ wɑsin binɛ, kɑ kĩru kɑnkɑm, kɑ kɔdɛ, domi kɔdɛ yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe bũu sɑ̃ɑru.
Adɑmɑ bɛsɛ be sɑ sɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔɡibu, n weenɛ sɑ n tii sɛ. Su nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ kĩru sebe nɡe tɑrɑkpe, su mɑɑ fɑɑbɑn yĩiyɔbu doke nɡe sii furɔ kɔkɔru.
Domi hunde ye Gusunɔ u sun wɛ̃ yɑ ǹ koo de su bɛrum ko, yɑ koo dewɑ sɑ n dɑm kɑ kĩru kɑ ɡɑyɑ mɔ.
Goo ù n nɛɛ, u nùn yɛ̃, mɑ u kun win woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ, yɛ̃ro sɑ̃ɑwɑ weesuɡii, ɡee sɑri wi sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, nɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ, i de i mɑn nukuru dorɑsiɑ kɑ bɛɛn nɔɔ tiɑ kɑ bɛɛn kĩi teeru kɑ bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ru teu kɑ bɛɛn bwisiku teenu.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ bɑ ɡɔ̃ru doke bu kɑ nùn mwɑ, ɑdɑmɑ ɡoo sɑri wi u nùn nɔmu sɔndi, domi win sɑɑ yɑ ǹ ɡinɑ turim kpɑ.
A bu sɔ̃ɔwɔ bu ɡeɑ ko bu ko ɑrumɑniɡibu sɔm ɡeenu sɔɔ, kpɑ bɑ n nuku tiɑ mɔ bɑ n sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ bu kɑ ben mɔru ɡɑbu bɔnu ko.
Bɑ nɛɛ, ù kun kɔ̃sɑ kue, sɑ ǹ dɑɑ kɑ nùn sisi su nun nɔmɑ bɛriɑ.
Wi u tɔ̃ru lɑsɑbu mɔ̀ u tu lɑsɑbu mɔ̀ Yinnin sɔ̃. Wi u dimɔ, Yinnin sɔ̃nɑ u dimɔ, yèn sɔ̃ u Gusunɔ siɑrɑmɔ. Wi u kun mɑɑ dimɔ, Yinnin sɔ̃nɑ u ǹ dimɔ, u mɑɑ Gusunɔ siɑrɑmɔ.
I yɛ̃ɛrio bɛɛn yĩiyɔbun sɔ̃. I tɛmɑnɔ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. I ku wɑsirɑ kɑ kɑnɑru.
U mɑɑ tɑbu kowobun tɔnwero woodɑ wɛ̃ u n ɡinɑ Pɔlu doke pirisɔm sɔɔ, ɑdɑmɑ u de u n tii mɔ mi, u mɑɑ de win kpɑɑsibu bu nùn berɑm nɑ bu kɑ nùn nɔɔri.
Wi u tɔnu kĩ u rɑ kɑ kpuro tɛmɑnɛ. Win nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ win yĩiyɔbu kɑ win tɛmɑnɑbu bu ku rɑ kpe.
Bɛsɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebu bu sɑ̃ɑ nɡe yɛ̃roɡibu wi u yoruɑ u nɛɛ, “Nɑ nɑɑnɛ doke, yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ ɡɑri ɡeruɑ.” Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, bɛsɛ mɑɑ sɑ nɑɑnɛ doke, yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ ɡɑri ɡerumɔ.
Sɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ nɛɡibu, i mɛm nɔɔ sɑriruɡibu kirɔ koowo. I bu dɑm kɛ̃ɛyɔ be bɑ mwiɑ kpɑnɛ. I dɑm sɑriruɡibu somiɔ. I kɑ tɔmbu kpuro tɛmɑnɔ.
Yerɑ ɡɔrɑdo nɔɔbuse u win yoruku wisi ɡbeeku yɑɑ yen sinɑ kitɑru wɔllɔ. Mɑ n kuɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru ketem yen bɑndun tem sɔɔ. Mɑ tɔmbu bɑ ben yɑri temmɔ wuriribun sɔ̃.
Be bɑ tɑkɑ koorɑ kpɑɑn woodɑ yeni swĩi, ɑlɑfiɑ kɑ durom mu n kɑ bu wɑ̃ɑ kɑ Gusunɔn tɔmbu kpuro.
N deemɑ bɑ rɑɑ nùn Yinnin swɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ u ye wɑɑsu mɔ̀ kɑ kĩru, u rɑ mɑɑ Yesun ɡɑri tubusie dee dee, ɑdɑmɑ Yohɑnun bɑtɛmu kobu tɔnɑwɑ u yɛ̃.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ì n dimɔ ì n nɔrumɔ, ǹ kun mɛ ì n ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑnu mɔ̀, i ye kpuro koowo i n kɑ Gusunɔ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.

Adɑmɑ bɛɛ, Hunde Dɛɛro wi i mwɑ Kirisin min di, u wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ. Yen sɔ̃, i ǹ ɡoon bukɑtɑ mɔ wi u koo bɛɛ ɡɑ̃ɑnu keu koosiɑ. Adɑmɑ yèn sɔ̃ Hunde Dɛɛro wi, u bɛɛ ɡɑ̃ɑnu bɑɑnire keu koosiɑmɔ, ni nu sɑ̃ɑ ɡem, n ǹ mɔ weesu, yen sɔ̃, i n kɑ Kirisi mɑninɛ, nɡe mɛ Hunde Dɛɛro u bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsi.
Nɡe mɛ wɑsi yi yi kun hunde mɔ ɡorɑ, nɡe mɛyɑ mɑɑ nɑɑnɛ doke bi bu kun sɔ̃ɔsire kookoosu sɔɔ, bu kuɑ kɑm.
Ye Pɔlu u yeni ɡeruɑ u kpɑ, u pɛ̃ɛ suɑ u Gusunɔ siɑrɑ be kpuron wuswɑɑɔ u ye murɑ mɑ u dim wɔri.
Adɑmɑ su bu tireru kuɑ su nɛɛ bu ku bũu sɑ̃ɑ dĩɑnu di, bu ku kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑ tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ, bu ku yɑɑ tem ye bɑ wĩiru tɛmɑ bɑ kɑ ɡo, bu ku mɑɑ yɑɑ yɛm di.
Pɔlu u nɛɛ, Gusunɔ koo nun so, ɡɑni kpikɑ wunɛ! A sɔ̃wɑ ɑ kɑ mɑn siri Mɔwisin woodɑ sɔɔ, mɑ ɑ mɑɑ kpɑm woodɑ sɑrɑ ɑ nɛɛ, bu mɑn soowo.
Yen sɔ̃ tɛ̃, bɑ ǹ bu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ be bɑ ɡbinnɛ kɑ Kirisi Yesu.
Domi Gusunɔ u ǹ sun sokɑ su kɑ win mɔru wɑ, u sun sokɑwɑ su kɑ fɑɑbɑ wɑ sɑɑ bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisin min di
yɑ koo yɑri yu dɑ yu hɑnduniɑn bwesenu kpuro nɔni wɔ̃ke ni bɑ mɔ̀ Mɑɡɔɡu kɑ nin wiruɡii Gɔɡu, kpɑ yu nu mɛnnɑ bu kɑ tɑbu ko. Bɑ koo dɑbiɑ nɡe nim wɔ̃kun ɡoorun yɑni sɛɛri.
Mɛyɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ ɡɑbɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Adɑmɑ bɑ bɛɛ woburɑ, bɑ bɛɛ dɛɛrɑsiɑ bɑ yii, bɑ bɛɛ ɡem wɛ̃ Yinni Yesu Kirisin yĩsirun sɔ̃, kɑ mɑɑ bɛsɛn Gusunɔn Hunden sɔ̃. kɑ bɛɛn wɑsi
Yen sɑɑbun sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑ teni wɑɑmɔ. Adɑmɑ sekurɑ kun mɑn mɔ̀, domi nɑ yɛ̃ wi nɑ nɑɑnɛ doke, nɑ mɑɑ yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm u koo kpĩ u ye u mɑn kereɑ kɔ̃su sere tɔ̃ɔ te, tu kɑ turi.
I n kɑnɑru mɔ̀ sɑɑ bɑɑyere kpɑ i n Gusunɔn somiru bikiɑmɔ nɡe mɛ Hunde Dɛɛro u bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ. I seewo i yɔ̃rɑ kpɑ i n tɛmɑnɛ, kpɑ i n kɑnɑru mɔ̀ nɑɑnɛ dokeobu kpuron sɔ̃.
Bɛɛ Yesun yiɡbɛruɡibu, bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ Tɛsɑlonikɑɔ, bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ Yinni Yesu Kirisiɡibu, nɛ Pɔlu kɑ Silɑsi kɑ Timɔte sɑ bɛɛ tɔburɑ. Durom kɑ ɑlɑfiɑ yɑ n kɑ bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑ. kɑ ben nɑɑnɛ dokebu
I de tɔmbu kpuro bu bɛɛn tɔn ɡeeru wɑ, domi Yinnin nɑɑru tɑ turuku koomɑ.
Domi sɑnɑm bɑɑmɛre sɔɔ mɛ i pɛ̃ɛ ye dimɔ mɑ i kɑ nɔrɑ ye nɔrumɔ, Yinnin ɡɔɔwɑ i kpɑrɑmɔ sere u kɑ wurɑmɑ.
Kɑnɑ nɑɑnɛɡii te, tɑ koo bɑrɔ wi fɑɑbɑ ko. Yinni Gusunɔ u koo nùn bwɑ̃ɑ dobu wɛ̃. Ù n dɑɑ mɑɑ torɑ, bɑ koo nùn suuru kuɑ.
Nɑ Gusunɔ sɑɑbu kuɑ wi nɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ kɑ lɑɑkɑri tɑɑrɛ sɑriruɡiɑ nɡe mɛ nɛn sikɑdobɑ bɑ rɑɑ kuɑ. Nɑ rɑ n mɑɑ nun yɑɑyɑmɔ nɛn kɑnɑru sɔɔ bururu kɑ yokɑ.
Bɑ ɡuunu kɑ kpenu nɔɔɡiru mɔ̀ bɑ mɔ̀, i sun sɛ̃sikio, i bere sɑɑ win wuswɑɑn di wi u sɔ̃ sinɑ kitɑrɔ kɑ sere Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm ten mɔrun di.

Bɑɑwure wi u swɑɑ mɔ u nɔɔwɔ ye Hunde Dɛɛro u Yesun yiɡbɛnu sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Wi u tɑbu di, wiyɑ kon mɑnnɑ ye yɑ beruɑ wɛ̃ u di. Kon nùn kpee kpikiru wɛ̃ tè sɔɔ bɑ yĩsi kpɑɑru yoruɑ te ɡoo kun yɛ̃ mɑ n kun mɔ wi bɑ tu wɛ̃.
Keu koosio weesuɡii ben binɛn sɔ̃, bɑ koo bɛɛ tɑki di kɑ ben ɡɑri yi bɑ bwisikɑ bɑ sekɑ. Adɑmɑ sɑɑ tɛɛbun di ben siri kowo sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ u kɑ bu siri. Wi u koo mɑɑ bu kɑm koosiɑ u ǹ dò.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ Gusunɔ u koo de ɡɑ̃ɑ dɑmɡinu ɡɑnu nu bu torɑsiɑ bu kɑ weesu nɑɑnɛ ko.
Domi Gusunɔn ɡɑri sɔɔ bɑ yoruɑ bɑ nɛɛ, “Bɛɛn sɑɑbuwɑ tɔn tukobu bɑ Gusunɔn yĩsiru ɡɑri kɑm ɡerusimɔ.”
Nɡe mɛ Yɑnɛsi kɑ Yɑmbɛsi bɑ kɑ Mɔwisi kinɛnu kuɑ, nɡe mɛyɑ tɔn be, bɑ mɑɑ kɑ ɡem kinɛnu mɔ̀, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ biti mɔ kɔ̃sɑn bwisikunun sɔ̃. Bɑ ǹ ɡɑru koorɔ nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ.
Be nɑ kĩ kpuro beyɑ nɑ rɑ nɔni doke kpɑ n bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ. Yen sɔ̃, u hɑniɑ koowo kpɑ u ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑ.
Tɛ̃ ye Gusunɔ u sun ɡem wɛ̃ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃, sɑ dorɑ kɑ wi, sɑɑ Yesu Kirisi bɛsɛn Yinnin min di.
A n tii sɛ, ɑ mɑɑ wunɛn sɔ̃ɔsiru lɑɑkɑri dokeo kpɑ ɑ n tɛmɑnɛ ɡɑ̃ɑ nini sɔɔ. Domi ɑ̀ n mɔ̀ mɛ, kɑɑ tii fɑɑbɑ ko kɑ mɑɑ be bɑ nun swɑɑ dɑki.
Nɔn dɑbirɑ nɑ rɑ bu so Yuubɑn mɛnnɔ yenu kpuro sɔɔ, kpɑ n bu tilɑsi ko bu kɑ Gusunɔ ɡɑri kɑm ɡerusi. Nɑ kɑ bu mɔru bɛsirɑ too sere nɑ mɑm bu nɑɑ swĩi wuu tukusɔ.
Tɔnun tii tiin dɑɑ yɑ rɑ sɔ̃ɔsire kpɑsɑsɑ. Yeyɑ kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑbu tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ, kɑ dɑɑ disinuɡiɑ kɑ dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ,
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, wi u duurumɔ kɑ wi u nim yɛ̃kɑmɔ bɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu, mɑ n kun mɔ Gusunɔ wi u kpɛ̃ɑsiɑmɔ.
I ǹ Hunden kɛ̃ru ɡɑru bie i n kɑ mɑrɑ sere bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisi u kurɑmɑ.
Mɑ nɑ nɔɔ ɡɑɡu nuɑ wɔllun di nɡe surun bɑkɑrun wurenu, nɡe ɡuru ɡbɑ̃rɑ bɑkɑbu. Nɔɔ ɡe nɑ nuɑ ɡɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe ni mɔrɔku sowobɑ soomɔn swĩi.
Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu kpuron ɡɑri yi win seedɑ dimɔ mɑ bɑɑwure wi u nùn nɑɑnɛ doke u koo win torɑnun suuru wɑ win yĩsirun sɔ̃.
Be bɑ ɡeɑ mɔ̀ kɑ tɛmɑnɑbu bɑ kɑ yiiko kɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ wɑ̃ɑru kɑsu, beyɑ Gusunɔ u koo wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe wɛ̃.

Nɛ Yohɑnu, nɑ bɛɛ Yesun yiɡbɛnu nɔɔbɑ yiru tɔburɑ Asin tem sɔɔ. Gusunɔ Yinni wi u wɑ̃ɑ, wi u rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ, wi u mɑɑ sisi, kɑ hundebɑ nɔɔbɑ yiru be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn sinɑ kitɑrun wuswɑɑɔ, kɑ mɑɑ Yesu Kirisi wi u sɑ̃ɑ seedɑ dio nɑɑnɛɡii wi bɑ ɡbiɑ bɑ seeyɑ ɡɔrin di, wi u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ sinɑ boko, bu bɛɛ durom kuɑ kpɑ bu bɛɛ ɑlɑfiɑ wɛ̃. Yesu u sun kĩ. Kɑ win yɛmɑ u sun yɑkiɑ bɛsɛn torɑnun di.
Mɑ Pɔlu u nɛɛ, Yohɑnu u tɔmbu bɑtɛmu kuɑ be bɑ ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑ torɑnun di mɑ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, durɔ ɡoo u sisi win biruɔ, wiyɑ Yesu wiyɑ bɑ koo nɑɑnɛ doke.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ Gusunɔ u yɛ̃ mɛ u koo kɑ be bɑ win bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ yɑrɑ sɑɑ lɑɑkɑri mɛɛribun di. U mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɛ u koo tɔn kɔ̃sobu yi u kɑ bu wɑhɑlɑ ko siribun sɑnɑm,
Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ bɑ tem kɑsu mɛ mu burɑm bo, tem mɛyɑ tem wɔlluɡim. Yen sɔ̃nɑ sekurɑ kun Gusunɔ mɔ̀ bu kɑ nùn soku ben Yinni domi u bu wuu ɡɑɡu sɔɔru kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ wiirɑ ɡɑri yinɔ yi tɔmbɑ sekɑ kpɑ ɑ n wunɛn hunde dendimɔ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛbu sɔɔ.
Be wee bɑ wee bɑ tɛrie, tem kpuro sɔɔ mɑ bɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobun sɑnsɑni sikerenɑ kɑ wuu ɡe Gusunɔ u kĩ. Adɑmɑ u derɑ dɔ̃ɔ u sɑrɑmɑ wɔllun di, mɑ be kpuro bɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ.
U yiire bu bu bɑtɛmu ko Yesu Kirisin yĩsiru sɔɔ. Yen biru bɑ nùn kɑnɑ u kɑ bu sinɑ sɔ̃ɔ yiru.
A yĩiyɔ mɑ kɑɑ kpĩ ɑ wɔ̃kobu swɑɑ ɡbiiyɑ, kpɑ ɑ tɔmbu yɑm dɛɛrɑsiɑ be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ.
Nɔɔ mwɛɛru wee te Kirisi sun kuɑ, teyɑ wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe.
Adɑmɑ bwisi yi yi nɑ wɔllun di, ɡbiikɑɑ yi dɛɛre, yen biru yi nɔɔ tiɑ kɑsu, yi du, yi ǹ kɑ wesiɑnɔ sɛ̃, yi wɔnwɔndu mɔ mɑ yi rɑ sɔm ɡeenu ko. Yi ǹ kĩru ɡem wɛ̃ɛmɔ, yi ǹ mɑɑ murɑfitiru mɔ.
Bɑɑbɑ u win Bii kĩ, mɑ u nùn yɑbu kpuro nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
Gɑbɑ tɑmɑɑ Yinni u tɛɛmɔ u kɑ win nɔɔ mwɛɛru yibiɑ. Adɑmɑ u ǹ tɛɛmɔ. Ǹ n sɑ̃ɑre u tɛɛmɔ, u kɑ bɛɛ suuru sɑ̃ɑwɑ domi u ǹ kĩ bɑɑ tɔn turo u kɑm ko. U kĩwɑ tɔmbu kpuro bu ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑ.
N ko n mɑn wɛ̃re tɔmbu kpuro bɑ̀ n sɑ̃ɑ nɡe nɛn tii, ɑdɑmɑ bɑɑwurewɑ u win kɛ̃run bɑɑ mɔ sɑɑ Gusunɔn min di, winiɡirun bɑɑ, wiɔnɔɡirun bɑɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, kĩrɑ n weenɛ i n kɑsu. I mɑɑ Hunden kɛ̃nu kɑsuo, n mɑm nɛɛre Gusunɔn ɡɑrin ɡerubun kɛ̃ru.
Gusunɔ wi u nɛɛ, yɑm bururɑm mu bɑllio yɑm wɔ̃kurɔ, wiyɑ mɑɑ win yɑm bururɑm bɑllisiɑ bɛsɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ, su kɑ win yiiko ɡiɑ ye yɑ bɑllimɔ Kirisin wuswɑɑn di.
Yuu ɡoo wi bɑ mɔ̀ Apolo, wi bɑ mɑrɑ Alesɑndiriɔ, u Efesu dɑ. U ɡɑri ɡerubun kɛ̃ru mɔ n bɑndɑ, u mɑɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri yɛ̃ sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ Yesun tii mɑɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔrɑ wuun biruɔ u kɑ wɑ u tɔmbu dɛɛrɑsiɑ kɑ win tii tiin yɛm.
Nɡe mɛyɑ n weenɛ ɑ ɡɑri ɡere. A tɔmbu dɑm kɛ̃ kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ bu ɡerusi kɑ wunɛn yiiko kpuro. A ku de ɡoo u nun ɡɛm.
Wee mɛ Gusunɔ u sun win kĩru sɔ̃ɔsisinɑ, u win Bii teereru ɡɔrimɑ hɑnduniɑ ye sɔɔ sɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe mɔ wi sɔɔ.
Bɑɑbɑ, nɑ kĩ be ɑ mɑn wɛ̃ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ nɛn mi, mi nɑ wɑ̃ɑ, kpɑ bɑ n nɛn yiiko mɛɛrɑ ye ɑ mɑn wɛ̃, domi ɑ mɑn kĩ bɑ sere hɑnduniɑ tɑkɑ kuɑ.
Kpeerɑbu kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnɑ nu rɑ n wɑ̃ɑ ben swɑɑ sɔɔ.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ sɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwero boko mɔ wi u turɑ sere Gusunɔn mi, wiyɑ Yesu Gusunɔn Bii. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, su yɔ̃rɑ dim dim bɛsɛn seedɑ ye sɑ di sɔɔ.
Domi sɑnɑm mɛ Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ u nùn bɛɛrɛ kɑ yiiko wɛ̃, u nɔɔ ɡɑɡu nuɑ sɑɑ yiiko bɑkɑɡiin min di ɡɑ nɛɛ, “Winiwɑ nɛn Bii kĩnɑsi wì sɔɔ nɛn ɡɔ̃ru dobu kpuro wɑ̃ɑ.”
Hunde turo wiyɑ u ye kpuro mɔ̀. U bɑɑwure kɛ̃ɛ bwese bwesekɑ wɛ̃ɛmɔ nɡe mɛ u kĩ. bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wɑsi teen doo dookɑ
Yen biru ɡɔrɑdo nnɛse u win kɔbɑ so. Yerɑ sɔ̃ɔn bɔnu itɑse kɑ surun bɔnu itɑse kɑ kperin bɔnu itɑse tĩrɑ, mɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔn bɔnu itɑsen yɑm bururɑm kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ, mɛyɑ mɑɑ wɔ̃kurun bɔnu itɑsen yɑm bururɑm.
Sɑɑ yerɑ tɔn be kpuro bɑ Sɔsitɛni mwɑ, wi u sɑ̃ɑ Yuubɑn mɛnnɔ yerun wiruɡii, bɑ nùn soberu wɔri siri yerun wuswɑɑɔ. Adɑmɑ ɡɑri yi kun Gɑlioni ɡɑ̃ɑnu sɑ̃ɑ.
Mɑ bɑ kpɑm swɑɑ kɑsu bu kɑ nùn mwɑ, ɑdɑmɑ u bu kisirɑri.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ ǹ mwiɑ kpɑnɑmɔ. Bɑɑ mɛ bɛsɛn wɑsin wɑ̃ɑru tɑ kpeemɔ bɛsɛn hunden wɑ̃ɑru tɑ rɑ n kpɑɑru mɔ̀wɑ bɑɑdommɑ.
Wee, Mɑɑri u turɑre ɡobi bɛkɛɡiɑ mɔ litirin bɔnu, ye bɑ kuɑ kɑ nɑɑdin ɡum tii tii, mɑ u ye suɑ u Yesun nɑɑsu wisi, mɑ u su sunkɑ kɑ win seri. Yerɑ dii te kpuro tɑ turɑren nuburu yibɑ.
Kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebɑ u sinɑ nɡe sɔɔ tem mɛ sɔɔ, mɛ Gusunɔ u nùn nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ. U wɑ̃ɑ kuu bekuruɡinu sɔɔ wi kɑ Isɑki kɑ Yɑkɔbu. Ben tii, nɔɔ mwɛɛ tee terɑ Gusunɔ u mɑɑ bu kuɑ.
Nɛɡibu, i mɑn sɑɑrio bɛɛ kpuro. Sɑ bɛɛ kom ɡem sɔ̃ɔsi. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i bu nɔni ɡirɑrio be bɑ kom ɡem mɛ swĩi.
I n sɔmunu dɛrɑnɑmɔ kpɑ i kɑ Kirisin woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i wɑ mɑ Gusunɔ u tɔnu ɡem wɛ̃ɛmɔ win kookoosun sɔ̃, n ǹ mɔ win nɑɑnɛ dokebu tɔnɑn sɔ̃.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑ sɑ ko ɡere. Gusunɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɡem sɑriruɡii? Aɑwo, bɑɑ fiiko.
I de u du bɛɛ sɔɔ wi u kun dɑm mɔ nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ. I ku win bwisikunu sikirinɛ.
Yerɑ tɑbu seewɑ wɔllu mi, Misɛli Gusunɔn ɡɔrɑdobɑn wiruɡii kɑ win ɡɔrɑdobɑ bɑ tɑbu kuɑ kɑ yɑɑ binti binti te. Yɑɑ ye, kɑ yen bwɑ̃ɑ be, bɑ tɑbu kuɑ.
Bɑɑ ì n mɔru bɑrɑ, i ku de yu bɛɛ torɑsiɑ, i ku mɑɑ de yɑ n bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑsi sere sɔ̃ɔ u kɑ du.
I ku kɔ̃sɑ kɔsienɑ, i ku wɔnnɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i domɑru kuɑnɔ, domi Gusunɔ u bɛɛ sokɑwɑ i kɑ ko mɛ kpɑ i domɑru wɑ.
Bɑɑbɑ wiyɑ u mɑn ɡɔrimɑ. U mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ nɛ. U ǹ mɑn deri nɛ turo yèn sɔ̃ nɑ rɑ ko ye n dɑ nùn dore.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i seewo i yɔ̃rɑ dim dim kpɑ i n ɡem sɛ̃ke bɛɛn pɔrɑɔ nɡe kpɑkɑ, kpɑ i n kookoo ɡeesu sebuɑ nɡe tɑrɑkpe.

Kperi nɔɔbɑ yiru ye nɑ wɑ nɛn nɔm ɡeuɔ kɑ dɑbu wurɑɡinu nɔɔbɑ yiru ye kpuron tubusiɑnun ɑsɑnsi wee. Kperi nɔɔbɑ yiru ye, yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yesun yiɡbɛnu nɔɔbɑ yiru yen ɡɔrɑdobɑ. Dɑbu wurɑɡinu nɔɔbɑ yiru ye mɑɑ, yɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yiɡbɛ nin tii.
Kɑ mɛ sɑ Yesu wɑ. Sɑɑ fiiko sɔɔ bɑ nùn kuɑ wi u ǹ Gusunɔn ɡɔrɑdobɑ turɑ, kpɑ u kɑ ɡbi tɔmbu kpuron sɔ̃ Gusunɔn durom sɑɑbu. Tɛ̃, sɑ nùn wɑɑmɔ kɑ win yiiko kɑ bɛɛrɛ nɡe sunɔ, win ɡɔɔ wi u ɡun sɔ̃.
Domi Gusunɔwɑ u sɔmburu mɔ̀ bɛɛ sɔɔ kpɑ i n kɑ ɡɔ̃ru kĩru mɔ te tɑ koo ko ye n koo nùn dore.
Nɑ bɛɛ yeni sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpɑ nɛn nuku dobu bu n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ, kpɑ bɛɛn nuku dobu bu kɑ yibu.

Timɔte, wunɛ wi ɑ kuɑ nɛn bii yèn sɔ̃ ɑ Yesu nɑɑnɛ doke, Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ Yesu Kirisi bɛsɛn Yinni bu nun durom kɑ wɔnwɔndu kuɑ kpɑ bu nun ɑlɑfiɑ kɛ̃. Nɛ Pɔlu, Yesu Kirisin ɡɔro nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Fɑɑbɑ kowo kɑ Yesu Kirisi wi u sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn yĩiyɔbu, bɑ mɑn yiire, nɑ nun tire teni kuɑmmɛ.
Mɛyɑ mɑɑ nɑ kĩ tɔn kurɔbu bu tii sɔmɛ sɑkɑ sɔɔ kɑ ɡirimɑ kpɑ ben burɑru tɑ kun sɑ̃ɑ tɑrɑ ɡidiɡiɑ ǹ kun mɛ wurɑ ǹ kun mɛ ɡoonu, bu ku mɑɑ yɑ̃ɑ ɡobi bɛkɛɡinu doke.
Mɑ u wɛ̃ɛn koromɡbɑ kuɑ u bu ɡirɑ be kpuro sɑ̃ɑ yerun yɑɑrɑn di, kɑ mɑɑ yɑ̃ɑnu kɑ nɛɛ. Mɑ u be bɑ ɡobi kɔsimɔn ɡobi yɑri ye u ben tɑbulu fukɑmɔ.
Domi sɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn nɔmɑn sɔmburu. U sun tɑkɑ kuɑwɑ bɛsɛ kɑ Yesu Kirisin ɡbinnɑɑ sɔɔ su kɑ sɔm ɡeenu ko nìn sɔɔru u kuɑ sɑɑ yellun di. Kirisi sɔɔ
Kĩnɑsibu, i ku biti soorɑ kɑ lɑɑkɑri mɛɛri bi bu bɛɛ wɛ̃ɛrimɔ nɡe dɔ̃ɔ. I ku bu ɡɑrisi ɡɑ̃ɑ tukunu.
I de su yɛ̃ɛri kpɑ bɛsɛn nuki yi dorɑ. I de su nùn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ domi Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛndun kurɔ kpɑɑrɑ tunumɑ, kurɔn tii mɑɑ sɔɔru kpɑ.
I fɑɑbɑ mɔɔ nɡe sii furɔ kɔkɔru, kɑ mɑɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri nɡe tɑkobi ye Hunde u bɛɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
U wɑ Eɡibitiɡii ɡoo u ben turo nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ. U wiɡii fɑɑbɑ dɑ, mɑ u Eɡibitiɡii wi so u ɡo.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ nɛɡibu, i ku wɑsirɑ kɑ ɡeɑn kobu.
I n tii sɛ, i yɔ̃ro dim dim nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ. I n wɔruɡɔru sɑ̃ɑ kpɑ i n dɑm mɔ.
Bwɑ̃ɑrokunɑ i sɔɔwɑ ni i kuɑ i kɑ bũnu sɑ̃, nɡe Mɔlɔkun kuu bekuruɡiru kɑ Refɑnin kperɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ kon bɛɛ bɔrie sere Bɑbilonin berɑ ɡiɔ.”
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ nɛɡibu, i yɔ̃ro dim dim i n sɔ̃ɔsi ni nɛni ni sɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsi nɔɔ kɑ nɔɔ kɑ mɑɑ tireru sɔɔ.
Gusunɔwɑ u sun kuɑ su kɑ ye wɑ mɑ u sun win Hunde wɛ̃ nɡe yen sunɑ.
A de tɔn kurɔ u ɡiɑ lɑɑkɑri sɔɔ kɑ wii kpĩibu mɑm mɑm.
Bɑ̀ n kɑ nun yiɡbɛ ɡuro ɡuro ɡoon tɑɑrɛ nɑɑwɑ, ɑ ku ɡɑri yi wurɑ mɑ n kun mɔ tɔnu yiru ǹ kun mɛ itɑ bɑ yen seedɑ di.
I tɔbirinɔ kɑ kĩru. Kirisin yiɡbɛnu kpuro nu bɛɛ tɔburɑ.
Bɑ tii yɑnim wisimɔ winɔ bɑ sumɔ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu bɑ nɔɔɡiru mɔ̀ bɑ mɔ̀, wuu bɔkɔ ɡe, ɡɑ kɑm kuɑwɑ. Gen dukiɑwɑ be bɑ ɡoo nimkusu mɔ bɑ kɑ kuɑ ɡobiɡibu. Mɑ kɔbi tiɑ sɔɔ ye kpuro yɑ kuɑ bɑnsu.
I mɛɛrio i wɑ, kĩi bɑkɑ te Bɑɑbɑ sun kĩɑ, sere bɑ sun sokɑ Gusunɔn bibu. Geemɑ, mɛyɑ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Yenin sɔ̃nɑ hɑnduniɑɡibu bɑ ǹ sun yɛ̃ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ ǹ nùn yɛ̃.

Mɛyɑ mɑɑ, bɛɛ ɑluwɑɑsibɑ, i yiɡbɛ ɡuro ɡurobu wiru kpĩiyɔ. Bɛɛ kpuro i tii kɑwɑbu sebuo nɡe yɑberu bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑsinɑɑ sɔɔ, domi Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡerumɔ, “Gusunɔ kun wɑ̃ɑ be bɑ tii suen biruɔ, ɑdɑmɑ u tii kɑwobu durom kuɑmmɛ.”
Aɑwo, n ǹ mɛ. Bɑɑ bɑ̀ n tɔnu bɑɑwure sokɑ weesuɡii, bɑ n yɛ̃ mɑ Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɡeeɡii. Nɡe mɛ Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡerumɔ, “Bɑ koo nun ɡem wɛ̃wɑ wunɛn ɡɑri ɡerubu sɔɔ kpɑ ɑ siribu di.”
Mɑ sɑ nuɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwerobɑ nùn nɔɔ kɑ̃ u kɑ tɔmbu kpuro mwɑ be bɑ wunɛn yĩsiru sokumɔ mini.

Adɑmɑ sɔmɔ weesuɡibɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɔn ben suunu sɔɔ. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ keu koosio weesuɡibɑ koo kurɑmɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. Bɑ koo kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi weesuɡinu nɑ kɑ bwisi, ni nu rɑ tɔmbu kɑm koosie kpɑ bu Yinni wi u bu yɑkiɑ yinɑ. Nɡe mɛyɑ bɑ koo tii kɑm kobu sure suɑru sɔɔ.
Gɑri yin sɔ̃nɑ Yuubɑ bɑ kpɑm hɑniɑ sosi bu kɑ nùn ɡo, n ǹ mɔ yèn sɔ̃ u tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑruɡiru sɑnkɑ tɔnɑ, ɑdɑmɑ yèn sɔ̃ u mɑɑ nɛɛ win Bɑɑbɑwɑ Gusunɔ. Mɛsumɑ u kɑ win tii Gusunɔ nɛrɑsinɑmɔ.
Nɑ bɛɛ siɑrɑ ye i rɑ kɑ mɑn yɑɑye kpuro sɔɔ, ye i mɑɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi te nɛni sim sim te nɑ mwɑ nɑ bɛɛ wɛ̃.
Win ɡɑri wee yi Dɑfidi u yoruɑ. U nɛɛ, “Nɑ Yinni Gusunɔ wɑɑmɔ bɑɑdommɑ. U wɑ̃ɑ nɛn nɔm ɡeuɔ kpɑ n ku kɑ wururɑ.
Domi bɑ ǹ bɛɛ mɑrɑ nɔn mɛɛruse kɑ bwese te tɑ koo ɡbi. Bɑ bɛɛ mɑrɑwɑ kɑ bwese te tɑ ǹ ɡbimɔ te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri yi yi wɑsi yi yi ku rɑ kpe.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i bɛɛn durum tuubɑ kuɑnɔ, kpɑ i n kɑnɑru kuɑnɑmmɛ, kpɑ i kɑ wɑ i bɛkurɑ. Gemɡiin kɑnɑru tɑ dɑm ɑrufɑɑniɡum mɔ n kpɑ̃.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, wi u mɑn nɑɑnɛ doke, u wɑ̃ɑru mɔ te tɑ ku rɑ kpe.
Nɑ ǹ bɛɛ derimɔ ɡoberu. Kon kpɑm wurɑmɑ bɛɛn mi.
N ɑrufɑɑni bɑkɑ mɔ swɛɛ kpuro sɔɔ. Gbiikɑɑ Gusunɔ u win ɡere Yuubɑ nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
Bɛɛ yobu i bɛɛn yinnibu mɛm nɔɔwɔ hɑnduniɑ mi, kɑ nɑsiɑru kɑ diiribu n kun kɑ murɑfitiru, kpɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nɡe Kirisiwɑ i sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Nɡe ɑ win tɔn ɡeeru kɑ win tɛmɑnɑbu kɑ win suurun kpɑ̃ɑru ɡɛmɑwɑ? A ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ Gusunɔ u tɔn ɡeeru mɔ̀wɑ u kɑ nun ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑsiɑ?
Sɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ mɑ sɑ̀ n nùn ɡɑ̃ɑnu kɑnɑ ni nu sɑ̃ɑ win kĩru, u sun swɑɑ dɑki.
Kpɑ Gusunɔ wi u sun yĩiyɔbu wɛ̃ɛmɔ u bɛɛ nuku dobu kpuro kɑ bɔri yɛndu kpuro yibiɑ bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃ kpɑ i n yĩiyɔbu mɔ n bɑnde sɑɑ Hunde Dɛɛron dɑm di.
N deemɑ bɑtumɑ ɡɑɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi bɑ Yesu kpɑren bɔkuɔ. Siki wɔru kperuɡuu ɡɑɡɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, bɑtumɑ ye sɔɔ, ɡè sɔɔ bɑ ǹ ɡoo sikure.

Bɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye mwɑ kɑ sɔmɔ weesuɡii wi sɑnnu, wi u rɑɑ sɔm mɑɑmɑɑkiɡinu kuɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ yen nɔni biru. Win sɔm mɑɑmɑɑkiɡinun sɔ̃nɑ u bu nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ be bɑ rɑɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ yen yĩreru mɔ, mɑ bɑ yen weenɑsiɑ sɑ̃wɑ. Bɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye kɑ sɔmɔ weesuɡii wi kpɛ̃ɛ wɑsi wɑsiru dɔ̃ɔ bweru sɔɔ, wi u mwɑɑrɑmɔ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ bisu.
Bɑ mɑɑ yoruɑ, “Gɔ̃ɔru tɑ̀ n wunɛn yibɛrɛ mɔ̀, ɑ nùn dĩɑnu kɛ̃ɛyɔ u di. Nim nɔru ɡɑ̀ n nùn mɔ̀, ɑ nùn nim kɛ̃ɛyɔ u nɔ. Domi ɑ̀ n kuɑ mɛ, ɑ nùn dɔ̃ɔ sɔbiwɑ mi.”
I de Kirisin ɡɑri yi n yibɑ bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ nɡe dukiɑ. I ɡɑri biɑ kuɑnɔ kpɑ i dɑm kɛ̃ɛnɑ kɑ bwisi ɡee kpɑ i n womusu mɔ̀ i n Gusunɔ tɔmɑmɔ. I nùn tɑkɑrun womusu kuo bɛɛn ɡɔ̃rusɔ.
Bɛɛ durɔbu i bɛɛn kurɔbu kĩɔ, i ku de i n sɛ̃ be sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeo ɡoo ù n ɡɔminibu mɔ win dusibu sɔɔ, ɑ de u bu somi. A ku de u Yesun yiɡbɛru sɔmu ni sɔbi kpɑ tu kɑ kpĩ tu ɡɔmini be bɑ kun ɡoo mɔ somi.
Seedɑ ye wee, Gusunɔ sun wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe wɛ̃. Wɑ̃ɑ te, tɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ win Bii sɔɔ.
Wi u Bii mɔ, u mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ te mɔ. Wi u kun Gusunɔn Bii mɔ, u ǹ wɑ̃ɑ te mɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛ Gusunɔn Bii nɑ̀ n bɛɛ yɑkiɑ, i kuɑwɑ tii mɔwɔbu kɑ ɡem.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, nɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ i ku wururɑ nɛn nɔni swɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃ te nɑ wɑɑmɔ bɛɛn sɑɑbu. Terɑ tɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn bɛɛrɛ.
Domi tɔn ben bweseru bɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ Kirisi bɛsɛn Yinnin wɑ̃ɑru wɑ̃ɑ, ben nukuruɡiɑ bɑ mɔ̀. Kɑ ɡɑri dori kɑ kɔkiribɑ, bɑ kɑ tɑki sɑriruɡibu swɑɑ nim wiɑmɔ.
Mɑ bɑ kɔ̃sɑ bɑɑyere yibɑ kɑ nuku kɔ̃suru kɑ binɛ kɑ tusiru kɑ nisinu kɑ tɔn ɡoobu kɑ sɑnnɔ kɑ tɑki kɑ bwisi kɔ̃si. Bɑ rɑ wĩinɛ,
Gɑ̃ɑ ɡee ni bɑ nun nɔmɑ bɛriɑ ɑ nu nɛnuɔ kɑ Hunde Dɛɛron dɑm wi u wɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛ sɔɔ.
Ù n duurumɔ ye win tii tiin dɑɑ yɑ kĩ, kɑm kobɑ yɑ koo nùn mɑruɑ. Ù n mɑɑ duurumɔ ye Gusunɔn Hunde u kĩ, wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpewɑ Gusunɔn Hunde koo nùn mɑruɑ.
Su ku rɑ mɑɑ Yinni mɛɛri nɡe mɛ u nɛ, nɡe mɛ ben ɡɑbu bɑ kuɑ, mɑ wɛɛ bu ɡo ɡo.
Wi u tɔnu kĩ u rɑ n tɔmbun bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃, u ku rɑ win tii tɔnɑn ɑrufɑɑni kɑsu, u ku rɑ mɔru ko fuuku, u ku rɑ mɑɑ torɑrun ɡɑri yi win nukurɔ.
Yin toronu mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe tɑrɑkpe sisuɡinu, mɑ yin kɑsɑn wurenu sɑ̃ɑ nɡe kɛkɛ sisuɡii yi dum dɑbinu ɡɑwe tɑbu sɔɔ.
Nɑ̀ kun dɑɑ nɛ, nɑ kɑ bu ɡɑri kue, bɑ ǹ dɑɑ tɑɑrɛ mɔ. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ bɑ ǹ mɑɑ ɡɑfɑrɑ mɔ.
I tii kpɑro kɑ bwisi be bɑ kun nɑɑnɛ doken mi. I sɑɑ bɑɑyere dendio yu kɑ ɑrufɑɑni ko.
Sɑ yɛ̃ mɑ bɑ bɛsɛn dɑɑ ɡurɑ kpɑre dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru sɔɔ kɑ wi sɑnnu, kpɑ bɛsɛn wɑsi torɑruɡii yi ko dɑm sɑriruɡii kpɑ sɑ kun mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ torɑrun yobu.
Tɛ̃, sɑ ko kpĩ su tubu wi u sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn bii kɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ Setɑmɡii. Bɑɑwure wi u kun ɡeɑ mɔ̀, kɑ mɑɑ wi u kun win beruse kĩ, u ǹ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔɡii.
Domi be bɑ ben dɑɑɡiɑ bwisikumɔ bɑ kuɑ Gusunɔn yibɛrɛbɑ. Bɑ ǹ Gusunɔn woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ, bɑ ǹ mɑm kpɛ̃.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛn ɡɔ̃ru ɡɑ do. Mɑ nɑ ɡɑri ɡerumɔ kɑ nuku dobu. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ nɛn wɑsi koo wɛ̃rɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ.
Aɑwo. Adɑmɑ nɑ ɡerumɔ mɑ ye bɑ kɑ yɑ̃kuru kuɑ, bũnɑ bɑ kɑ yɑ̃kuru kuɑ, n ǹ mɔ Gusunɔ. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ kĩ i n bɔnu mɔ kɑ bũnu.

Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu kɑ keu koosiobu ɡɑbɑ wɑ̃ɑ Antiɔsin Yesun yiɡbɛru sɔɔ. Ben yĩsɑ wee. Bɑɑnɑbɑsi kɑ Simɛɔ wi bɑ sokumɔ tɔn wɔ̃ko, kɑ Lusiu Sirɛniɡii, kɑ Mɑnɑhɛni wi bɑ nɛnuɑ yɛnu teu kɑ Herodu sinɑ boko, kɑ mɑɑ Sɔɔlu.
I ku rɑ de ɡoo u kɑ bɛɛ ɡɑri diri swɑɑ nim wiɑ, domi yenin sɔ̃nɑ Gusunɔn mɔru wee ben wirɔ be bɑ ǹ nùn mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ.
Ben bweserɑ n weenɛ bu nɔsu mɑrisiɑ, domi bɑ yɛnu dɑbinun tɔmbu bitɑni dokemɔ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ bu sɔ̃ɔsimɔ ye n kun weenɛ bu kɑ ɡobi wɑn sɔ̃.
N deemɑ Yesu u win dɔmɛ yɛ̃ kɔ, yen sɔ̃nɑ u ɡeruɑ u nɛɛ, n ǹ mɔ be kpurowɑ bɑ dɛɛre.
Yen biru Yesu u nɛɛ, kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, ɡoo wi u kun dumɔ yɑ̃ɑ ɡɔ̃rɔ sɑɑ kɔnnɔn di mɑ u yɔɔmɔ u suremɔ ɡɑm di, wiyɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡbɛnɔ kɑ wɔro.
Bɑ swɑɑ ɡeɑ deri mɑ bɑ kɔ̃ɔrɑ. Bɑ Bɑlɑmu, Beorun biin swɑɑ swĩi wi u kɔ̃sɑn kobun ɑre kĩɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛyɑ tɔn tukobu kɑ Yuu ɡɑbu, kɑ ben wiruɡibu sɑnnu bɑ nɔɔ tiɑ kuɑ bu kɑ ɡɔro be wɑhɑlɑ ko, bu be kpenu kɑsuku.

Yesu kpɑm wure u nùn bikiɑ nɔn itɑse, Simɔɔ, Yohɑnun bii, ɑ mɑn kĩ? Mɑ Piɛɛn nukurɑ sɑnkirɑ yèn sɔ̃ u nùn bikiɑ nɔn itɑse u nùn kĩ. Mɑ u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni, ɑ bɑɑyere yɛ̃, ɑ yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm mɑ nɑ nun kĩ. Mɑ Yesu u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ nɛn yɑ̃ɑnu nɔɔrio.
Adɑmɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu kun duɔ wuu ɡe sɔɔ pɑi, mɛyɑ mɑɑ tɔnu wi u kom kɔ̃sum kɑ weesu mɔ̀. Be bɑ koo du mi, beyɑ bèn yĩsɑ bɑ yoruɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm ten tireru sɔɔ te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ wɑ̃ɑrun tireru.
Kurɔ wi, u yɑ̃nu sebuɑ ni nu kɔrɔnnɔ kɑ swɑ̃ɑ tobe sɑ̃ɑ, mɑ u burɑru kuɑ kɑ wurɑ kɑ ɡoo kpee ɡobi bɛkɛɡinu kɑ ɡoo kpikinu. U wurɑn nɔrɑ nɛni win nɔmɑɔ yè sɔɔ ɡɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sunu kɑ win kurɔ tɑnɔ disi yibɑ.
Yeni kpuron wɔllɔ i kĩru sebuo te tɑ koo de i n nɔɔ nɛ mɑm mɑm.
Yesu u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, sɑɑ yɑ turɑ ye bɑ koo kɑ Tɔnu Bii wɔlle suɑ.
Wunɛ wi ɑ ɡerumɔ bu ku sɑkɑrɑru ko, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ mɔ̀. Wunɛ wi ɑ bũnu tusɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ ɡbɛnimɔ nin dinɔ.
Mɑ torɑru tɑ woodɑ tɑ̃sɑ tɑ kɑ binɛ bɑɑyere mɑrɑ nɛ sɔɔ. Domi mi woodɑ kun wɑ̃ɑ, torɑru mɑɑ sɑri.
Kon nun yɑkiɑ sɑɑ Isirelibɑn nɔmun di, kɑ mɑɑ tɔn tukobun min di bèn mi kon nun ɡɔri,

Domi bɛsɛn tii sɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑri bɑkɑsu kɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑriruɡibu kɑ be bɑ tore. Sɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔ̃ru kĩru kɑnkɑm kɑ hɑnduniɑn kĩru bɑɑteren yobu. Sɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ nuku kɔ̃suru kɑ binɛ sɔɔ. Sɑ sɑ̃ɑ be tɔmbɑ tusɑ, sɑ mɑɑ tusinɛ.
Nɑ wure nɑ nun sɔ̃ɔmɔ Gusunɔ kɑ Yesu Kirisi kɑ win ɡɔrɑdo be u ɡɔsɑn wuswɑɑɔ, ɑ sɔ̃ɔsi nini mɛm nɔɔwɔ n kun kɑ ɡoon nɔnu nɑsiɑru. A ku mɑɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu ko kpɑɑsirun kĩrun sɔ̃.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i ku wɔruɡɔru kpɑnɑ, domi ten ɑre kpɑ̃.
Be bɑ mɑɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu nɔmu sɔndiɑ n weenɛwɑ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛɡibu.
Piɛɛ u sɔ̃ɔ mɛɛru kuɑ Yopeɔ, yɑnɑ kowo ɡoon mi, wi bɑ rɑ soku Simɔɔ.
I ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ i sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑ yeru? I ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ win Hunde wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ?
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛɡibu sɑ toro sindu mɔ su kɑ du dii te tɑ dɛɛre ɡem ɡem sɔɔ Yesun yɛm sɑɑbu.
Yesu kpɑm bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ doonɔ. Mi nɑ dɔɔ bɛɛ i ǹ kpɛ̃ i dɑ mi. I ko mɑɑ mɑn kɑsu, ɑdɑmɑ i ko ɡbi bɛɛn torɑnu sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, yèn sɔ̃ Gusunɔ u bɛɛ kĩɑ mɑ u bɛɛ ɡɔsɑ i kɑ ko wiɡibu, wee ye n weenɛ i sebe, wɔnwɔndu kɑ tɔn ɡeeru kɑ tii kɑwɑbu kɑ dɑɑ duudwiɑ kɑ suuru.
Goo ù n nɛn wɑ̃ɑru wɑ̃ɑ, yɛ̃ro u mɑn swĩiyɔ. Mi nɑ wɑ̃ɑ kpɑ u n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi. Goo ù n nɛn wɑ̃ɑru wɑ̃ɑ, nɛn Bɑɑbɑ koo yɛ̃ro bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Kpɑ u n sɑ̃ɑ wi u win yɛnu nɔmɑ sikerenɛ mɑm mɑm, kpɑ u win bibu mɛm nɔɔbu kɑ tɔnun bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛbu kpuro sɔ̃ɔsi.
Yen sɔ̃, i n dɑm kɛ̃ɛnɑmɔ kpɑ i n tɑ̃sisiɑnɑmɔ nɡe mɛ i mɔ̀ tɛ̃.
Gɑri wee yi i nuɑ sɑɑ toren di. Su kĩɑnɑ
Nɑ tɑmɑɑ, sɑɑ yenin wɑhɑlɑn sɔ̃ mɑ n ko n wɛ̃rɑ tɔn durɔ bɑɑwure u n wɑ̃ɑ nɡe mɛ u sɑ̃ɑ.
Durɔ ɡoo wɑ̃ɑ Fɑlisibɑ sɔɔ wi bɑ rɑ nɛɛ Nikodɛmu, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yuubɑn tɔnwero.
Nɡe mɛyɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɑ Rɑhɑbu, kurɔ tɑnɔ wi. U ɡem wɑ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ win kookoosun sɔ̃ ye u kɑ derɑ Yuubɑn ɡɔro be, bɑ duɑ win yɛnuɔ mɑ u bu yɑrɑ kɑ swɑɑ tukɑ ɡɑɑ.
Adɑmɑ tɔn kurɔ u koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ ù n bibu mɑrumɔ ù n ɡesi wɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ kĩru kɑ wɑ̃ɑ dɛɛrɑru sɔɔ kɑ tii yɛ̃ru sɑnnu.
Gusunɔ bɛsɛ Isirelibɑn Yinni u bɛsɛn sikɑdobɑ ɡɔsɑ mɑ u derɑ bɑ kuɑ bwese bɑkɑru sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ wɑ̃ɑ Eɡibitin temɔ. Yen biru u bu yɑrɑ min di kɑ win dɑm bɑkɑm,
Mɑ Gusunɔ wi u tɔmbu kpuron ɡɔ̃rusu yɛ̃, u tɔn tuko be seedɑ diiyɑ ye u bu Hunde Dɛɛro kɑ̃ nɡe mɛ u sun kɑ̃.
Geemɑ, wi u nɛɛ, “I ku sɑkɑrɑru ko,” wiyɑ mɑɑ nɛɛ, “I ku tɔnu ɡo.” Yen sɔ̃, ɑ̀ kun sɑkɑrɑru kue, ɑdɑmɑ mɑ ɑ tɔnu ɡo, ɑ woodɑ sɑrɑwɑ.
Nɑ nu wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ɛmɔ te tɑ ku rɑ kpe, nu ǹ mɑɑ kɑm mɔ̀ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ, ɡoo mɑɑ sɑri wi u koo nu mwɑ nɛn nɔmun di.
Gusunɔ wi u ɑlɑfiɑ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, u koo bɛɛ Setɑm dɑm kɔrɑ ǹ n sosi bɛɛn nɑɑsun temɔ. Bɛsɛn Yinni Yesun durom mu n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɛɛ.
Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ bèn Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑrɑ sɑkuɑ, bɑ ǹ koo ten dɑm wurɑ. A tɔn ben bweseru suurio.
Nɡe mɛyɑ, bɑɑ sɑ̀ n dɑbi, sɑ sɑ̃ɑ wɑsi tee Kirisi sɔɔ, mɑ sɑ ɡbinnɛ nɡe wɑsi teen doo dookɑ.
Gɑri yi, ɡɑri nɑɑnɛɡiiyɑ. Nɑ kĩ ɑ yi ɡere ɑ sire kpɑ be bɑ Gusunɔ nɑɑnɛ doke bu ben sɑɑ di sɔm ɡeenun kobu sɔɔ. Gɑri yi, yi wɑ̃ yi mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔmbun ɑrufɑɑni.
Mɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri koorɑ yi yi nɛɛ, “Aburɑhɑmu u Gusunɔ nɑɑnɛ kuɑ, mɑ Gusunɔ u nùn ɡɑrisi ɡemɡii.” Mɑ bɑ nùn sokɑ Gusunɔn bɔrɔ.
Nɛɡibu, bɛɛ be i bɛsɛn Yinni yiikoɡii Yesu Kirisi nɑɑnɛ doke, i ku tɔmbun bɛɛrɛ kerɑnɑɑ mɛɛri.
Ben yɑrɑ bɑ kɑ sibu tɑki dimɔ. Ben nɔɔ ɡɑ dɛ̃ɛ mɔwɑ nɡe surɔkɔru. Ben nɔɔwɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ tɔnu ɡo.
Mɛyɑ n weenɛ durɔbu bu ben kurɔbu kĩɑ nɡe mɛ bɑ ben tiin wɑsi kĩ. Wi u win kurɔ kĩ, u win tii kĩwɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑ sɑ ko ɡere. Tɔn tuko be bɑ ǹ dɑɑ kɑsu bu ɡem wɑ Gusunɔn mi, bɑ ɡem wɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɑɑbu.
ɑdɑmɑ bɑ n nɑɑnɛ dokebun ɡem mɛ mu terɑ nɛni kɑ ɡɔ̃ru dɛɛrɔ.

Yoo be bɑ mɑɑ yinni nɑɑnɛ dokeobu mɔ, bu ku rɑɑ bu ɡɛm bu nɛɛ, bɑ sɑ̃ɑ dusinu Yinni sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ bu de bu yinni be sɑ̃ kɑ ɡirimɑ kpɑ bu ben sɔmɑn ɑrufɑɑni di n kpɑ̃ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobu kɑ mɑɑ kĩnɑsibu Yesu sɔɔ. kɑ ɑrumɑni ɡeɑ Yeyɑ n weenɛ ɑ wɑɑsu kɑ keu ko.
Mbɑ yɑ koo ko ben ɡɑbu bɑ̀ n kuɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑriruɡibu. Ben nɑɑnɛ sɑrirun sɔ̃ Gusunɔ u koo mɑɑ ko nɑɑnɛ sɑriruɡii?
Adɑmɑ tɑbu kowobun turo u Yesu yɑɑsɑ sɔkɑ win yɛ̃sɑɔ, mɑ yɑnde yɛm kɑ nim mu yɑrɑ.
Nɛn woodɑ wee, i kĩɑnɔ nɡe mɛ nɑ bɛɛ kĩ.
I ku rɑ bɛɛn wɑsin doo dookɑ torɑru nɔmu sɔndiɑ tu kɑ kɔ̃sɑ ko, ɑdɑmɑ i bɛɛn tii Gusunɔ nɔmu sɔndio nɡe wɑsobu be bɑ wurɑmɑ ɡɔrin di, kpɑ i bɛɛn wɑsin doo dookɑ Gusunɔ nɔmu sɔndiɑ yu kɑ ɡeɑ ko.
Sɑ ǹ wɑ̃ɑ be bɑ biru wurɔ bu kɑ kɑm kon wuurɔ, sɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ be bɑ nɑɑnɛ doke bu kɑ ben hunden fɑɑbɑ wɑn wuurɔ.
Nɡe mɛyɑ Isirelibɑ kpuro bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ wɑ, nɡe mɛ bɑ yoruɑ, “Yɑkio u koo nɑ sɑɑ Siɔnin di. Kpɑ u Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ru sɑriru wunɑ sɑɑ Yɑkɔbun bweserun di.
Yuu beyɑ bɑ Yinni Yesu kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu ɡo, bɑ mɑɑ sun nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Ben dɑɑ kun Gusunɔ wɛ̃re, bɑ mɑɑ kɑ tɔmbu kpuro yibɛrɛ tɛɛru nɛni.
Domi sɑ̀ n yɛ̃ mɑ torɑrɑ sɑ kɑ mɔ̀ sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ ɡem ɡiɑ kɔ, yɑ̃kuru ɡɑru mɑɑ sɑri te tɑ koo bɛsɛn torɑnu wunɑ.
Gusunɔ u sun seeyɑ ɡɔrin di kɑ Kirisi sɑnnu kpɑ su bɑndu di kɑ wi sɑnnu wɔllɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, i ku mɑɑ weesu ko. I de bɑɑwure u n dɑ win winsim ɡem sɔ̃ domi sɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wɑsi teen doo dookɑ.
Adɑmɑ sɑ ǹ ben ɡɑri wure bɑɑ fiiko yèn sɔ̃ sɑ kĩ Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑn ɡem mu n wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, n weenɛ wi u kɑ Hunden bɑrum ɡɑri ɡerumɔ u Gusunɔ kɛ̃ru kɑnɑ te u koo kɑ ɡɑri yi tusiɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ sɔɔrɑ Sɔɔlu u yɔ̃rɑri dim dim u Yinnin bwɑ̃ɑbu nɔni sɔ̃ u bu ɡo. Mɑ u dɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnweron mi,
Tɛ̃ nɑ sisi wunɛn mi. Yeniwɑ nɑ ɡerumɔ hɑnduniɑ ye sɔɔ, kpɑ bɑ n kɑ nuku dobu yibɑ nɛn sɔ̃.
Adɑmɑ i ɡɔ̃ru doro ye i kɑ Kirisin nɔni swɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ bɔnu mɔ, kpɑ i n mɑɑ nuku doo bɑkɑbu mɔ tɔ̃ɔ te win yiiko yɑ koo sɔ̃ɔsirɑ.
Ye nɑ tu nɔni ɡirɑri nɑ mɛɛrɑ nɑ yɛɛ nɑɑsu nnɛɡii wɑ, kɑ ɡberun yɛɛ kɑ yɛɛ yi yi rɑ kɑbiri kɑ mɑɑ ɡunɔsu.
Adɑmɑ tɛ̃, i ye kpuro kɔ̃ɔwɔ ye n sɑ̃ɑ mɔru kɑ nuku ɡbisibu kɑ mɑɑ nuku kɔ̃suru. I ku de wɔmburu ǹ kun mɛ ɡɑri swininu nu yɑri bɛɛn nɔɔ sɔɔn di pɑi.
u sinɑ kɑ be domi sɔm bwese teerɑ bɑ rɑ ko. Kuu bekuruɡinɑ be kpuro bɑ rɑ ko.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i ku mɑɑ de torɑru tɑ n bɑndu dii bɛɛn wɑsi yi yi koo ɡbi sɔɔ. I ku yin binɛ mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Sɑ tɔn ben bweseru yiiremɔ sɑ bu suuru kɑnɑmɔ Yinni Yesu Kirisin sɔ̃, bu de bu sɔmburu ko lɑɑkɑri sɔɔ kpɑ bu ben tii diisiɑ.
Yɑkɔbun bii be, bɑ kɑ Yosɛfu nisinu kuɑ, mɑ bɑ nùn Eɡibitiɡibu dɔre bɑ kɑ doonɑ. Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wi,
Ben turo, wi bɑ sokumɔ Aɡɑbusi, u seewɑ u yɔ̃rɑ mɛnnɔ sɔɔ, mɑ u Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡeruɑ kɑ Hunde Dɛɛron somiru u nɛɛ, ɡɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑrɑ koo ko hɑnduniɑ kpuro sɔɔ. Nɡe mɛyɑ tɑ mɑɑ kuɑ tem yɛ̃ro Kolodun wɑɑti.
Sɑnɑm mɛ Pɔlu u ɡɑri yi ɡeruɑ u kpɑ, u yiirɑ mɑ u kɑnɑru kuɑ kɑ be kpuro sɑnnu.
Mɑ be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yesu Kirisiɡibu bɑ ben tii tiin dɑɑ kpeerɑsiɑ dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑrɔ, kɑ yen binɛ kɑ yen kĩru kpuro.
Nɛɡibu, lɑɑkɑri mɛɛri bwese bwesekɑ yè sɔɔ i wɔri kpuro i ye ɡɑrisio ɡɔ̃ru dobu.
Sɑ̀ n nɛɛ, sɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɑ wi, mɑ sɑ sĩimɔ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ, sɑ weesu mɔ̀wɑ, sɑ ǹ mɑɑ ɡem kookoosu mɔ̀.
U wɑ Gusunɔ wɔllɑ wukiɑrɑ mɑ beku te tɑ sɑ̃ɑre ɡɔ̃ɡɔ bɔkɔ tɑ sɑrɑmɑ, bɑ ten ɡoonu nnɛ dɛriɑ.
Sɑ nɑ sɑɑ Pɑɑtin di kɑ Mɛdi kɑ Elɑmu, sɑɑ Mɛsopotɑmi kɑ Yudeɑ kɑ Kɑpɑdosin di kɑ Pontu kɑ Asi,

Sɑɑ yerɑ bɛɛn sɑnu sɑnusu su ko n kɑ Yinniɡiiɡisu weenɛ, kpɑ i n dɑ ko ye n koo nùn wɛ̃re. Bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑrɑ koo mɑɑ kookoo ɡeesu bwese bwesekɑ sɔ̃ɔsi nɡe dɑ̃ɑ te tɑ bii ɡeenu mɑrumɔ, kpɑ i Gusunɔ ɡiɑm sosi.
Timɔte nɛn bii, nɑ nun yiire bini mɔ̀ nɡe mɛ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bɑ rɑɑ ɡeruɑ wunɛn sɔ̃. A de sɔmɔ ben ɡɑri yi, yi n sɑ̃ɑ wunɛn tɑbu yɑ̃nu kpɑ ɑ kɑ tɑɑ ɡeebu ko
Yen biru nɑ nɔɔ nuɑ nɡe tɔn wɔrun wurenu wɔllɔ ɡɑ nɛɛ, su Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni siɑrɑ. U sɑ̃ɑwɑ fɑɑbɑ kowo, u yiiko kɑ dɑm mɔ.
Gɑsɔ, i rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe be bɑ ɡu bɛɛn torɑnu kɑ bɛɛn mɛm nɔɔ sɑrirun sɔ̃.
I ǹ kpɛ̃ i nɔ Yinnin nɔrɑ sɔɔ kpɑ i mɑɑ nɔ bũnun nɔrɑ sɔɔ. I ǹ kpɛ̃ i di ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ Yinnin tɑbulu wɔllɔ, kpɑ i mɑɑ di ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ bũnun tɑbulu wɔllɔ.
Yèn sɔ̃ i sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobu i ku de kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑbu tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ ǹ kun mɛ dɑɑ disinuɡiɑ ǹ kun mɛ binɛ, yen ɡɑɑ yu nɔɔrɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ.
Gɑ̃ɑnu bɑɑnire nu dɛɛre be bɑ dɛɛren mi, ɑdɑmɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu sɑri ni nu dɛɛre disinuɡibu kɑ nɑɑnɛ doke sɑriruɡibun mi, yèn sɔ̃ ben bwisikunu kɑ ben ɡɔ̃rusu kun dɛɛre.
Be kpuro be bɑ ɡɑri yi nuɑ, bɑ biti kuɑ bɑ bikiɑnɑ bɑ nɛɛ, n ǹ durɔ wiyɑ mi, wi u rɑɑ be bɑ Yesun yĩsiru sokumɔ ɡoomɔ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ, mɑ u nɑ mini u kɑ bu mwɑ u bɔke u kɑ dɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwerobun mi?
Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ bɑ Yesu sɔmburu nɔmu sɔndiɑ te tɑ beɡiru bɛɛrɛ kere, domi u sɑ̃ɑ ɑrukɑwɑni ye yɑ bɛɛrɛ bon swɑɑ sɔmɔ. Bɑ ɑrukɑwɑni ye bɔkuɑwɑ kɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛ ni nu bɛɛrɛ bo.
Domi nɛn mi, nɑ̀ n wɑ̃ɑ, Kirisin wɑ̃ɑrɑ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ, nɑ̀ n mɑɑ ɡu, ɡɔɔ mɑn sɑ̃ɑwɛ ɑre.
Nɑ yeni yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm, Gusunɔ wi u sɔm ɡee te toruɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ u ko n tu mɔ̀ sere u kɑ tu dɑkurɑ Yesu Kirisin tɔ̃ru sɔɔ.

Sɑ mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ Gusunɔn Bii u nɑ, mɑ u sun bwisi kɑ̃ su kɑ Gusunɔ Yinni ɡemɡii ɡiɑ. Sɑ ɡbinnɛ kɑ ɡemɡii wi, win Bii Yesu Kirisin min di. Yesu Kirisi wiyɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ Yinni ɡemɡii. U mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpen nuuru.
Ǹ n koo koorɑ, i de i n nɔɔ nɛ kɑ tɔnu bɑɑwure nɡe mɛ̀n nɔru i ko kpĩ.
Su de sɑ n yĩiyɔ bini nɛni dim dim bìn seedɑ sɑ dimɔ, domi Gusunɔ wi u nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ u sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛɡii.
Bɔri yɛndɑ nɑ bɛɛ deriɑ, nɛn bɔri yɛndɑ nɑ bɛɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ. Nɑ ǹ bɛɛ tu wɛ̃ɛmɔ nɡe mɛ hɑnduniɑ yɑ rɑ wɛ̃. I ku wururɑ, i ku mɑɑ nɑndɑ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ wɔruɡɔru mɔ bɑɑdommɑ. Sɑ mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɑsi yini sɔɔ sɑ kɑ Yinnin wɑ̃ɑ yeru tomɑ.
Bɑɑwure wi u nɛn ɡɑri nɔɔmɔ, mɑ u kun yi wure, n ǹ mɔ nɛnɑ kon yɛ̃ro tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃. Nɑ nɑwɑ n kɑ hɑnduniɑ fɑɑbɑ ko, n ǹ mɔ n kɑ hɑnduniɑ tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃.
kpɑ sɑ kun sɑ̃ɑ nɡe Kɑɛni wi u sɑ̃ɑ tɔn kɔ̃so wiɡii mɑ u win wɔnɔ ɡo. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ u nùn ɡo. U nùn ɡo yèn sɔ̃ win tii u kom kɔ̃sum kuɑ, wɔnɔ mɑɑ kom ɡem kuɑ.
Tem burenu kpuro nu doonɑ, ɡuunu kun mɑɑ wɑɑrɔ.
Nɡe mɛyɑ, sɑɑ tɔn durɔ turon min di, wi u ɡɔɔ turɑ, tɔmbɑ mɑrurɑ bɑ dɑbiɑ nɡe wɔllun kperi kɑ nim wɔ̃kun yɑni sɛɛri yi ɡoo kun kpɛ̃ u ɡɑri.
Tɛ̃, Gusunɔ turo wi, sinɑ boko wi u ko n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ, wi u kun ɡbimɔ, wi bɑ ǹ kɑ nɔni wɑɑre, wiɡiɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ yiiko sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Ami.
U nɔɔɡiru suɑ u nɛɛ, i Gusunɔ nɑsio kpɑ i nùn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃, domi sɑɑ yɑ turɑ u kɑ tɔmbu kpuro siri. I nùn sɑ̃ɑwɔ wi u wɔllu kɑ tem tɑkɑ kuɑ kɑ nim wɔ̃ku kɑ bwii.
Sɔ̃ɔ mɛɛ te sɔɔ, nɡe mɛ nɑɑnɛ dokeobɑ sosimɔ, Yuu be bɑ Gɛrɛkim tɔnɑ ɡerumɔ bɑ kɑ be bɑ tie wɔki yèn sɔ̃ bɑ ben ɡɔminibu duɑrimɔ tɔ̃ɔ bɑɑteren dĩɑnun bɔnu sɔɔ.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ Gusunɔ u bɛɛ sokɑ domi Kirisin tii u nɔni swɑ̃ɑru wɑ bɛɛn sɔ̃ mɑ u bɛɛ kom ɡem sɔ̃ɔsi kpɑ i kɑ win yirɑ swĩi.
Sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn mi sɑ bɛɛ yiire sɑ nɛɛ, wi u kun kĩ u sɔmburu ko, n ǹ mɑɑ weenɛ yɛ̃ro u di.
Domi Gusunɔ u hɑnduniɑɡibun kĩru mɔ, sere u win Bii tɔn durɔ teereru bu wɛ̃, kpɑ bɑɑwure wi u nùn nɑɑnɛ doke, u ku kɑm ko, ɑdɑmɑ u n wɑ̃ɑru mɔ te tɑ ku rɑ kpe.
Yerɑ wɛrɛku ɡɑɡu ɡɑ nɛɛ, nɑ Yesu yɛ̃, nɑ mɑɑ Pɔlu yɛ̃, ɑdɑmɑ wɑrɑ bɛɛ i sɑ̃ɑ.
Yerɑ nɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye wɑ kɑ hɑnduniɑn sinɑmbu kɑ ben tɑbu kowobu. Be kpuro bɑ mɛnnɑ bu kɑ wi u dumɑ sɔni mi tɑbu ko kɑ win tɑbu kowobu.
Sɑ ɡoo nimkuu duɑ ɡe ɡɑ nɑ sɑɑ Adɑmitin di ɡɑ dɔɔ ɡɑ n Asin tem bɛwe. Mɑ sɑ swɑɑ wɔri. N deemɑ Aritɑɑki, Mɑsedɔniɡii wi u nɑ sɑɑ Tɛsɑlonikɑn di, u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɛsɛ.
I pirisɔmbɑ yɑɑyo nɡe mɛ i ko ko ì n kɑ bu wɑ̃ɑ sɑnnu. I be bɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ yɑɑyo domi bɛɛn tii, wɑsiyɑ i mɑɑ mɔ.
Bɛɛn kookoosu kɑ bɛɛn ɡere sɔɔ, i ye kpuro koowo i kɑ Yinni Yesun yĩsiru bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ kpɑ i Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ tɑkɑru ko win min di. wɑ̃ɑ kpɑɑru sɔɔ
Wi bɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri sɔ̃ɔsimɔ, i de yɛ̃ro u win ɡɑ̃ɑ ɡee ni u mɔ bɔnu ko kɑ wi u nùn sɔ̃ɔsimɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ, u ǹ nùn ɑyeru ɡɑru kɑ̃ tem mɛ sɔɔ, bɑɑ nɑɑ dɑbusɑ teeru, ɑdɑmɑ bɑɑ mɛ Aburɑhɑmu kun ɡinɑ bii mɑrɑ Gusunɔ u nùn nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ mɑ u koo nùn tem mɛ wɛ̃, kpɑ mu n sɑ̃ɑ wi kɑ mɑɑ win bibuɡim.
Sinɑ boko wi, u bɛsɛn tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ u kɑ bu kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ, u bu tilɑsi kuɑ bu kɑ ben bii wɛ̃ɛnu kɔ̃ kpɑ nu ɡbi.
Sɑnɑm mɛyɑ Piɛɛ kɑ bɔ̃ɔ wi, bɑ yɑrɑ bɑ dɑ sikiru mi.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ hɑniɑ mɔ̀ bɑɑdommɑ, kpɑ nɛn ɡɔ̃ru ɡu ku mɑn tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ kɑ mɑɑ tɔmbun wuswɑɑɔ.

Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe nim wɔ̃kun nim kure ni nu kukumɔ. Nɡe mɛ nu nin yɑkeru kɔ̃ɔmɔ mɛyɑ bɑ mɑɑ ben sekuru sɑri kom sɔ̃ɔsimɔ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe wɔllun kperi yi yi yin swɑɑ bie, Gusunɔ u bu yɑm wɔ̃ku te tɑ kpɑ̃ yiiye tè sɔɔ bɑ koo du kɑ bɑɑdommɑ.
Nɑ ǹ ye mwɛ tɔnun min di, ɡoo kun mɑɑ mɑn ye keu kue, Yesu Kirisiwɑ u mɑn ye sɔ̃ɔsi.
Domi sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn tiin dɑɑn nɔmɑ sɔɔ, kɑnkɑm kĩi torɑruɡiru te woodɑ yɑ seeyɑ tɑ sɔmburu mɔ̀ bɛsɛn wɑsin doo dookɑ sɔɔ mɑ tɑ kɑ sun dɔɔ ɡɔɔ ɡiɑ.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ bɑ mɑn ɡɔsɑ wɑɑsu kowo kɑ ɡɔro, kpɑ n kɑ tɔn tukobu nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ ɡem keu sɔ̃ɔsi. Geemɑ nɑ ɡerumɔ nɑ ǹ weesu mɔ̀.
Wi u win woodɑbɑ swĩi u kɑ Gusunɔ mɑninɛ, Gusunɔ mɑɑ kɑ nùn mɑninɛ. Yenin min diyɑ sɑ yɛ̃ mɑ u kɑ sun mɑninɛ win Hunde Dɛɛro wi u sun wɛ̃n sɔ̃.
N ǹ weenɛ ɡoo u win tiin ɑrufɑɑni kɑsu, mɑ n kun mɔ win winsimɡiɑ.
I n wɑ̃ɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɔɔ sɑnnu. I ku de tii suɑbun bwisikunu nu n bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑsi ɑdɑmɑ i koosio tii kɑwɑbun berɑ ɡiɑ. I ku tii ɡɑrisi bwisiɡibu.
I ku yibɛrɛ tɛɛru yi ɡɔ̃ruɔ, kɑ mɑɑ mɔru kɑ nuku ɡbisibu. I ku mɑɑ wɔkisinɑ ǹ kun mɛ i wɔnnɑ, i nuku kɔ̃su kom bɑɑmɛre derio.
Mɑ Gusunɔ u mɑn kuɑ yiɡbɛ ten sɔm kowo nɡe mɛ u mɑn yiire bɛɛn sɔ̃, kpɑ n kɑ win ɡɑri kpuro nɔɔsiɑ.
Win wiru kɑ win seri buririwɑ nɡe wɛ̃su ǹ kun mɛ nɡe ɡunsu mɑ win nɔni sɑ̃ɑ nɡe dɔ̃ɔ yɑrɑ.
Bɛɛn sɔ̃nɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ ni kpuro nu koorɑmɔ, kpɑ tɔn dɑbiru tu durom wɑ, kpɑ tu Gusunɔ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ kɑ siɑrɑ bɑkɑbu.
Domi wi u nɛn yɑɑ temɑ mɑ u nɛn yɛm nɔrɑ, u ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛ sɔɔ, mɑ nɛn tii ko nɑ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɛ̃ro sɔɔ.
Mɑɑtɑ u Yinni wisɑ u nɛɛ, mɛyɑ nɑ nɑɑnɛ doke mɑ wunɑ Kirisi wi, Gusunɔn Bii, wi u sisi hɑnduniɑɔ.
Mɑ bɑ rɑ n ɡɔrobun keu swɑɑ dɑki, bɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ, bɑ rɑ n mɛnnɛ, bɑ yɑɑ dibu dimɔ kɑ mɑɑ Yinnin dĩɑ domɑruɡinu, bɑ rɑ n mɑɑ kɑnɑru mɔ̀ sɑnnu.
A ɡeɑ kĩ mɑ ɑ kɔ̃sɑ tusɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ Gusunɔ wi u sɑ̃ɑ wunɛn Yinni u nun ɡɔsɑ. U mɑɑ nun nuku dobu wɛ̃ ye u kɑ nun ɑye bɛɛrɛɡiru wɛ̃ te tɑ wunɛn kpɑɑsibuɡinu kpɑ̃ɑru kere.”
Wiyɑ derɑ bɑ Yɑkɔbu, Yohɑnun mɔɔ mwɑ bɑ ɡo kɑ tɑkobi.
Adɑmɑ ɑ hɑnduniɑn ɡɑri kɑnkɑmɡii suurio, domi yi rɑ tɔmbu dɛsirɑsiewɑ n tomɑ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃run di.
Bɑɑwure wi u win beruse tusɑ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɔn ɡowo. Bɛɛn tii i mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ tɔn ɡowo ɡoo sɑri wi u wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe mɔ.
Ye bɑ sɔndu wunɑ bɑ kpɑ, Yesu u Simɔɔ Piɛɛ bikiɑ u nɛɛ, Simɔɔ, Yohɑnun bii, ɑ mɑn kĩ n beni kpuroɡiru kere? Mɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni, ɑ yɛ̃ mɑ nɑ nun kĩ. Mɑ Yesu u nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ nɛn yɑ̃ɑ binu nɔɔrio.
Hunde u rɑ ɡoo kɛ̃ru wɛ̃ u kɑ tɔmbu bwisi kɛ̃, kpɑ u ɡoo kɛ̃ru wɛ̃ u kɑ ɡɑri ɡere kɑ yɛ̃ru.
Ye bɑ dɑ mi nɔn mɛɛruse, Yosɛfu u tii win mɑɑbu tubusiɑ, mɑ Eɡibitin sunɔ u mɑɑ Yosɛfun dusibu ɡiɑ.
Nɡe mɛ Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡerumɔ, “Wi u kĩ u wɑ̃ɑ ɡeeru di, kpɑ u n nuku dobu mɔ tɔ̃ru bɑɑtere, u kɔ̃sɑn ɡerubu de kpɑ u win nɔɔ kpĩ kɑ weesu.
Nɑɑnɛ dokeo be kpuro bɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɔɔ mɑm mɑm. Goo sɑri wi u ɡeruɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ ni u mɔ wiɡinɑ, bɑ ye kpuro mɛnnɑwɑ bɑ mɔ sɑnnu.
Domi ɡɑri yi yi kpuro kere yiyɑ nɑ bɛɛ nɔmu sɔndiɑ yi nɛn tii nɑ mwɑ. Yiyɑ mini. Kirisi u ɡu bɛsɛn torɑnun sɔ̃ nɡe mɛ Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡerumɔ.
Bɑ mɑɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbun yɛm kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobuɡum wɑ wunɛ sɔɔ kɑ be kpuron yɛm ɡesi be bɑ ɡo hɑnduniɑ kpuro sɔɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ tɔn tuko be, bɑ ɡɑri yi nuɑ, ben nukurɑ dorɑ, mɑ bɑ Yinnin ɡɑri siɑrɑ. Mɑ be Gusunɔ u rɑɑ ɡɔsɑ wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpen sɔ̃, bɑ nɑɑnɛ doke.
Wi u ɡɑri yini kpuro ɡeruɑ u yi sirewɑ u nɛɛ, mɛyɑ, u sisi u ǹ tɛɛmɔ. Ami, ɑ nɑ Yinni Yesu.
I n dɑ ko ye i ɡiɑ kɑ ye i mwɑ kɑ ye i nuɑ nɛn min di, kɑ ye i wɑ nɑ kuɑ. Sɑnɑm mɛyɑ Gusunɔ wi u bɔri yɛndu wɛ̃ɛmɔ u ko n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɛɛ. ben kɛ̃run sɔ̃
I ku nùn ɡɑrisi nɡe yibɛrɛ, ɑdɑmɑ i nùn swɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsio mɛro bisi bisikum.
I n tii sɛ kpɑ ɡoo u ku rɑɑ bɛɛ yinɑ mwɑ kɑ win yɛ̃ru ɡɑru kɑ tɑki dibu. Sɔ̃ɔsi ten bweseru tɑ nɑɑmɔwɑ sɑɑ tɔmbun deemɑɑn di kɑ mɑɑ hɑnduniɑn bũnu, n ǹ mɔ Kirisin min di.
Nɡe mɛyɑ nɑ ye nɑ nɑɑ ɡire dukɑ swĩi n kɑ ɑre yi wɑ yi Gusunɔ u sun sokue wɔllɔ sɑɑ Yesu Kirisin min di.
Yesu Kirisi wi, u win tii wɛ̃ bɛsɛn sɔ̃ u kɑ sun yɑkiɑ sɑɑ kom kɔ̃sum kpuron di, kpɑ u kɑ sun ko tɔn dɛɛrobu be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ wi tɔnɑɡibu be bɑ mɑɑ hɑniɑ mɔ bu kɑ sɔm ɡeenu ko.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, bɑɑwure wi u nɛn ɡɑri swɑɑ dɑki, mɑ u wi u mɑn ɡɔrimɑ nɑɑnɛ doke, yɛ̃ro wɑ̃ɑru mɔ te tɑ ku rɑ kpe. U ǹ mɑɑ sisi siri yerɔ, ɑdɑmɑ u ɡɔɔ sɑrɑri u duɑ wɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ.
Wɔllun ɡɔrɑdo wi u kɑ mɑn ɡɑri kuɑ u yĩirutiɑ wurɑɡiɑ nɛni u kɑ wuu ɡe yĩire kɑ ɡen kɔnnɔsu kɑ ɡen ɡbɑ̃rɑru.
Kɑm kobɑ bɑ koo kɑ wiru ɡo, domi ben nukurɑ tɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben yinni. Ye n weenɛ n bu sekuru ko yerɑ bɑ kɑ woo kɑnɑmɔ. Hɑnduniɑ yen ɡɑ̃ɑnu tɔnɑwɑ bɑ bwisikumɔ.
N ǹ mɑɑ weenɛ yɛ̃ro u n sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeo kpɑo, ye n koo de u n tii ɡɑ̃ɑmɔ kpɑ u tɑɑrɛ wɑ nɡe mɛ Setɑm u wɑ.

Nɛn kĩnɑsibu, nɑ rɑɑ kĩ n bɛɛ tireru yoruɑ, nɛ kɑ bɛɛn fɑɑbɑn ɡɑrin sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ wee tɛ̃ n kuɑ tilɑsi n kɑ bɛɛ tire teni yoruɑ n kɑ bɛɛ hɑniɑ koosiɑ kpɑ i kɑ ɡɑri yi i nɑɑnɛ doke sunɑ yi Gusunɔ u wiɡibu wɛ̃ nɔn teeru sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Bɑ mɔru bɑrɑ yèn sɔ̃ ɡɔro be, bɑ tɔmbu keu sɔ̃ɔsimɔ bɑ Yesun seebu ɡɔrin di kpɑrɑmɔ bi bu sɔ̃ɔsimɔ mɑ tɔmbɑ koo se ɡɔrin di.
Domi yen durum yɑ wɔllu ɡirɑri, mɑ Gusunɔ u yen kom kɔ̃sum yɑɑyɑ.
Mɑ Yesu u kpɑm wurɑ Kɑnɑɔ Gɑlilen temɔ, mi u nim ɡɔsiɑ tɑm. Durɔ ɡoo mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, sunɔn ɑsɑkpɔbu sɔɔ wìn bii u bɑrɔ Kɑpenɑmuɔ.
I ku de bɛɛn hɑniɑ yu kɑɑrɑ. I n Yinni sɑ̃ɑmɔ kɑ kĩru.
I nùn kĩ bɑɑ mɛ i ǹ nùn wɑɑre. I nùn nɑɑnɛ doke bɑɑ mɛ i ǹ ɡinɑ nùn wɑ. Mɑ i nuku doo bɑkɑbu mɔ bi bu ǹ kɑ nɔɔ ɡerurɔ.
Sɑ yɛ̃ mɑ sɑ kɑ nùn mɑninɛ, win tii mɑɑ kɑ sun mɑninɛ domi u sun win Hunde Dɛɛro kɑ̃.
Wekeru ɡɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, te tɑ tɑm mɔmmɔm yibɑ. Mɑ bɑ swɛɛsu wɑsɑ tɑm mɔmmɔm mɛ sɔɔ, bɑ bɛri isɔpun dɛkɑɔ bɑ kɑ susi win nɔɔwɔ.
Geemɑ u sun wɔrɑ sɑɑ yɑm wɔ̃kurun dɑm di mɑ u sun sinɑsiɑ mi win Bii kĩnɑsi u bɑndu dii.
Nɛɡibu, nɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ i n dɑ n tii sɛ kɑ be bɑ kɑrɑnɑɑ dokemɔ, kɑ ye n koo bɛɛ wɔrumɑsiɑ. I dɛsiro ben min di, domi bɑ sɔ̃ɔsiru sikimɔwɑ te i nuɑ kɔ.
Ǹ n nɔɔribun nɑ, su ko kɑ nuku tiɑ. Wi u sɑ̃ɑ sɔ̃ɔsio, u win sɔ̃ɔsibu yibio.
Sɑɑ ye, yɑ̀ n tunumɑ, i ǹ ko mɑn ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑnu bikiɑ. Kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, bɑɑyere ye i Bɑɑbɑ kɑnɑ kɑ nɛn yĩsiru, u koo bɛɛ kɛ̃.

Bɑ wuu ɡen ɡbɑ̃rɑrun kpɛɛkpɛɛku burɑru kuɑ kɑ kpee ɡobiɡinu. Kpee nin ɡbiikirɑ ni nu nɔni swɑ̃ɑru mɔ, nin yiruseru ni nu nɔni booɡu mɔ, itɑseru ni nu nɔni bwese bwesekɑ ɡɛɛ mɔ, nnɛseru ni nu nɔni wuru beku mɔ.
Nɡe mɛyɑ bɑɑwure wi u ɡeɑn kobu yɛ̃ mɑ u kun kue, u torɑwɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛyɑ nɔɔ ɡɑɡɑ mɑɑ nɔɔrɑ sɑɑ sinɑ kitɑru ɡiɑn di ɡɑ nɛɛ, i Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Yinni siɑro bɛɛ win sɔm kowobu kpuro, bɛɛ be i nùn nɑsie, bɑkɑ kɑ buu.
Mɑ sɑ kpɑsɑ wɔri mɔ̀ tɛ̃ kuu teni sɔɔ, domi sɑ kĩ ɡem kɑ ɡem su bɛsɛn wɔllun wɑ̃ɑ yee te du.
I de bɑɑwure u win tiin kookoosu yĩiyɑ kpɑ u wɑ si sɔɔ, ye u koo kɑ woo kɑnɑ, ɑdɑmɑ u ku woo kɑnɑ mɑ u ɡoo keren sɔ̃.
Goo ù n bwisikɑ u wɑ mɑ ye u win bii wɔndiɑ kuɑmmɛ yɑ ǹ bɛɛrɛ mɔ, mɑ wɔndiɑ wi, u ye, u de u ko nɡe mɛ u kĩ, u de bu nùn kurɔ kpɑɑru suɑ. N ǹ torɑru.
Bɑ koo bɛɛ ɡirɑ sɑɑ mɛnnɔ yerun di. Sɑɑ yɑ mɑm sisi ye bɑɑwure wi u bɛɛ ɡoomɔ u ko n tɑmɑɑ u Gusunɔ sɔmburu kuɑmmɛwɑ.

Yen biru, nɑ kpɑm yĩreru ɡɑru wɑ Gusunɔ wɔllɔ, tɑ kpɑ̃ mɑ tɑ bɛrum mɔ. Ye nɑ wɑ wee. Wɔllun ɡɔrɑdobɑ nɔɔbɑ yiru bɑ ɡbee swɑ̃ɑnu nɔɔbɑ yiru nɛni. Niyɑ nu sɑ̃ɑ ɡbee swɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ɑkinu, domi ni sɔɔrɑ Gusunɔn mɔru yɑ koo kɑ kpe.
Mɑ Yesu u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, ǹ n ɡɑri kɔ̃sin nɑ nɑ ɡeruɑ, ɑ yi ɡeruo bɑɑwure u nɔ. Ǹ n mɑɑ ɡem nɑ nɑ ɡeruɑ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ mɑn soomɔ.
Wunɛ mɑɑ, nɛn sɔm kowosi nɑɑnɛɡii, nɑ nun kɑnɑmɔ ɑ kurɔ be somiɔ. Bɑ sunɑ Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑn sɔ̃ kɑ nɛ sɑnnu, kɑ mɑɑ Kelemɑ kɑ sere nɛn sɔm kowosi be bɑ tie, bèn yĩsɑ yoruɑ wɑ̃ɑrun tireru sɔɔ.
Domi bɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobu kɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbun yɛm yɑri, mɑ ɑ bu yɛm wɛ̃ bu nɔ. Mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ weenɛ.
Aɑwo, n ǹ mɛ. Bɛsɛ bè sɔɔ torɑrɑ kun mɑɑ dɑm mɔ, ɑmɔnɑ sɑ ko n mɑɑ kɑ wɑ̃ɑ ten dɑm nɔmuɔ.
Mɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye yɑ rɑɑ wɑsi mɑ yɑ kun mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ, yen tiiwɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ sunɔ nɔɔbɑ itɑse, u yɑrɑwɑ nɔɔbɑ yiru yen min di mɑ u dɔɔ kɑm koo yerɔ.
Adɑmɑ mbɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri yi ɡerumɔ. Yi nɛɛwɑ, “A yoo wi ɡiro kɑ win bii sɑnnu, domi win bii wi, u ǹ tubi dimɔ kɑ tii mɔwɔn bii sɑnnu.”
Adɑmɑ be bɑ kĩ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ ɑrumɑniɡibu, beyɑ bɑ rɑ wɔri kɔkiribu sɔɔ, kpɑ wiirɑrun kĩru kɑ kĩi ɡɔburu tu bu yinɑ mwɑ bɑ n kɑ dɔɔ kɑm kobu kɑ kpeerɑsiɑbu sɔɔ.
Kɔbi wɔku te nɑ mɑɑ wɑ mi kɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye, ye kpurowɑ yɑ koo kurɔ tɑnɔ wi tusi. Bɑ koo ye u mɔ kpuro suɑ kpɑ bu nùn deri tereru. Bɑ koo win yɑɑ tem kpɑ bu ye yɑ tie dɔ̃ɔ mɛni muku muku.
Adɑmɑ wi u Gusunɔ kĩ, Gusunɔ u yɛ̃ro yɛ̃.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, bɛsɛ Yuubɑ sɑ ɡɑbu sɑnɔ kerewɑ? Aɑwo, bɑɑ fiiko. Domi sɑ sɔ̃ɔsi kɔ mɑ bɛsɛ Yuubɑ kɑ tɔn tukobu bɛsɛ kpuro sɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ torɑrun dɑm nɔmɑɔ.
Dɔmɑ terɑ bɑ bwɑ̃ɑroku kuɑ ɡe ɡɑ kɑ nɑɑ buu weenɛ, mɑ bɑ ɡu yɑ̃kuru koosi. Mɑ ben nukurɑ dorɑ ben nɔmɑn sɔmburun sɔ̃.

Hɑnduniɑn tɔmbu be bɑ tie, be bɑ kun ɡu kɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ sɛ̃sɔɡii ni, bɑ ǹ ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsie, bu ye bɑ kɑ nɔmɑ kuɑn sɑ̃ɑru deri, kɑ Setɑm bwɑ̃ɑbu kɑ bũu ni bɑ kuɑ kɑ wurɑ kɑ sii ɡeesu kɑ sii ɡɑndu kɑ kpenu kɑ dɑ̃ɑ, ni nu kun kpɛ̃ nu ɡɑri nɔ, nu ǹ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ nu yɑm wɑ, nu sere sĩ.
Sɑ Yinnin bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃. Yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ tɔmbu kɔkirimɔ. Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ u sun yɛ̃ sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ, nɑ mɑɑ yĩiyɔ mɑ bɛɛn tii i sun yɛ̃ bɛɛn ɡɔ̃rusɔ.

Geemɑ, bɛsɛ kpuro sɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe be. Bɛsɛn ɡɔ̃ru kĩru sɔɔrɑ sɑ rɑ n sĩimɔ mɑ sɑ bɑɑyere kuɑ ye bɛsɛn wɑsi kĩ kɑ ye sɑ bwisikɑ. Bɛsɛn mɑrumɑrɑ tɑ derɑ sɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ koo Gusunɔn mɔru wɑ nɡe be bɑ tie.
Kɑ kpɑm ɡɑri dɑbinɑ Piɛɛ u bu seedɑ diiyɑ mɑ u bu dɑm kɑ̃ u nɛɛ, i tii wunɔ tɛ̃n tɔn kɔ̃sobun min di kpɑ i fɑɑbɑ wɑ.
Domi ì n bɛɛn wɑsin kĩru mɔ̀ i ko ɡbi, ɑdɑmɑ ì n bɛɛn wɑsin kĩrun kookoosu deri kɑ Hunde Dɛɛron somiru i ko n wɑ̃ɑ.
Nɡe mɛ bɑ yoruɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri sɔɔ bɑ nɛɛ, “Bɑɑwure wi u nùn nɑɑnɛ doke, u ǹ sekuru wɑsi.”
Gbiikɑɑ nɑ Gusunɔ nɛn Yinni siɑrɑmɔ Yesu Kirisin min di bɛɛ kpuron sɔ̃ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebun ɡɑri mɔ̀ hɑnduniɑ kpuro sɔɔ.
Bɛsɛɡibu, bɛɛ be Gusunɔ u kĩ, sɑ yɛ̃ mɑ u bɛɛ ɡɔsɑ wiɡibu.
Ye n kpuro kere, yerɑ i hɑniɑ koowo i n kĩɑnɛ domi kĩru tɑ torɑ dɑbinu wukirimɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ ɡɔ̃ru doke su kɑ Itɑlin tem dɑ kɑ ɡoo nimkuu, bɑ Pɔlu kɑ pirisɔm ɡɑbu Yuliu nɔmu sɔndiɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ Romun tɑbu kowo wuuru ɡɑrun tɔnwero te bɑ sokumɔ tem yɛ̃roɡiru.

Bɑ Mɔwisi Gusunɔn sɔm kowon womu mɔ̀ kɑ mɑɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛnduɡuu bɑ mɔ̀, “Yinni Gusunɔ dɑm kpuroɡii, wunɛn sɔmɑ kpɑ̃, yɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ mɑɑmɑɑki. Wunɑ ɑ tem kpuron sinɑ boko. Wunɛn swɛɛ yi sɑ̃ɑ ɡem, yi dɛnde.
Nɡe mɛ bii wɛ̃ɛnu rɑ bɔm kɑ̃, i hunden dĩɑ dɛɛrɑnu kĩɔ ni nu sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri kpɑ i kɑ kpɛ̃ɑ fɑɑbɑn swɑɑ sɔɔ.

Yen biru nɑ kpɑm nɔɔ ɡɑɡu nuɑ wɔllun di ɡɑ nɛɛ, n yeni yoruo, doo nɔɔruɡibɑ be bɑ ɡbimɔ sɑɑ tɛ̃n di Yinnin nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ. Gusunɔn Hunde ɡerumɔ u mɔ̀, mɛyɑ ni, bɑ koo wɛ̃rɑ, domi ben sɔm ɡeerun ɑre koo bu swĩi.
Wi Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ u ɡɑrisi win sɑ̃ɔ ɡeon tii, wiyɑ wi u rɑ ɡobekubɑ kɑ ɡɔminibu nɔɔri ben nɔni swɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ kpɑ u tii nɛnɛ hɑnduniɑn disinun di.
Nɑ bɛɛ yeni sɔ̃ɔmɔwɑ kpɑ ɡoo u ku rɑɑ bɛɛ nɔni wɔ̃ke kɑ nɔɔ dobu.

Mɑ nɑ nuɑ tɑkɑ koorɑ kpuro, ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ wɔllɔ kɑ temɔ, kɑ tem sɔɔwɔ, kɑ nim wɔ̃ku sɔɔ, ye yɑ wɑ̃ɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ kpuro ɡesi yɑ nɔɔɡiru sue yɑ mɔ̀, wi u sɔ̃ sinɑ kitɑrɔ kɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm te, beyɑ bɑ siɑrɑbu kɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ yiiko kɑ sinɑndu mɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Mɑ ɡɔrɑdo yiruse u win kɔbɑ so. Mɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ ni nu sɑ̃ɑre nɡe ɡuu bɑkɑru te tɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑmɔ, bɑ nu kɑsɑ kuɑ nim wɔ̃ku sɔɔ. Nim wɔ̃kun bɔnu itɑse yɑ ɡɔsirɑ yɛm,
Bɑ nùn ɡɑwɑ bɑ yɑrɑ wuun di, mɑ bɑ nùn kpenu kɑsukum wɔri. Tɔn be, bɑ ben kumboorosu pwetɑ bɑ yi ɑluwɑɑsi ɡoon mi wi bɑ rɑ nɛɛ Sɔɔlu.
Mɑ yi mɑɑ nɛɛ, “Bɛɛ bwesenu kpuro, i Yinni Gusunɔ siɑro. Bɛɛ hɑnduniɑɡibu kpuro, i nùn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛyɔ.”
Domi wiyɑ kpuron wiru, win min diyɑ kpuro nɑɑmɔ, mɑ kpuro wɑ̃ɑ win sɔ̃. Wiɡiɑ yiiko sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Ami.
Yen sisiru Yohɑnu u Yesu wɑ u sisi win mi mɑ u nɛɛ, i Gusunɔn Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛndu mɛɛrio te tɑ hɑnduniɑɡibun durum wuuwɑ tɑ kɑ doonɔ.
Nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɑɑbuwɑ Rɑhɑbu kurɔ tɑnɔ wi, u ǹ ɡu kɑ be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ mɛm nɔɔwɛ sɑnnu yèn sɔ̃ u Isirelibɑn ɡɔrobu dɑm koosiɑ kɑ nuku tiɑ.
Gbɛnɔ u rɑ nɛwɑ u kɑ ɡbɛni u ɡo kpɑ u sɑnku. Adɑmɑ nɛ nɑ nɑwɑ yɑ̃ɑnu nu n kɑ wɑ̃ɑru mɔ, kpɑ nu n tu mɔ mɑm mɑm.
Adɑmɑ bɛsɛ, Gusunɔn wɔllɑ tɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn wuu. Min diyɑ sɑ bɛsɛn Fɑɑbɑɡii Yinni Yesu Kirisi mɑrɑ u nɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, i n wurɑnɑmɔ nɡe mɛ Kirisi u bɛɛ wurɑ kpɑ i kɑ Gusunɔ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
A kɑ bu doo kpɑ i tii dɛɛrɑsiɑ sɑnnu kpɑ ɑ ben kɔnɑn ɡobi kɔsiɑ. Nɡe mɛyɑ bɑɑwure u ko n kɑ yɛ̃ mɑ ye bɑ nuɑ wunɛn sɔ̃, n ǹ ɡem, sɑnɑm mɛ, bɑ koo wɑ mɑ wunɛn tii ɑ Mɔwisin woodɑ swĩi.
Mɑ u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɑnɡoɡibun bɑɑbɑ be n ǹ mɔ bɑnɡo tɔnɑ bɑ mɔ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ mɑɑ win nɑɑnɛ dokebun yirɑ swĩi, bi u mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u ǹ ɡinɑ bɑnɡo kue.
Mɑ bɑ tɛtɛ tobɑ mɑ Mɑtiɑsi u tɛtɛ di mɑ bɑ nùn doke ɡɔrobu wɔkurɑ tiɑ yen wuuru sɔɔ.
U nɛɛ, “Doo nɔɔruɡiiwɑ wìn torɑnu bɑ suuru kuɑ, mɑ bɑ win kɔ̃sɑ ɡo.
Seedɑ diobu yiru ye, bɑ sɑ̃ɑ olifin dɑ̃nu yiru ye, kɑ dɑbunu yiru ni nu yɔ̃ Gusunɔ tem kpuron Yinnin wuswɑɑɔ.
I de i n nuki sɑnkire kpɑ i n ɡɔɔ wooru sɔ̃ kpɑ i swĩ. I de bɛɛn yɛ̃ɛsu su ɡɔsiɑ swĩi kpɑ bɛɛn nuku dobu bu ɡɔsiɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu.
Nɛn kĩnɑsi ɑ ku kom kɔ̃sum sɑɑri mɑ n kun mɔ kom ɡem. Wi u ɡeɑ mɔ̀ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔɡii, ɑdɑmɑ wi u kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ u ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃wɑ.

Yen biruwɑ bɑ nùn bɑnɡo kuɑ ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ yĩreru mɑ Gusunɔ u nùn ɡem wɛ̃. Bɑ nùn ɡem mɛ wɛ̃ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ u ǹ ɡinɑ bɑnɡo kue. Nɡe mɛyɑ u kɑ kuɑ bɑnɡo sɑriruɡibu kpuron bɑɑbɑ be bɑ nɑɑnɛ doke, mɑ bɑ bu ɡem wɛ̃.
Domi wi u ɡu u yɑkiɑrɑ torɑrun nɔmɑn di.
Bɑɑdommɑwɑ sɑ rɑ n Yesun ɡɔɔ sɔɔwɑ bɛsɛn wɑsi sɔɔ kpɑ win wɑ̃ɑru tu mɑɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔsirɑ bɛsɛn wɑsi sɔɔ.
Be bɑ tie kpuro ben tii tɔnɑn bwisikunɑ bɑ mɔ̀, n ǹ kɑ Yesu Kirisiɡinu.
Nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɑɑbuwɑ Sɑɑrɑɑn tii mɑɑ dɑm wɑ u kɑ ɡurɑ suɑ bɑɑ mɛ u yen sɑɑ doonɑ. U yɛ̃ mɑ Gusunɔ wi u nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ u sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛɡii.
Wi u mɑn ɡɔrimɑn ɡɔ̃ru kĩi te wee, n ku rɑ ɡoo kɔ̃ bɑɑ tɔn turo be u mɑn wɛ̃ sɔɔ, ɑdɑmɑ n kɑ be kpuro seeyɑwɑ ɡɔrin di sɑnɑm dɑ̃ɑkim sɔɔ.

kɑ mɛ, bɛsɛn mi, Gusunɔ turowɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Wiyɑ sɑ̃ɑ Bɑɑbɑ wìn min di ɡɑ̃ɑnu kpuro nu nɑɑmɔ. Win sɔ̃nɑ sɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Yinni turowɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ. Wiyɑ Yesu Kirisi wìn min di ɡɑ̃ɑnu kpuro nu koorɑ. Win sɑɑbuwɑ sɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑru mɔ.
Adɑmɑ tɛ̃, ye Timɔte u wurɑmɑ bɛɛn min di, u sun bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ bɛɛn kĩrun bɑɑru ɡeɑ sɔ̃ɔwɑ. U sun sɔ̃ɔwɑ mɑ i rɑ n sun yɑɑye kɑ kĩru mɑ i kĩ i sun wɑ ɡem ɡem nɡe mɛ bɛsɛn tii sɑ kĩ su bɛɛ wɑ.
Mɑ sɑnɑm mɛ kpɑrobun wiruɡii koo kurɑmɑ, i ko ɑre yiikoɡii mwɑ yìn burɑm kun kpeemɔ.
Yèn sɔ̃ sɑ yĩiyɔ bini mɔ, yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ ɡɑri ɡerumɔ kɑ toro sindu.
Adɑmɑ mɑrumɑrɑ tɔn be, bɑ kɑ yeni mɔ̀ nɡe yɛɛ yi yi wɑ̃ɑ bu kɑ mwɑ bu ɡon sɔ̃. Ye bɑ kun tubɑ yerɑ bɑ wɔmmɔ. Bɑ koo mɑɑ kɑm kowɑ nɡe yɛɛ yi.
U ǹ yeni ɡerumɔ sɑ̃ɑrobun wɔnwɔndun sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ yèn sɔ̃ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɡbɛnɔ. Wiyɑ u rɑ n mɑɑ ɡobin bɔɔru nɛni, kpɑ u n yi ɡbɛnimɔ.
Mɑ bɛsɛ sɑ kĩi te yɛ̃, sɑ mɑɑ tu nɑɑnɛ doke te Gusunɔ u mɔ bɛsɛ sɔɔ. Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑwɑ kĩrun nuuru. Bɑɑwure wi u tɔnun kĩru mɔ u kɑ Gusunɔ mɑninɛ, Gusunɔ mɑɑ kɑ nùn mɑninɛ.

Nɑɑnɛ dokeobu be bɑ rɑɑ yɑrinɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuro nɔni swɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃ te tɑ seewɑ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ Etiɛni ɡo, ben ɡɑbɑ dɑ sere tem mɛ bɑ sokumɔ Fɛnisi kɑ mɑɑ tem bureru ɡɑru sɔɔ te bɑ sokumɔ Sipu, kɑ mɑɑ wuu ɡɑɡun mi ɡe bɑ sokumɔ Antiɔsi, bɑ Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ kpɑrɑmɔ, Yuubɑ tɔnɑwɑ bɑ sɔ̃ɔmɔ.
Geemɑ, Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑru tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɑrumɑni bɑkɑ, ye tɔnu u mɔ yɑ̀ n kɑ nùn nɛrenɑ.
Bɑ ye swɑɑ kɑ̃ yu kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobu tɑbu ko kpɑ yu bu tɑbu di. Bɑ mɑɑ ye yiiko wɛ̃ bweseru bɑɑteren wɔllɔ, kɑ tɔmbu kpuro kɑ bɑrum bɑɑmɛre kɑ tem bɑɑmɛre.
Nɡe ɑrufɑɑni yerɑ̀ n mɔ ì n kɑ soberu tɛmɑnɑ torɑ te i kuɑn sɔ̃. Adɑmɑ ì n nɔni swɑ̃ɑru wɑ ɡeɑ ye i kuɑn sɔ̃, mɑ i tɛmɑnɑ, siɑrɑbɑ Gusunɔn mi.

Yen sɔ̃nɑ Kirisi u sɑ̃ɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛ kpɑɑrun swɑɑ sɔmɔ. Win min diyɑ be Gusunɔ u sokɑ bɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ ni nu ku rɑ kpe tubi dimɔ ni Gusunɔ u bu nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ. Bɑ koo kpĩ mɛ, yèn sɔ̃ ɡɔɔn ɡɑri duɑ sɔɔ, wi u tɔmbu yɑkiɑmɔ ben torɑnun di ni bɑ kuɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛ ɡururun sɑɑ sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑ sɑ ko ɡere. Sɑ ko n dɑ n torɑmɔwɑ durom mu kɑ sosi?
I ku mɑɑ de sekurun ɡɑri ǹ kun mɛ wiirɑ ɡɑri ǹ kun mɛ ɡɑri kɑnkɑm yu yɑri bɛɛn nɔɔ sɔɔn di domi n ǹ kɑ bɛɛ weenɛ, ɑdɑmɑ i de i n Gusunɔ tɑkɑru mɔ̀.

Nɑ mɛɛrɑ mɑ nɑ wɑ dum bɛrɔ wuruwɑ. Wi u ye sɔni, win yĩsirɑ Gɔɔ, mɑ ɡɔribun wɑ̃ɑ yerɑ nùn swĩi. Beyɑ bɑ yiiko wɛ̃ bu kɑ hɑnduniɑn bɔnu nnɛse ɡo kɑ tɑkobi, kɑ ɡɔ̃ɔru, kɑ bɑrɑnu, kɑ mɑɑ ɡbeeku yɛɛ yi yi wɑ̃ɑ tem mɛ sɔɔ.

Yen sɔ̃, kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebun bɑɑwɑ bɑ koo nɔɔ mwɛɛ te wurɑ tu kɑ ko durom, kpɑ Aburɑhɑmun bweseru kpuro tu kɑ kpĩ tu tu wurɑ. N ǹ mɔ be bɑ woodɑ mɔ tɔnɑ ɑdɑmɑ kɑ mɑɑ be bɑ nɑɑnɛ dokewɑ nɡe Aburɑhɑmu wi u sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛ kpuron bɑɑbɑ.
Romuɡibɑ mɑn siri mɑ bɑ kĩ bu mɑn kɑrɑ yèn sɔ̃ bɑ ǹ tɑɑrɛ ɡɑɑ wɑ nɛ sɔɔ ye yɑ kɑ ɡɔɔ weenɛ.
Nɡe mɛyɑ n ǹ sɑ̃ɑ ɡoon kĩrun bɑɑ, n ǹ mɑɑ ɡoon sɔmburun bɑɑ, ɑdɑmɑ Gusunɔn wɔnwɔndun bɑɑwɑ.
Su ku rɑ mɑɑ kurɔ dɑmɑru ko nɡe mɛ ben ɡɑbu bɑ kuɑ, mɑ ben nɔrɔbun subɑ yɛndɑ itɑ (23.000) bɑ kɑm kuɑ sɔ̃ɔ teerun sɔ̃ɔ.
ɑdɑmɑ nɛn wɑsin doo dookɑ sɔɔ nɑ woodɑ tukɑ wɑɑmɔ ye yɑ sɑnnɑmɔ kɑ nɛn bwisikunu. Mɑ yɑ mɑn mɔ̀ torɑ ten dɛso te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛn wɑsin doo dookɑ sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, su Kirisin ɡɑrin torubu deri kpɑ su dɑ wuswɑɑɔ su kɑ ko tɔn yebunu. Su ku mɑɑ ɡɑri yin kpɛɛkpɛɛku surɑ, ɡerɑ ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑbu kookoo kɑmɡisun di kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu Gusunɔ sɔɔ,
Yen sɔ̃, i ku de ɡoo u nùn ɡɛm, ɑdɑmɑ i nùn somiɔ win sɑnum sɔɔ u kɑ nɑ nɛn mi kɑ ɑlɑfiɑ, domi sɑ nùn mɑrɑ nɛ kɑ bɛsɛɡibu sɑnnu.
Nɛɡibu, ɑre yerɑ̀ n mɔ, ɡoo ù n ɡeruɑ u nɛɛ, u nɑɑnɛ dokebu mɔ, kpɑ u kun bin kookoosu mɔ̀. Nɑɑnɛ doke bi, bu koo yɛ̃ro fɑɑbɑ ko?
Sɑnɑm mɛ sɔɔrɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɡibu ɡɑbɑ bikiɑ bɑ nɛɛ, n ǹ wi bɑ kɑsu bu ɡo wiyɑ mi?
Ye u yeni ɡeruɑ u kpɑ, yerɑ u bu wɛ̃sie mɑ u nɛɛ, i Hunde Dɛɛro mɔɔ.
Bɑ ǹ swɑɑ yɛ̃ ye Gusunɔ u rɑ kɑ tɔnu ɡem wɛ̃, mɑ bɑ swɑɑ kɑsu bu kɑ ben tiin ɡem yɑrɑ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ ǹ Gusunɔn ɡem swɑɑ wiru kpĩiyɛ.
Wi u Gusunɔn Bii nɑɑnɛ doke, u seedɑ ye mɔ win tii sɔɔ. Wi u kun nɑɑnɛ doke, u Gusunɔ wee kowo kuɑwɑ yèn sɔ̃ u ǹ seedɑ wure ye u win Bii diiyɑ.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, bɑɑwure wi u mɑn nɑɑnɛ doke, sɔmɑ ye nɑ mɔ̀, yeyɑ yɛ̃ro koo mɑɑ ko. U koo mɑm sɔmɑ ko ye yɑ yeni kere domi nɑ dɔɔ nɛn Bɑɑbɑn mi.
A mɑɑ yobu sɔ̃ɔwɔ bu ben yinnibu wiru kpĩiyɑ kpuro sɔɔ, kpɑ bu ko ye yɑ koo bu wɛ̃re bu ku kɑ bu sikirinɑ.
I n tii sɛ kpɑ bɛɛn ɡoo u ku rɑɑ Gusunɔn durom biɑ. I n tii sɛ kpɑ mɔru ye i yi ɡɔ̃ruɔ yu ku rɑɑ se nɡe kpii pɔturɑ yu wɑhɑlɑ doke, kpɑ yen dɛ̃ɛ yi tɔn dɑbinu bɑbɑ.
Yen biru n weenɛ be bɑ ǹ nɑɑnɛ doke bɑ n yɛ̃ro win seedɑ ɡeɑ dimɔ, kpɑ bu ku nùn ɡɛm, kpɑ u ku rɑɑ mɑɑ Setɑm yinɑ wɔri.
Bɛsɛn bɑɑwure u kɛ̃ru mwɑ nɡe mɛ Kirisi u kĩ,
Sɑnɑm mɛyɑ ɡɔrɑdo yiruse u win yoruku wisi nim wɔ̃ku sɔɔ. Nim mɛ, mu ɡɔsiɑ nɡe tɔn ɡorun yɛm, mɑ hunde koni bɑɑyere yɑ ɡu nim mɛ sɔɔ.
N ǹ mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ bɛɛ yɔ̃re tɔnɑ, i kɑ bu tɔn ɡeeru sɔ̃ɔsi. I Gusunɔn kĩru koowo kɑ bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ru kpuro nɡe Kirisin yobu.
Adɑmɑ i bu wisio tɛɛru kɑ bɛɛrɛ. I de bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ru ɡɑ n dɛɛre kpɑ be bɑ bɛɛn dɑɑ ɡeɑ ye yɑ wee Kirisin min di kɔ̃sɑ ɡerusimɔ bu sekuru wɑ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ bɛɛ nɔɔ mɑni.
Nɛn Bɑɑbɑn ɡɔ̃ru kĩi terɑ, bɑɑwure wi u Bii wɑ, mɑ u nùn nɑɑnɛ doke, u n wɑ̃ɑru mɔ te tɑ ku rɑ kpe. Kon mɑɑ yɛ̃ro seeyɑ ɡɔrin di sɑnɑm dɑ̃ɑkim sɔɔ.
Mii mii Yinnin ɡɔrɑdo u nɑ u Herodu so mɑ kɔkɔnu nɑ nu win wɑsi di mɑ u ɡu yèn sɔ̃ wi tɔnu, u Gusunɔn yiiko mwɑ.
Su Gusunɔ siɑrɑ, bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisin Bɑɑbɑ wi u rɑ tɔmbu wɔnwɔndu kue, kpɑ u bu dɑm kɛ̃ sɑɑ bɑɑyere.
Wee, ɡɑbɑ ɡɛrɑ sɑɑ ɡɑri yin min di mɑ bɑ kɔ̃ɔrɑ sikirinɔ kɑmɡisu sɔɔ.
Domi nɑ ǹ Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑn sekuru mɔ̀. Gusunɔn dɑmɑ mɛ mu rɑ bɑɑwure fɑɑbɑ ko wi u nɑɑnɛ doke, ɡbiikɑɑ Yuubɑ, yen biru tɔn tukobu.
Domi ɡoo kun kpɛ̃ u mɑɑ kpɛɛkpɛɛku ɡɑɡu surɑ mɑ n kun mɔ ɡe bɑ sure, ɡeyɑ ɡɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yesu Kirisi.
Kɑ mɛ, i de durɔ bɑɑwure u n win kurɔ kĩ nɡe win tii, kpɑ kurɔ bɑɑwure u n win durɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃.
Gɑsɔ, i rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔribu bɛɛn torɑnun sɔ̃ kɑ mɑɑ yèn sɔ̃ i sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ kun bɑnɡo kue. Adɑmɑ tɛ̃ Gusunɔ u bɛɛ kuɑ wɑsobu kɑ Kirisi sɑnnu sɑnɑm mɛ u sun bɛsɛn torɑnu kpuro suuru kuɑ.
A ku hunden kɛ̃ru ɑtɑfiiru ko te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ wunɛ sɔɔ, te bɑ nun nɔmu bɛriɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbun ɡɑri sɔɔ sɑnɑm mɛ yiɡbɛ ɡuro ɡurobɑ nun nɔmɑ sɔndi wirɔ.
Yen biruwɑ nɑ wɔn kpɑɑru kɑ tem kpɑm wɑ. Wɔn ɡururu kɑ tem ɡurum bɑɑ doonɑ, nim wɔ̃ku ɡɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
I n nuku dobu mɔ sɑnɑm bɑɑmɛre sɔɔ.
Suru nɔɔbu ye sɔɔ, tɔmbɑ koo ɡɔɔ kɑsu ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ wɑsi. Bɑ koo ɡɔɔ kĩɑ ɑdɑmɑ u koo bu dukɑ suuri.
Sɑ nɑɑnɛ doke mɑ Yesu u ɡu, mɑ u kpɑm seewɑ ɡɔrin di. Yen sɔ̃, sɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ mɑ, be bɑ Yesu nɑɑnɛ doke bɑ kɑ ɡu, Gusunɔ u koo kɑ bu wurɑmɑ kɑ wi sɑnnu.
Bɑɑwure wi u wurɑ mɑ Yesu sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn Bii, Gusunɔ kɑ nùn mɑninɛ, mɑ yɛ̃ro mɑɑ kɑ Gusunɔ mɑninɛ.
Ye i ɡiɑ, yerɑ i bɛɛn dɑɑ ɡurɑ pweto ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn ɡɑsɔn wɑ̃ɑru, ye binɛ kɑnkɑm yɑ nɔni wɔ̃kuɑ yɑ kɑ kɑm kobu dɔɔ.
Nɛn tiiwɑ kɔnnɔ ɡe. Bɑɑwure wi u dumɔ sɑɑ nɛn min di wiyɑ bɑ koo fɑɑbɑ ko. U koo du, u koo mɑɑ yɑri, u koo mɑɑ dii yeru wɑ.
Bɑ ɡɑbu kpenu kɑsukɑ bɑ ɡo, bɑ ɡɑbu bɔtirɑ kpirinu yiru, bɑ ɡɑbu ɡo kɑ tɑkobi. Bɑ yɑ̃ɑ ɡɔni kɑ boo ɡɔni deewɑ bɑ kɑ bɔsi. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑrobu, bɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔrɑ, bɑ tɔ̃yɑ wɑ.
Ì n yɛ̃ mɑ Kirisi u sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɡeeɡii, i n mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ bɑɑwure wi u mɔ̀ dee dee, Kirisin biiwɑ.
N wee ye Yinni Gusunɔ sun yiire su ko. U nɛɛ, “Nɑ bɛɛ kuɑ tɔn tukobun yɑm bururɑm, kpɑ i kɑ fɑɑbɑ dɑ hɑnduniɑn ɡoonu nnɛ kpuro sɔɔ.”

Sɑ dɑɑ sekuruɡiɑ ye yɑ beruɑ potɑ sɑ kɔ̃. Sɑ ǹ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bwisi kɔ̃sin bɑɑ, sɑ ǹ mɑɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri sĩikiɑmɔ. Adɑmɑ sɑ ɡem terɑsiɑmɔwɑ kpɑsɑsɑ, kpɑ bɑɑwure u n kɑ yɛ̃ win ɡɔ̃ruɔ mɑ ɡeeɡibɑ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ.
Bɑ nùn suɑ u dɑ Gusunɔn nɔm ɡeuɔ, mɑ u Hunde Dɛɛro mwɑ Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑn mi wìn nɔɔ mwɛɛru bɑ kuɑ. Mɑ u sun nùn wɛ̃. Yerɑ ye i wɑɑmɔ kɑ ye i nɔɔmɔ tɛ̃.
mɑ i dɑɑ kpɑɑ sebuɑ. Gusunɔwɑ u bɛɛ dɑɑ kpɑɑ ye wɛ̃ i n kɑ nùn ɡiɑmɔ kpɑ i n kɑ nùn weenɑmɔ.
Ye Yesu u yeni nuɑ u nɛɛ, bɑrɑ te, tɑ ǹ ɡɔɔɡiru ɑdɑmɑ tɑ koo Gusunɔn yiiko sɔ̃ɔsi, kpɑ bu kɑ Gusunɔn Bii bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ ye, yɑ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ u rɑ tɔnu ɡem wɛ̃. Gem mɛn torubu kɑ mɛn nɔru, nɑɑnɛ dokebɑ. Nɡe mɛ bɑ yoruɑ, “Wi u kuɑ ɡemɡii nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ, u ko n wɑ̃ɑwɑ.”
Mɑ Yesu u win tiin dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru suɑ u kɑ dɑ sere ɑye ten mi, te tɑ kɑ wii koko weenɛ, ɑdɑmɑ kɑ Heberum bɑ rɑ yɑm mi sokuwɑ Gɔɔɡɔtɑ.
Sɑ kɛ̃ɛ nɛnnɛnkɑ mɔ ni nu weenɛ su dendi nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ u sun kɑ̃ win durom sɔɔ. Ǹ n Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡerubun kɛ̃run nɑ, su kɑ tu dendi nɡe mɛ bɛsɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebu nɛ.
Hunde koni ɡbiikɑɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe ɡbee sunɔ, mɑ yiruse sɑ̃ɑ nɡe nɑɑ buu. Itɑsen wuswɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe tɔnuɡiɑ, mɑ nnɛse yɑ kɑ ɡunɔ bɑkeru weenɛ te tɑ yɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i bɛɛn sɑnu sɑnusu lɑɑkɑri koowo. I ku de i n sĩimɔ nɡe be bɑ ku rɑ bwisiku, ɑdɑmɑ i n sĩimɔ kɑ lɑɑkɑri.
Domi wunɑnɑbu sɑri Yuubɑ kɑ tɔn tukobu sɔɔ. Be kpuro Yinni turowɑ bɑ mɔ. Win dukiɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ nùn sokumɔ kpuroɡiɑ.
Domi Kirisiwɑ sɑ̃ɑ woodɑn kɔkɔrɔ kpɑ bɑɑwure wi u nùn nɑɑnɛ doke u ɡem wɑ Gusunɔn mi. wi u Yinni nɑɑnɛ doke
I ku wururɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnun sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ bɑɑyere sɔɔ i n dɑ Gusunɔ kɑnɛ kɑ siɑrɑbu kpɑ i nùn bikiɑ yèn bukɑtɑ i mɔ.
Tɛ̃, yeyɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ yĩreru bɛsɛn sɔ̃ kpɑ sɑ kun mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɔ̃sɑn kĩrobu nɡe be.
Kperɑ ye, yɑ wɔru ɡe wukiɑ mɑ wiisu yɑrɑ nɡe dɔ̃ɔ bokon wiisu, mɑ sɔ̃ɔ kɑ wom tĩrɑ wɔru ɡen wii sin sɑɑbu.
Gɑri yini sɔɔ, n ǹ weenɛ ɡoo u win kpɑɑsi torɑri ǹ kun mɛ u nùn tɑki di. Sɑ bɛɛ yenin kirɔ kuɑ kɔ, sɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɑ mɑ Yinniwɑ u koo yen mɔru kɔsiɑ.
Goo ù n ɡbinnɛ kɑ Kirisi u kuɑ tɔn kpɑo. Gɑsɔn ɡɑ̃ɑnu doonɑ, wee ɡɑ̃ɑ kpɑɑnu tunumɑ.
Domi Bɑɑbɑ u win Bii kĩ, mɑ u nùn yɑbu bɑɑyere sɔ̃ɔsimɔ ye u mɔ̀. U koo nùn sɔmburu sɔ̃ɔsi te tɑ teni kere, kpɑ bɛɛ kpuro i kɑ biti ko.
Wi u rɑ rɑɑ ɡbɛni u ku mɑɑ ɡbɛni ɑdɑmɑ u doo u kɑ win nɔmɑ sɔm ɡeeru ko kpɑ u n ɡɑ̃ɑnu mɔ u kɑ sɑ̃ɑrobu somi.
Gɑ̃ɑ teenɑ nu tie, ɑ mɑn diru kɑsuo yèn sɔ̃ nɑ yĩiyɔ Gusunɔ u koo bɛɛn kɑnɑru mwɑ kpɑ u mɑn bɛɛ wesiɑ.
I ku de bu bɛɛ torɑsiɑ kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi tuku dɑbinu. Domi Gusunɔn duromɑ mu weenɛ mu n bɛɛn ɡɔ̃rusu tɑ̃sisiɑmɔ, n ǹ mɔ dĩɑnun sesenu. Be bɑ yɑbu ye kpuro swĩi bɑ ǹ yen ɑrufɑɑni ɡɑɑ wɑɑre.
Sɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ nɛɡibu, i bu bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛyɔ be bɑ sɔmburu mɔ̀ ɡem ɡem bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ, be Yinni u derɑ bɑ bɛɛ kpɑrɑmɔ mɑ bɑ bɛɛ swɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ.
Bɑ yeni ɡeruɑwɑ Yuubɑn bɛrum sɔ̃. Domi Yuubɑ bɑ nɔɔ tiɑ kuɑ kɔ mɑ bɑɑwure wi u wurɑ mɑ Yesu sɑ̃ɑwɑ Kirisi wi, bɑ koo yɛ̃ro ɡirɑwɑ ben mɛnnɔ yerun di.
Bɛsɛrɑ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɑnɡoɡii ɡeebu, n ǹ mɔ be, domi sɑ Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑmɔ kɑ win Hunde, sɑ woo kɑnɑmɔ Yesu Kirisin sɔ̃, sɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɛsɛn nɑɑnɛ doke wɑsin komɑnu sɔɔ.
Win woodɑ wee, su win Bii Yesu Kirisin yĩsiru nɑɑnɛ doke, kpɑ su kĩɑnɑ nɡe mɛ u sun sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
Yen biruwɑ, nɑ kpɑm ɡbeeku yɑɑ ɡɑɑ wɑ yɑ yɑriɔ tem sɔɔn di. Yɑ kɔbi yiru mɔ nɡe yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛndun kɔbi, mɑ yɑ ɡɑri mɔ̀ nɡe yɑɑ binti bintiru.
Nɛɡibu i ku mɑɑ bwisiku nɡe bibu. Dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ sɔɔrɑ n weenɛ i n sɑ̃ɑ nɡe bii wɛ̃ɛnu, ɑdɑmɑ bwisikunu sɔɔ i n sɑ̃ɑ tɔn ɡirobu.
Nɔni swɑ̃ɑrɑ bɛɛn ɡoo deemɑwɑ? U kɑnɑru koowo. Goon nukurɑ tɑ do? U Gusunɔ siɑro kɑ womusu.
Bɛɛ be i wɑsire i nɔmɑ sɑ̃ɑre, i tii tɑ̃sisio i nɔmɑ suɑ kpɑ i de bɛɛn dũɑ yɑ n dɑm mɔ.
Bɛɛn kɑnɑru sɔɔ i Gusunɔ sokumɔ Bɑɑbɑ. Wee, wiyɑ u tɔmbu kpuro kɑ siri teebu sirimɔ nɡe mɛ bɑɑwure u kuɑ. Yen sɔ̃, sɑɑ ye yɑ bɛɛ tie hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ, i ye dio kɑ win nɑsiɑru.
Kɑ ɡem, i ǹ ko ko i kun tɛmɑnɛ i kɑ Gusunɔn kĩru ko kpɑ i wɑ i mwɑ yèn nɔɔ mwɛɛru u bɛɛ kuɑ.
Wi u nɑɑnɛ doke u yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm mɑ ye u yĩiyɔ u koo ye wɑ. U mɑɑ yɛ̃ mɑ ye yɑ ǹ wɑɑrɔ kɑ nɔni yɑ wɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑ ɡem.
Wee ye nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ kɑ Yinnin yĩsiru. I ku mɑɑ de i n sĩimɔ nɡe tɔn tukobu be bɑ ben bwisiku kɑmɡinu swĩi.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i ku de ɡoo u bɛɛ tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ dim kɑ nɔrubu sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑnu ɡɑnun dibu sɔɔ, ǹ kun mɛ suru kpɑon yɑribu kɑ tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑruɡinun kookoosu sɔɔ.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ bɑ yɔ̃ Gusunɔn sinɑ kitɑrun wuswɑɑɔ bɑ nùn sɑ̃ɑmɔ wɔ̃kuru kɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔ win sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ. Wi u sɔ̃ sinɑ kitɑrɔ u koo bu win wɑ̃ɑru wukiri.
Adɑmɑ Pɔlu u sɑrɑmɑ mɑ u yɑ̃ɑrɑ u nùn suɑ u nɛɛ, i ku nɑndɑ, win hunde yɑ wɑ̃ɑ.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ nɑ kpuro kpĩɑ be bɑ ɡɔsɑn ɑrufɑɑnin sɔ̃, kpɑ ben tii bu mɑɑ fɑɑbɑ wɑ Yesu Kirisin mi kɑ yiiko ye yɑ ku rɑ kpe.
I tɔbirinɔ kɑ kĩru. Kpɑ ɑlɑfiɑ yɑ n kɑ bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ Kirisiɡibu.
I wiru kpĩiyɑnɔ yèn sɔ̃ i Kirisi bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ nɛn kĩnɑsibu i ɡɑ̃ɑ ni yɛ̃ kɔ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i n tii sɛ kpɑ i ku de i kɔ̃ɔrɑ i wɔrumɑ be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃n torɑrun sɔ̃.
Bɛɛ kurɔbu i bɛɛn durɔbu wiru kpĩiyɔ nɡe mɛ n weenɛ Yinniɡii u ko.
A be bɑ torɑ ɡerusio yiɡbɛruɡibu kpuron nɔni biru kpɑ be bɑ tie bu bɛrum duurɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, su ku mɑɑ sirinɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i bwisikuo nɡe mɛ i ko ko, kpɑ i ku ɡɑ̃ɑnu ko ni nu koo bɛɛɡii torɑsiɑ, ǹ kun mɛ ni nu koo nùn surɑ.
Bɑɑwure wi u rɑ mɑɑ ɡeɑ ko u koo yiiko kɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ bɔri yɛndu wɑ, ɡbiikɑɑ Yuubɑ, yen biru tɔn tukobu.
bɑ dɔ̃ɔ boko ɡo, bɑ tɑkobin ɡɔɔ kisirɑri. Bɑ ǹ dɑɑ dɑm mɔ ɑdɑmɑ bɑ kuɑ dɑmɡibu. Bɑ bu nɑsiɑ tɑbu sɔɔ, bɑ tɔn tukobu tɑbu di.
Sɑɑ ɡisɔn di ɡoo u ku mɑɑ mɑn wɑhɑlɑ ko domi nɑ boo bori mɔ nɛn wɑsi sɔɔ, yi nɑ wɑ Yesun sɔ̃.
Yerɑ wɔllun ɡɔrɑdo dɑmɡii ɡoo kperu suɑ tɑ kɑ nɛɛ bɑkɑru nɛ mɑ u tu sure nim wɔ̃ku sɔɔ u nɛɛ, nɡe mɛyɑ bɑ Bɑbiloni wuu bɔkɔ ɡe surɑ temɔ kɑ dɑm, ɡɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɑɑrɔ pɑi.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ nɛn kĩnɑsibu, i tii tɑ̃sisio bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ doke dɛɛrɑbu sɔɔ i n kɑnɑru mɔ̀ kɑ Hunde Dɛɛron dɑm.
I ku mɑɑ kɑ tɛ̃n tɔmbu weenɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i kɔsio kɑ bwisiku kpɑɑnu kpɑ i kɑ wunɑnɑ ye n sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn kĩru. Yeyɑ yɑ ɡeɑ sɑ̃ɑ, yɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃, mɑ yɑ yibɑ.
Domi nɛnɑ nɑ piiburu bo ɡɔrobu sɔɔ. Nɑ ǹ weenɛ bu mɑn soku ɡɔro, domi nɑ Gusunɔn yiɡbɛru nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ.
I ku rɑ hɑnduniɑn yɑkɑnde kĩɑ, kɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ ni nu wɑ̃ɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ. Wi u ye kĩ, Bɑɑbɑn kĩrɑ kun wɑ̃ɑ wi sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, wunɛ wi ɑ ɡɑbun tɑɑrɛ wɑɑmɔ, ɑ ǹ ɡɑfɑrɑ wɑsi bɑɑ ɑ̀ n weren nɑ, domi sɑnɑm mɛ ɑ ɡɑbun tɑɑrɛ wɑɑmɔ mɑ ɑ mɑɑ mɔ̀ nɡe be, ɑ tii tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔwɑ.

Mɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Yɑkɔbu kɑ Piɛɛ kɑ Yohɑnu, be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe yiɡbɛrun ɡberebɑ, bɑ nɛn kɛ̃ru tubɑ te bɑ mɑn wɛ̃, bɑ wurɑ mɑ nɛ kɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑsi, sɑ kuɑ beɡibu. Bɑ mɑɑ wurɑ su dɑ tɔn tukobun mi, kpɑ be, bu mɑɑ dɑ Yuubɑn mi.
Sɑnɑm mɛ tɑbu kowobu bɑ Yesu kpɑre bɑ kpɑ, bɑ win yɑ̃nu bɔnu kuɑ subɑ nnɛ, tɑbu kowo ben bɑɑwure sube teeru, bɑ mɑɑ win yɑbe bɑkɑru suɑ. Yɑbe te, tɑ ǹ yinɑ mɔ, bɑ tu wesɑwɑ yɑberu.
Wunɛ wi ɑ ɡɑbu keu sɔ̃ɔsimɔ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ ǹ tii sɔ̃ɔsimɔ. Wunɛ wi ɑ ɡɑbu sɔ̃ɔmɔ bu ku ɡbɛni, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ ɡbɛnimɔ.
Nɡe i ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ bɛɛn wɑsi sɑ̃ɑwɑ Hunde Dɛɛron wɑ̃ɑ yeru wi u wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ, wi Gusunɔ u bɛɛ kɑ̃? I ǹ tii mɔ.
Domi Kirisin kĩrɑ sun nɛni, bɛsɛ be sɑ tubɑ mɑ tɔn turo ù n ɡu tɔmbu kpuron ɑyerɔ, tɔmbu kpurowɑ bɑ ɡu.
Yen sɔ̃ nɛɡibu, bɛɛ be Gusunɔ u sokɑ i kɑ ko wiɡibu, i de i n Yesu mɛɛrɑ wi Gusunɔ u ɡɔrimɑ u kɑ ko yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwero wìn seedɑ sɑ dimɔ.
Nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsi yɑbu kpuro sɔɔ mɑ n weenɛ i sɔmburu ko ɡem ɡem nɡe mɛsum, kpɑ i dɑm sɑriruɡibu somi, kpɑ i Yinni Yesun tiin ɡɑri yɑɑyɑ ye u nɛɛ, kɛ̃run wɛ̃ɛbu bu nuku dobu mɔ n kere kɛ̃run mwɑɑbu.
I de bɑɑwure u n durɔ kɑ kurɔn suɑnɑɑn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ kpɑ durɔ kɑ kurɔ sɔɔ torɑrɑ kun wɑ̃ɑ. Domi Gusunɔ u koo bu siri be bɑ kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑmɔ tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ kɑ be bɑ sɑkɑrɑru mɔ̀.
U yɑ̃ɑrɑ u tende siki te sɔɔ, mɑ u bekuru wɑ tɑ yii, ɑdɑmɑ u ǹ due.
Yerɑ ɡuru mɑɑkinu seewɑ kɑ wurenu kɑ ɡuru ɡbɑ̃sukubu kɑ tem yĩiru bɑkɑbu. Tem yĩiru bin kpɑ̃ɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Bin bweseru tɑ ǹ koore sɑɑ mìn di bɑ tɔnu tɑkɑ kuɑ.

Yerɑ nɑ yiirɑ win nɑɑsɔ n kɑ nùn sɑ̃, ɑdɑmɑ u nɛɛ, n ku ko mɛ, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn sɔm kowosi kɑ mɑɑ nɛn berusebu kpuroɡii be bɑ Yesun ɡem seedɑ di, n Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑwɔ. Domi seedɑ ye bɑ Yesu diiyɑ, yeyɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbun ɡɑrin nuuru.
Mɑ u sun ye sɔ̃ɔsi sɑɑ win Hunden min di. Domi Hunde wi, u rɑ n kpuro mɛɛrɑ u n kɑ yɛ̃, bɑɑ ye n wɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn tii sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i nùn dɑm koosio nɡe bɛɛɡii Yinni sɔɔ kɑ nuku doo bɑkɑbu kpɑ i tɔnu win bweseru bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Bɛɛ bibu i bɛɛn mɔwɔbu mɛm nɔɔwɔ ɡɑ̃ɑnu bɑɑnire sɔɔ, domi mɛyɑ Yinni u kĩ.

Yenin sɔ̃nɑ sekurɑ kun sun mɔ̀, domi bɛsɛn ɡɔ̃ru ɡɑ sun seedɑ diiyɑmmɛ mɑ bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑru hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ, su mɑm ɡere bɛɛn mi, tɑ dɛɛre. Gusunɔ u derɑ tɑ ǹ murɑfitiru mɑni. Win duromɑ mu sun kpɑrɑ, n ǹ mɔ tɔnun bwisi.
Wi u nɛn woodɑ mwɑ, mɑ u ye mɛm nɔɔwɑ, wiyɑ u mɑn kĩ. Wi u mɑn kĩ, nɛn Bɑɑbɑ koo nùn kĩɑ. Nɛn tii kon mɑɑ yɛ̃ro kĩɑ, kpɑ n nùn tii sɔ̃ɔsi.

Geemɑ, woodɑ be, bɑ kɑ bwisin ɡɑ̃ɑnu weenɛ ɑ̀ n bu mɛɛrɑ, kɑ ben sɑ̃ɑru te tɑ wee sɑɑ tɔnun ɡɔ̃ru kĩrun di, kɑ ben tii kɑwɑ weesuɡibu, kɑ mɑɑ ben wɑsin seserun serusiɑbu. Adɑmɑ bɑɑ woodɑ ben tiɑ kun dɑm ɡɑm mɔ yu kɑ wɑsin kĩru kɑnkɑm tɑɑre.
Bɑ wunɛn kĩrun seedɑ dimɔ Yesun yiɡbɛrun wuswɑɑɔ. A de ɑ n dɑ bu kusenu kue ben sɑnum sɔɔ nɡe mɛ n weenɛ Gusunɔɡii u ko.
Adɑmɑ ɑ tii ɡɑwo sɑɑ wiirɑ ɡɑri kɑ sikirinɔ yɛ̃ru sɑriruɡisun di. A yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm mɑ siyɑ su rɑ sɑnnɔ mɑ.
Bɛsɛ kpuro, bɛsɛ bèn wuswɑɑ ɡbɑbiɑrɑ, sɑ Yinnin yiiko mɛɛrɑ. Nɡe mɛyɑ sɑ kɑ kɔsimɔ su kɑ Yinni wi weenɑ. Win yiiko mɑɑ sosimɔ bɛsɛ sɔɔ. Kɑ ɡem, Yinnin Hundewɑ u sɔmbu te mɔ̀.

Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ɑmɔnɑ Kirisin yɛm ɑrufɑɑni ko n nɛ. Domi Gusunɔn Hunde wi u ku rɑ kpen sɑɑbuwɑ u tii Gusunɔ wɛ̃ nɡe yɑ̃ku te tɑ ǹ bɑu mɔ. Win yɛmɑ mu koo bɛsɛn ɡɔ̃ru dɛɛrɑsiɑ sɑɑ sɔm kɑmɡinun di kpɑ su kɑ kpĩ su Gusunɔ, Yinni wɑso sɑ̃.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, Gusunɔ ù n bu kɛ̃ru kɑ̃ tèn bweseru u sun kɑ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ Yinni Yesu Kirisi nɑɑnɛ doke, wɑrɑ nɛ n kɑ Gusunɔ swɑɑ ɡɑnɛ.
I ku Gusunɔn Hunde Dɛɛro nuki sɑnku, domi Hunde wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn yĩreru bɛɛ sɔɔ te tɑ sɔ̃ɔsimɔ mɑ Gusunɔ u koo sun yɑkiɑ mɑm mɑm.
Yen sɔ̃, u yɑɑyo ye bɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔsi kɑ nɡe mɛ u ye nuɑ. U ye mɛm nɔɔwɔ kpɑ u win ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑ. Ù kun yɑnde, kon nɑ n nùn deemɑ wɔ̃kuru nɡe ɡbɛnɔ. U ǹ ko n mɑɑ yɛ̃ sɑɑ ye kon nɑ.
Nɛn bibu i ku de ɡoo u bɛɛ nɔni wɔ̃ke. Wi u ɡeɑ mɔ̀ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ ɡemɡii, nɡe mɛ Yesun tii u sɑ̃ɑ.
Nɛn kĩnɑsibu i ku tɔmbu kpuro nɑɑnɛ ko be bɑ ɡerumɔ bɑ Hunde Dɛɛro mɔ, ɑdɑmɑ i bu wɛ̃ɛrio bɑ̀ n sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔɡibun nɑ, domi Gusunɔn sɔmɔ weesuɡibɑ yibɑ hɑnduniɑ ye sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ nɛɡibu, i de i n yɛ̃ mɑ sɑɑ win min diyɑ sɑ bɛɛ torɑnun suurun ɡɑri nɔɔsiɑmɔ.
Tɛ̃, nɛɡibu, i de i n nukuru do ye i kɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinniɡibu. Nɛn mi, nɑ ǹ wɑsirɑmɔ n kɑ bɛɛ yɑɑyɑsiɑ ye nɑ rɑɑ yoruɑ kɔ, bɛɛn mi mɑɑ, somirɑ.
Gɔ̃ɔru tɑ̀ n ɡoo mɔ̀, u de u ɡinɑ dĩɑnu di yɛnuɔ, kpɑ bɛɛn mɛnnɔ sɔɔ i ku rɑ tɑɑrɛ suɑ. Gɑri yi yi tie, kon bɛɛ yin ɑsɑnsi sɔ̃ nɑ̀ n tunumɑ.
Pilɑti u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɛɛn tii i nùn mɔɔ, kpɑ i nùn siri kɑ bɛɛn tiin woodɑ. Mɑ Yuubɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑ ǹ yen dɑm mɔ su kɑ tɔnu ɡo.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i Hunden kɛ̃nu kɑsuo ni nu bɛɛrɛ kere. Kon mɑɑ bɛɛ swɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsi ye yɑ kpuro kere.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, Yesu sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwero wìn bukɑtɑ sɑ mɔ. U Gusunɔ wɛ̃re, u dɛɛre, u ǹ durum koore. Wi kɑ durumɡibu bɑ wunɑnɛ. Bɑ nùn suɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ sere wɔllɔ.
Kon ye kpuro kpĩ sɑɑ Kirisin min di wi u mɑn dɑm kɛ̃mɔ.
Wee, ye Gusunɔ u kĩ bɛɛ sɔɔ, yerɑ i n dɛɛre kpɑ i tii kpĩ mɑm mɑm sɑkɑrɑrun kobu sɔɔ.
I tɛmɑnɔ kɑnɑru sɔɔ kpɑ i n kɑ swɑɑ mɛɛrɑ i n Gusunɔ tɑkɑru mɔ̀.
Ye Mɔwisi u ɡɑri yi nuɑ, u kpikiru suɑ Mɑdiɑnin tem ɡiɑ. Miyɑ u bii tɔn durɔbu yiru mɑrɑ.
N ǹ weenɛ tɔn durɔ u win wiru wukiri domi u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn weenɑsii, u mɑɑ Gusunɔ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, ɑdɑmɑ tɔn kurɔ u tɔn durɔ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Kpɑ i de Kirisin bɔri yɛndu tɑ n bɛɛn ɡɔ̃rusu kpɑre, kpɑ i n tɑkɑru mɔ̀. Bɑ bɛɛ sokɑwɑ i n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ wɑsi tee, kpɑ i n bɔri yɛndu mɔ.

Kɑ ɡem, n weenɛ Gusunɔ wi u kpuro tɑkɑ kuɑ mɑ yɑ wɑ̃ɑ win sɔ̃, u Yesu ko tɔn ɡiro nɔni swɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ, kpɑ u kɑ tɔn dɑbinu ko win bibu be bɑ koo win yiiko bɔnu ko. Domi Yesu wiyɑ u bu kpɑrɑmɔ bu kɑ fɑɑbɑ wɑ.
Mɑn diyɑ sɑnnɔsu kɑ sikirinɔsu nɑɑmɔ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. Su nɑɑmɔwɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ dɑbinun binɛn di ye yɑ rɑ n tɑbu mɔ̀ bɛɛn wɑsi sɔɔ.
Sɑ lɑbɑɑri ɡɑɑ nuɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sekuru sɑri kɔ̃suru ɡɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ tèn bweseru tɔn tukobun tii bɑ ǹ kɑ̃kɔ bu ko. Bɑ nɛɛ bɛɛn turo u win tundon kurɔ kĩ.

I ǹ lɑɑkɑri mɛɛribu ɡɑbu wɑɑre mɑ n kun mɔ bi tɔmbu kpuro bɑ rɑ wɑ. Gusunɔ wi u sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛɡii, u ǹ derimɔ bu bɛɛn lɑɑkɑri mɛɛri n kere ye i ko kpĩ i kɑ tɛmɑnɑ. Adɑmɑ lɑɑkɑri mɛɛribu bɑɑbire sɔɔ u rɑ mɑɑ yɑri yeru ko kpɑ i kɑ kpĩ i tɛmɑnɑ bi sɔɔ.
Nɑ yɛ̃ mɑ nɑ̀ n bɛɛ derin biru ɡɑbɑ koo du bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ nɡe mɛ dɛmɑkunu rɑ du yɑ̃ɑnun suunu sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ ko n wɔnwɔndu mɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɛsɛn tii sɑ Yesun yiɡbɛnu woo kɑnɛ bɛɛn sɔ̃, domi i tɛmɑnɑ i yɔ̃ nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru kɑ tɔ̃yɑn sɑɑ.
Goo kun Gusunɔ wɑɑre. Sɑ̀ n kĩɑnɛ, Gusunɔ u kɑ sun mɑninɛ, mɑ win kĩrɑ yibumɔ bɛsɛ sɔɔ.

Bɛɛ Yesun yiɡbɛnuɡibu, bɛɛ be i wɑ̃ɑ Gɑlɑtin temɔ, nɛ kɑ bɛsɛɡibu kpuro be sɑ wɑ̃ɑ sɑnnu, sɑ bɛɛ tɔburɑ. Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ Yinni Yesu Kirisi bu bɛɛ durom kuɑ kpɑ bu bɛɛ ɑlɑfiɑ kɛ̃. Yesu Kirisi wi, u tii wɛ̃ bɛsɛn torɑnun sɔ̃ u kɑ sun wɔrɑ sɑɑ hɑnduniɑ kɔ̃sɑ yen nɔmɑn di, Gusunɔ bɛsɛn Bɑɑbɑn kĩru sɔɔ. Wiyɑ u yiiko mɔ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Ami. Nɛnɑ Pɔlu. Yesu Kirisiwɑ u mɑn sokɑ n kɑ ko win ɡɔro, wi kɑ Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ, wi u nùn seeyɑ ɡɔrin di. N ǹ mɔ tɔmbɑ bɑ mɑn sokɑ, nɛn sokurɑ kun nɛ sɑɑ tɔnu ɡoon min di.
I win ɡɑri bwisikuo nɡe mɛ u tɛmɑnɑ kɑ yibɛrɛ tɛɛ te durumɡibɑ kɑ nùn nɛnuɑ, kpɑ i ku mwiɑ kpɑnɑ i dɑm biɑ.
Domi sɑ̀ n ɡbinnɑ kɑ wi sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ win ɡɔɔ bɔnu kuɑ, sikɑ sɑri sɑ ko mɑɑ win seebu ɡɔrin di bɔnu ko kpɑ su ɡbinnɑ kɑ wi.
Yi kpɑm nɛɛ, “Bɛɛ tɔn tukobu, i nuku dobu koowo kɑ win tɔmbu sɑnnu.”
Adɑmɑ Gusunɔn Hunde ɡerumɔ kpɑsɑsɑ mɑ sɑnɑm ɡɑm sisi mɛ̀ sɔɔ ɡɑbɑ koo nɑɑnɛ dokebun swɑɑ deri bu hunde koni weesuɡibu mɛm nɔɔwɑ, kpɑ bu mɑɑ wɛrɛkunun sɔ̃ɔsiru swĩi.
A wunɛn tɔmbu yɑɑyɑsio bɑ n tem yɛ̃robu kɑ wuun tɔnwerobu wiru kpĩiyɑmmɛ bɑ n bu mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ, kpɑ bɑ n sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ sɔm ɡeenu kpuron sɔ̃.
Bɑ yeni duɑri sobun sɔ̃, mɑ ɡɑsɔ ɡɑriyɑ Gusunɔ u ɡeruɑ u kɑ wɔllu kɑ tem tɑkɑ kuɑ. U tem wunɑ nim sɔɔn di, mɑ u mu mɔmɑ kɑ nim.
Nɔn teerɑ Kirisi u ɡu ɡem sɑriruɡibun durum sɔ̃, wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ ɡemɡii, kpɑ u kɑ bɛɛ dɑ Gusunɔn mi. Bɑ nùn ɡo, u ɡuwɑ nɡe mɛ tɔmbɑ rɑ ɡbi, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ nùn seeyɑ kɑ Hunde Dɛɛron dɑm.
N ko n dɑɑ sɑnɔ bɑ kun ɡem swɑɑ ɡiɑre kɑ sere bu ye ɡiɑ kpɑ bu woodɑ dɛɛrɑ biru kisi ye bɑ bu wɛ̃.
Nɛɡibu, kɑ Yinni Yesu Kirisin yĩsiru sɑ bɛɛ yiiremɔ, i nɑɑnɛ dokeo bɑɑwure ɡɔwo wi u sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑru koo sɑri mɑ u ǹ sɔ̃ɔsinu swĩi ni sɑ bɛɛ wɛ̃.
Torɑru tɑ duɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ sɑɑ tɔn turon min di, mɑ win torɑ te, tɑ kɑ ɡɔɔ nɑ. Gɔɔ wi, u tɔmbu kpuro ɡirɑri domi kpurowɑ bɑ torɑ.
Nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃nɑ bɑ sinɑmbu tɑbu di, bɑ kuɑ ye yɑ wɑ̃, bɑ wɑ bɑ mwɑ ye Gusunɔ u bu nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ. Bɑ ɡbee sinɑnsun nɔsu kɔruɑ,
Bɑ sun nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ ɑdɑmɑ Gusunɔ kun sun deri. Bɑ sun surɑ ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ sun ɡo.
Bɛɛ be i ǹ kɑ tɔn turo yɔ̃, i ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ hɑnduniɑn bɔrɔ Gusunɔn yibɛrɛwɑ? Ǹ n mɛn nɑ wi u kĩ u ko hɑnduniɑn bɔrɔ, u tii kuɑ Gusunɔn yibɛrɛ.
Hunde Dɛɛro u ǹ dere bu Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑn wɑɑsu ko Asin temɔ. Yeyɑ n derɑ bɑ Firiɡi kɑ Gɑlɑtin tem bukiɑnɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɡe mɛ bɑ koo tɔnu ɡem wɛ̃ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃, yen ɡɑri wee, “A ku ɡere wunɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ ɑ nɛɛ, wɑrɑ u koo yɔ Gusunɔ wɔllɔ.” Yen tubusiɑnɑ, u kɑ Kirisi sɑrɑsiɑmɑ.
Gɔrɑdo ɡbiikoo u dɑ mɑ u win yoruku wisi temɔ. Yerɑ bwisi tobi bu wisi nɡe fɔrɔnu be bɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ yen yĩreru mɔ bɑ yen weenɑsiɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ.
Ye tɑ kuɑ mɛ, yerɑ hunde koni nnɛ ye kɑ ɡuro ɡurobu yɛndɑ nnɛ ye, bɑ kpunɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm ten wuswɑɑɔ. Ben bɑɑwure u mɔrɔku mɔ kɑ wurɑn bweebu mì sɔɔ turɑre wɑ̃ɑ ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobun kɑnɑnu.
Bɑɑwure wi u nɑɑnɛ doke mɑ Yesu sɑ̃ɑ Kirisi wi, yɛ̃ro sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn bii, mɑ bɑɑwure wi u tundo kĩ, u mɑɑ bii kĩwɑ.
Su ku tii suɑ kpɑ sɑ n sɑnnɔ seeyɑmɔ bɛsɛn suunu sɔɔ, kpɑ sɑ n nisinu kuɑnɑmmɛ bɛsɛn tii tiinɛ.
A ku durɔ bukuro ɡerusi kɑ dɑm, ɑdɑmɑ ɑ tɛmɑnɔ ɑ nùn dɑm kɛ̃ nɡe wunɛn tiin tundo. Mɛyɑ mɑɑ ɑluwɑɑsibɑn tii, ɑ bu koowo nɡe wunɛn mɑɑbu kɑ wɔnɔbu.
I de i n dɑɑ ɡeɑ mɔ̀ be bɑ ǹ nɑɑnɛ doken wuswɑɑɔ. Nɡe mɛyɑ bɑɑ bɑ̀ n bɛɛ dɑɑ kɔ̃sɑ mɑni bɑ koo bɛɛn sɔm ɡeenu wɑ kpɑ bu Gusunɔ siɑrɑ sɑnɑm mɛ u koo bu siri.
Nɑ rɑɑ mɑm hɑniɑ mɔ sere nɑ Yesun yiɡbɛru nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Ǹ n ɡem kɑson nɑ, woodɑn mɛm nɔɔbu sɔɔ, ɡoo kun kpɛ̃ u mɑn tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃.
Mɑ u bu bikiɑ sɑɑ yerɑ̀ u bɛkurɑ. Bɑ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɡĩɑ sɔ̃ɔ sɔɔn kɔbɑ tiɑ dee deewɑ bɑrɑ te, tɑ nùn deri.

Dɔmɑ teyɑ Yuubɑ bɑ Pilɑti bikiɑ u de bu durɔ ben kɔ̃ri bɔɔku be bɑ ɡo mi, kpɑ bu ɡoo ni sɑrɑsiɑ dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑrun di. Bɑ yeni bikiɑ yèn sɔ̃ n tie sɔ̃ɔ teeru bu kɑ ben tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑruɡiru di, bɑ ǹ mɑɑ kĩ ɡoo ni, nu n wɑ̃ɑ dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru wɔllɔ tɔ̃ɔ wɛ̃rɑruɡii te sɔɔ, domi tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑrun tii tiiwɑ.
Ye Pilɑti u yeni nuɑ yerɑ u hɑniɑ sosi u kɑ Yesu kɑrɑ. Adɑmɑ Yuubɑ bɑ ɡbɑ̃sukunu bɔbiɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɑ̀ n durɔ wi kɑrɑ, ɑ ǹ mɑɑ tem yɛ̃ro kĩ. Domi bɑɑwure wi u win tii kuɑ sunɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ tem yɛ̃ron yibɛrɛ.
Yesu bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, i ku wururɑ. I Gusunɔ nɑɑnɛ dokeo kpɑ i mɑɑ mɑn nɑɑnɛ doke.
I ku de bɛɛn yibɛrɛbɑ bu kɑ bɛɛ ɡɑ̃ɑnu nɑre. Yeyɑ yɑ koo bu sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ bɑ kɑm kobu dɔɔwɑ, yɑ koo mɑɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ i wɑ̃ɑ fɑɑbɑn swɑɑ sɔɔ. Ye kpurowɑ yɑ wee sɑɑ Gusunɔn min di.
N ǹ mɔ bɛɛyɑ i mɑn ɡɔsɑ, nɛnɑ nɑ bɛɛ ɡɔsɑ. Nɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ wunɑ nɛnɛm kpɑ i dɑ i binu mɑ ni nu koo tɛ. Kpɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu bɑɑnire ni bɛɛ i kɑnɑ nɛn Bɑɑbɑn mi kɑ nɛn yĩsiru, u bɛɛ wɛ̃.

Kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebɑ Abɛli u Gusunɔ yɑ̃kuru kuɑ te tɑ Kɑɛniɡiru bɛɛrɛ kere. Win nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɑɑbuwɑ bɑ nùn sokɑ ɡemɡii domi Gusunɔn tii u win kɛ̃nu mwɑ. Kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebɑ Abɛli u mɑɑ ɡɑri mɔ̀ kɑ tɛ̃ bɑɑ mɛ u ɡu.
I de bu sun ɡɑrisi Kirisin sɔm kowobu be Gusunɔ u win ɑsirin ɡɑri nɔmu sɔndiɑ.
Kperi mɑɑ wɔrukumɔ temɔ nɡe mɛ ɡɑndun bii birenu rɑ dɛrure sɑnɑm mɛ woo dɑmɡuu ɡɑ tu sirɑmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, kĩnɑsibu, i bũu sɑ̃ɑru suurio.
A ku de kɔ̃sɑ yu nun kɑmiɑ, ɑdɑmɑ ɑ kɔ̃sɑ kɑmiɔ kɑ ɡeɑn kobu.
Yeni kpurowɑ kɑɑ wunɛn tɔmbu yɑɑyɑsiɑ kpɑ ɑ mɑɑ bu kirɔ ko Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ bu ku sikirinɑ ɡɑri wɛ̃ɛrinun sɔ̃. Domi yenin bweserɑ kun ɑrufɑɑni ɡɑɑ mɔ mɑ n kun mɔ yu tɔmbu kɑm koosiɑ be bɑ swɑɑ dɑki.
I Gusunɔ susio, u koo mɑɑ bɛɛ susi. I bɛɛn nɔmɑ dɛɛrɑsio, bɛɛ durumɡibu. I bɛɛn ɡɔ̃rusu sɑ̃rɑsio, bɛɛ ɡɔ̃rusu yiruɡibu.
Adɑmɑ ì n tɔmbun bɛɛrɛ kerɑnɑɑ mɛɛrɑ durumwɑ i mɔ̀, mɑ woodɑ yɑ bɛɛ tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ yèn sɔ̃ i ǹ ye mɛm nɔɔwɛ.
Domi Gusunɔ kun sun sokɑ su kɑ dɑɑ disinuɡiɑ ko mɑ n kun mɔ sɑ n dɛɛre.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ, Gusunɔ u win mɔru sɔ̃ɔsimɔ sɑɑ wɔllun di kɔ̃sɑ kpuron sɔ̃ ye tɔmbɑ kuɑ, kɑ win bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ru sɑriru. Ben kom kɔ̃sum mɛn sɑɑbu bɑ ǹ dere ɡem mu sɔmburu ko.
Nɛn kĩnɑsibu, i de su kĩɑnɑ, domi kĩrɑ nɑɑmɔwɑ sɑɑ Gusunɔn min di. Bɑɑwure wi u tɔnun kĩru mɔ u sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔn bii, u mɑɑ Gusunɔ yɛ̃.
Wi u ɡerumɔ u wɑ̃ɑ yɑm bururɑm sɔɔ, mɑ u win beruse tusɑ, u wɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ ɡinɑ.
Doo nɔɔrobɑ bɛɛ, bɑ̀ n bɛɛ wɔmmɔ Kirisin yĩsirun sɔ̃, domi Gusunɔn Hunde yiikoɡii u wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɛɛ.
Ye Pɔlu u bu tɔburɑ u kpɑ u bu sɑɑriɑ tiɑ tiɑ sɔmbu te Gusunɔ u kuɑ tɔn tukobun suunu sɔɔ win wɑɑsun sɔ̃.
Wɑrɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ u koo kpĩ u nɛɛ, nɑ tore. Sɑri. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mɑ ɡemɑ nɑ ɡerumɔ, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ i ǹ mɑn nɑɑnɛ doke.
Mɑ u kpɑm nɛɛ, “Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ ben torɑnu kɑ ben woodɑ sɑrɑbu yɑɑyɑmɔ.”
Bɑ bɛɛ kuɑ dukiɑɡibu bɑɑyere sɔɔ, kɑ ɡɑrin ɡerubu, kɑ yɛ̃ru kpuro, sɑɑ win min di.
Nɛɡibu, nɑ bɛɛ hɑniɑ koosiɑmɔ bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisin sɔ̃ kɑ Hunde Dɛɛron kĩrun sɔ̃, i n kɑ mɑn tɑbu mɔ̀ kɑ kɑnɑru.
Tɔn wɔru ɡɑ nùn wisɑ ɡɑ nɛɛ, wɛrɛkunu nu nun wɑ̃ɑsi. Wɑrɑ swɑɑ kɑsu u kɑ nun ɡo.

Gusunɔ u nùn kuɑ ɑbɔru bɑtumɑ sɔɔ u kɑ tɔmbu torɑnun suuru wɑɑwɑ kɑ win yɛm be bɑ nùn nɑɑnɛ doke. Gusunɔ u kuɑ mɛ, u kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ u sɑ̃ɑ ɡemɡii. Yellu win suurun sɑɑ sɔɔ u rɑɑ tɛmɑnɑ kɑ tɔmbun torɑnu.
Mɑ yobu kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔ̃sobu bɑ yɔ̃ dɔ̃ɔ ɡɛ̃ɛn bɔkuɔ yi bɑ sɔ̃ruɑ woorun sɔ̃ bɑ wɔ̃su. Piɛɛ u dɑ u mɑɑ yɔ̃ mi, bɑ wɔ̃su sɑnnu. u Yesu ɡɑri bikiɑmɔ
I tɑbu yɑ̃nu kpuro sebuo ni Gusunɔ u bɛɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, kpɑ i kɑ kpĩ i yɔ̃rɑ dim dim i Setɑm bwisi yinɑ.
Piɛɛ u nùn bikiɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ nɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ n nun swĩi mi tɛ̃. Domi nɑ sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ n kɑ nɛn wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ wunɛn sɔ̃.
Mɑ bɔri yɛndu te Gusunɔ u wɛ̃ɛmɔ, te tɑ tɔnun yɛ̃ru kpuro kere, tɑ koo bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ru kɑ bɛɛn bwisikunu kɔ̃su bɛɛ kɑ Yesu Kirisin ɡbinnɑɑ sɔɔ.
Yerɑ sɑ dendimɔ sɑ kɑ Yinni bɛsɛn Bɑɑbɑ siɑrɑmɔ, sɑ mɑɑ kpɑm kɑ ye tɔmbu bɔ̃rusimɔ be Gusunɔ u tɑkɑ kuɑ win weenɑsibu.
Nɑ ǹ kɑ hɑnduniɑ yen kurɔ dɑmɑ kowobu yɑ̃, kɑ yen binɛɡibu kɑ yen ɡbɛnɔbu kɑ be bɑ bũu sɑ̃ɑmɔ. Domi nɑ̀ n kɑ be yɑ̃ tilɑsi i kɑ yɑri hɑnduniɑn di.
Nɛn tii nɑ rɑɑ tɑmɑɑ n weenɛ n Yesu Nɑsɑrɛtiɡiin yĩsiru sɑnku kɑ swɑɑ dɑbinu.
Bɑ rɑ n sɑkɑrɑrun nɔni mɔ, torɑnu ku rɑ bu turi. Bɑ rɑ be bɑ kun yɔ̃ dim dim yinɑ mwɛ. Ben ɡɔ̃ru ɡɑ binɛn dɔɔnɛ mɔ. Gusunɔ u bu bɔ̃rusi.
Adɑmɑ sɔm kowo wi u kun sɑ̃ɑ kpɑro mɑ yɑ̃ɑnu kun sɑ̃ɑ win tiiɡinu, ù n dɛmɑku wɑɑmɑ ɡɑ sisi, u koo yɑ̃ɑnu deri u yɑkurɑwɑ. Kpɑ dɛmɑku ɡu yɑ̃ɑnu mwɑ ɡu ni nu tie yɑrinɑsiɑ.
Nɛn kĩnɑsibu, i yeni yɛ̃ sɑ̃ɑ sɑ̃ɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i de bɑɑwure u n dɑ nɔ kpɑɑkɑ, kpɑ u n dɑ sɑku u sere ɡere, kpɑ u n dɑ tɛ u sere mɔru bɑrɑ.
Nɡe mɛyɑ mɑɑ Yinni u yiire be bɑ Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑn wɑɑsu mɔ̀ bu ben dĩɑnu wɑ ye sɔɔ.
Nɛ nɑ nɑ hɑnduniɑɔ nɡe yɑm bururɑm, kpɑ bɑɑwure wi u mɑn nɑɑnɛ doke u kun kɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ.
