Yen biru Yesu u nùn wɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ mɑ u nɛɛ, n wee ɑ bɛkurɑ, ɑ ku rɑ mɑɑ durum ko, kpɑ kɔ̃sɑ ye yɑ yeni kere yu ku rɑɑ mɑɑ nun deemɑ.
Kpuro ye i mɔ̀, i ye koowo kɑ kĩru.
Yesu u nɛɛ, ì n mɑn kĩ i nɛn woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɔ.

Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i n tii sɛ kpɑ i ku yɛ̃ron nɔɔ yinɑ wi u kɑ bɛɛ ɡɑri mɔ̀. Be bɑ yinɑ bu win ɡɑri swɑɑ dɑki wi u bu kirɔ mɔ̀ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ sɛɛyɑsiɑbu kisirɑri. Kɑɑ sere ɡere bɛsɛ? Sɑ ǹ kisirɑmɔ sɑ̀ n nùn biru kisi wi u kɑ sun ɡɑri mɔ̀ wɔllun di.
Yellu i ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃, mɑ i sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnun yobu ni nu ǹ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ.
Bɛɛyɑ Gusunɔ u ɡbiɑ u win sɔm kowo seeyɑ, mɑ u nùn ɡɔrɑ, u kɑ bɛɛn bɑɑwure ɡɔsiɑ win kom kɔ̃sum di, kpɑ u bɛɛ domɑru kuɑ.
Bɛsɛ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ yen seedɑ diobu ye u kuɑ Yuubɑn bɑru kpɑɑnɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ. Bɑ mɑɑ nùn kpɑre dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru wɔllɔ bɑ ɡo.
Nɑ bɛɛ yiiremɔ nɛɡibu, kɑ bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisin yĩsiru, i de i n ɡɑri tee ɡerunɑmɔ, kpɑ kɑrɑnɑbu bu ku rɑɑ du bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ. I de i n bwisiku teenu mɔ.
Bɛɛ mɑɑ, i rɑɑ ɡɑsɔ kɑ Gusunɔ tomɑ, i rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ win yibɛrɛbɑ bɛɛn bwisikunu sɔɔ bɛɛn kookoo kɔ̃susun sɔ̃.
A ɑluwɑɑsirun kĩru kɑnkɑm suurio kpɑ ɑ ɡem kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ kĩru kɑ ɑlɑfiɑ nɑɑ ɡirɑ, wunɛ kɑ be sɑnnu be bɑ Yinnin yĩsiru sokumɔ kɑ ɡɔ̃ru dɛɛrɔ.
Bɑ bɛɛ seeyɑ kɑ Kirisi sɑnnu ɡɔrin di. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i wɔllun ɡɑ̃ɑnu kɑsuo mi Kirisi u sɔ̃ Gusunɔn nɔm ɡeuɔ.
Gɔrɑdo ɡbiikoo u win kɔbɑ so. Yerɑ ɡuru kpenu kɑ dɔ̃ɔ kɑ yɛm sɑnnu n burinɑ, mɑ yɑ nɛɛrɑ kɑ dɑm sɑɑ wɔllun di. Mɑ tem bɔnu itɑse yɑ dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑ kɑ dɑ̃ɑn bɔnu itɑse kɑ mɑɑ yɑkɑ bekusu kpuro.
bɑ mɔ̀, Gusunɔ Yinni dɑm kpuroɡii, wunɛ wi ɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɛ̃, ɑ rɑɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ, sɑ nun siɑrɑmɔ yèn sɔ̃ ɑ wunɛn dɑm bɑkɑm dendɑ, mɑ ɑ wunɛn bɑn dibu toruɑ.
Yesu u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ̀ n dɑɑ Gusunɔn kɛ̃ru yɛ̃, mɑ ɑ mɑɑ nùn yɛ̃ wi u nun nim bikiɑmɔ, kɑɑ rɑɑ mɑn bikiɑwɑ kpɑ n nun nim wɑ̃ɑruɡim kɛ̃.
Kirisi wi, u sɑ̃ɑwɑ bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑru. Sɑnɑm mɛ u koo kurɑmɑ, bɛɛn tii mɑɑ i ko i terɑ kɑ wi sɑnnu win yiiko sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ ɡɑri yiniwɑ bɑ yoruɑ kpɑ i kɑ nɑɑnɛ doke mɑ Yesuwɑ Kirisi wi, Gusunɔn Bii, kpɑ nɑɑnɛ doke binin sɑɑbu i n wɑ̃ɑru mɔ te tɑ ku rɑ kpe win yĩsirun sɔ̃.
Bɛsɛ sɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔɡibu. Bɑɑwure wi u Gusunɔ yɛ̃ u rɑ sun swɑɑ dɑki, ɑdɑmɑ wi u kun Gusunɔ yɛ̃ u ku rɑ sun swɑɑ dɑki. Yenin min diyɑ sɑ ko kpĩ su ɡem kɑ weesu wunɑnɑ.

Tɔn be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ sɑnkɑrɑ kowobu bɛɛn tɔ̃ɔ bɑkɑ ni i rɑ ko kĩrun sɔ̃ sɔɔ, bɑ kɑ bɛɛ dimɔ, kɑ sekuru sɑriru, bɑ ben tii nɔɔrimɔ tɔnɑ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe ɡuru winu ni woo ɡɑ bɔrikiɑmɔ, ni nu ku rɑ kɑ ɡurɑ nɛ. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe dɑ̃ɑ ni nu dɛrurɑ nu ǹ binu mɔ, ni bɑ wukɑ kɑ ɡbiniɔ, ni nu ɡu mɑm mɑm.
Mɑ bɑ bɑrɔbu yɑrɑ swɛɛɔ bɑ bu kpĩ kpin yenu kɑ kɑ̃ɑsu wɔllɔ, n wɑ Piɛɛ ù n sɑrɔ, win tiro ɡu kɑ ben ɡɑbu wukiri.
Yeni kpuron biru i nɑɑnɛ dokebu nɛnuɔ nɡe tɛrɛru kpɑ i kɑ kpĩ i tɔn kɔ̃son sɛ̃ɛ dɔ̃ɔɡinu ɡbɑrɑ.
Ye i mɔ̀ kpuro i ye koowo kɑ kĩru, kpɑ n sɑ̃ɑ nɡe Yinniwɑ i kuɑmmɛ, n ǹ mɔ tɔmbu.
I n tii sɛ kpɑ ɡoo u ku kɑ ɡoo kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑ tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ, kpɑ ɡoo u ku mɑɑ yinɑ u ɡɑ̃ɑ dɛɛrɑnu bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃, nɡe Esɑu wi u bii yerumɑrun tubi dɔrɑ dĩɑ ɡbɛ̃ɛ teerun sɔ̃.
Mɑ be kpuro bɑ ɡbɑ̃sukumɔ kɑ dɑm bɑ mɔ̀, ɑɑwo sɑ ǹ durɔ wi kĩ, Bɑrɑbɑwɑ sɑ kĩ. N deemɑ ɡbɛnɔwɑ Bɑrɑbɑ wi, u sɑ̃ɑ.
Bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ kɔrumɔtɔnuɡibu kɑ lɑsɑbu sɑriruɡibu kɑ be bɑ tii sue bɑ ɡɑ̃ɑmɔ. Bɑ ko n hɑnduniɑn dobun kĩru mɔ n kere Gusunɔn kĩru.
Yen sɑɑbuwɑ Gusunɔ u nùn suɑ wɔllɔ ɡem ɡem mɑ u nùn yĩsiru kɑ̃ te tɑ yĩsɑ kpuro bɛɛrɛ kere.
Kɑ ɡem, sɑ ǹ sukɑ swĩi ye tɔmbɑ kuɑ kɑ ben bwisi, sɑnɑm mɛ sɑ bɛɛ bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisin dɑm kɑ win wurɑmɑru ɡiɑsiɑ. Sɑ win kpɑ̃ɑru wɑwɑ kɑ bɛsɛn nɔni.

Yerɑ u yoruɑ tirenu kpuro sɔɔ mi u ɡɑri yi ɡeruɑ. Win tirenu sɔɔ ɡɑm kɑ ɡɑm wɑ̃ɑ mi n tubusiɑnu sɛ̃, mɑ yɛ̃ru sɑriruɡibu be bɑ ǹ yɔ̃ dim dim, bɑ ɡɑri yi ɡɔsikiɑmɔ, nɡe mɛ bɑ rɑ ko kɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡɛɛ. Nɡe mɛyɑ bɑ kɑ ben tii kɑm kobu ɡɑwemɔ.
Sɑnɑm mɛ ɡɔro be, bɑ ye nuɑ, bɑ ben yɑbenu ɡɛ̃ɛkɑ mɑ bɑ duki dɑ tɔn wɔru ɡen suunu sɔɔ bɑ ɡbɑ̃sukumɔ bɑ nɛɛ,
Nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɑ Kirisi u kuɑ Yuubɑn sɔm kowo u kɑ nɔɔ mwɛɛnu yibiɑ ni bɑ bɑɑbɑbɑ kuɑ, kpɑ u sɔ̃ɔsi mɑ Gusunɔ u sɑ̃ɑ ɡemɡii.
Goo ù n tɑmɑɑ u Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑmɔ mɑ u ǹ win yɑrɑ kpĩɑ, u tii weesu kuɑmmɛwɑ, win sɑ̃ɑru kɑmɑ.
I ɡɑri yi yɑɑyo yi nɑ rɑɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, yoo ku rɑ win yinni kere. Bɑ̀ n mɑn nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ koo mɑɑ bɛɛ nɔni sɔ̃. Bɑ̀ n nɛn ɡɑri mɛm nɔɔwɑ bɑ koo mɑɑ bɛɛɡii mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Yesu u Yuu be bɑ nùn nɑɑnɛ doke sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ì n nɛn sɔ̃ɔsiru mɛm nɔɔwɑ, i sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɛn bwɑ̃ɑbu kɑ ɡem.
Gɔ̃ɔrɑ tunumɑ Eɡibiti kɑ Kɑnɑnin tem sɔɔ tɑ bu nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ too too. Bɛsɛn sikɑdobɑ bɑ ǹ ɡɑ̃ɑnu wɑ bu di.
Nɛn nukurɑ dorɑ ɡem ɡem ye nɑ wɑ wunɛn bibu ɡɑbɑ sĩimɔ ɡem sɔɔ nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ sun yiire.
Wi u kun win dusibu nɔɔri n ku mɑm ko win yɛnuɡibu, wiyɑ u nɑɑnɛ dokebu yinɑ, mɑ u nɑɑnɛ doke sɑriruɡii dukurɑm kerɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i de su Gusunɔ susi kɑ murɑfiti sɑriru kɑ nɑɑnɛ doke bi bu toro sindu mɔ kɑ ɡɔ̃ru dɛɛrɔ ɡe ɡɑ ǹ tɑɑrɛ mɔ kɑ wɑsi yi bɑ dɛɛrɑsiɑ kɑ nim dɛɛrɑm.
Bɑ ɡesi nuɑ mɑ wi u rɑɑ bu nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ, u tɛ̃ Yesun fɑɑbɑn ɡɑri wɑɑsu mɔ̀, yi u rɑɑ kĩ u kɑm koosiɑ.
Nɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ, i dio bɛɛn fɑɑbɑn sɔ̃. Domi bɑɑ bɛɛn wirun seri tiɑ kun borimɔ.
U suuru mɔ, u kɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru tɛmɑnɑ nɛn yĩsirun sɔ̃, u ǹ mɑɑ wɑsire.
A durɔ bukurobu sɔ̃ɔwɔ bu de bɑ n ɡɑyɑ mɔ, kpɑ bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛrɛɡibu kɑ be bɑ tii yɛ̃, kpɑ bɑ n yɔ̃ dim dim nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ kɑ kĩru kɑ tɛmɑnɑbu.
Gusunɔ u ǹ tɔmbun yellun yɛ̃ru sɑriru ɡɑrisi, ɑdɑmɑ tɛ̃ u bɑɑmɑ kpuron tɔmbu woodɑ wɛ̃ɛmɔ bu kɑ ɡɔsirɑ ben kom kɔ̃sum di.
N wee, Yesun mɛro, kɑ win mɛron wɔnɔ, kɑ Mɑɑri Kopɑn kurɔ, kɑ sere Mɑɑri Mɑdɑlɑɡii, bɑ yɔ̃ Yesun dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑrun bɔkuɔ.
U yɑberu sebuɑ te bɑ wɑsɑ yɛm sɔɔ. Win yĩsirɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri.
Adɑmɑ i tii lɑɑkɑri koowo bɛɛn tii mɔɔ te, tu ku rɑɑ de be bɑ ǹ dɑm mɔ bu torɑ.
Gusunɔ u rɑɑ ɡeruɑ u koo nùn seeyɑ ɡɔrin di kpɑ u ku mɑɑ kɔ̃si. Yeyɑ u ɡeruɑ u nɛɛ, “Kon bɛɛ domɑru kuɑ te tɑ dɛɛre tɑ ǹ sikɑ mɔ, tèn nɔɔ mwɛɛru nɑ Dɑfidi kuɑ.”
Dɔmɑ teyɑ i ko n yɛ̃ mɑ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛn Bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ mɑ bɛɛ i wɑ̃ɑ nɛ sɔɔ, mɑ nɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ.
Sɑ̀ n win woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑmmɛ, sɑnɑm mɛyɑ sɑ ko ɡiɑ mɑ sɑ nùn yɛ̃.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɑ nɑ nɛɛ, i ko ɡbi bɛɛn torɑnu sɔɔ. Ì kun nɑɑnɛ doke mɑ nɛnɑ yɛ̃ro wi, kɑ ɡeemɑ i ko ɡbiwɑ bɛɛn torɑnu sɔɔ.
Mɑ nɑ wɑ tɔn be bɑ Yesu nɑɑnɛ doken yɛm kɑ mɑɑ be bɑ win seedɑ din yɛm mu kurɔ wi bɑ̃ɑrumɔ. Ye nɑ nùn wɑ, nɑ biti soorɑ ɡem ɡem.
Amɛn biru bɛɛn tii i yɛ̃ mɑ u kĩɑ win bɑɑbɑ u nùn domɑru kuɑ ɑdɑmɑ u nùn yinɑri domi u ǹ swɑɑ wɑ u kɑ kɔsi ye u kuɑ bɑɑ mɛ u kɑsu kɑ swĩi.
Dɑbirɑ tɔn wɔru ɡe sɔɔ, bɑ sikirinɑmɔ tɛɛru tɛɛru win sɔ̃. Gɑbu bɑ nɛɛ, wi tɔn ɡeowɑ. Mɑ ɡɑbɑ nɛɛ, u tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃kumɔwɑ.
Yinni Gusunɔn dɑm mu wɑ̃ɑ kɑ be, mɑ tɔn dɑbinu nu ɡɑri yi nɑɑnɛ doke mɑ nu ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑ nu wurɑ Yinnin mi.
Adɑmɑ, nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ sun nɑɑnɛ kuɑ u kɑ sun Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ nɔmu sɔndiɑ, nɡe mɛyɑ sɑ kɑ ye kpɑrɑmɔ. Sɑ ǹ ye mɔ̀ nɡe mɛ yɑ koo kɑ tɔmbu dore mɑ n kun mɔ Gusunɔ wi u bɛsɛn ɡɔ̃rusu wɛ̃ɛrimɔ.
Yen sɔ̃, su Gusunɔ siɑrɑ wi u sun nɑsɑrɑ wɛ̃ɛmɔ sɑɑ Yesu Kirisi bɛsɛn Yinnin min di.
Kurɔ wi u sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔmini kɑ ɡem wiyɑ wi u ǹ ɡoo mɔ wi u koo nùn nɔɔri. Win yĩiyɔbu wɑ̃ɑwɑ Gusunɔ sɔɔ kpɑ u n kɑnɑru mɔ̀ u n win somiru bikiɑmɔ bururu kɑ yokɑ.
Sere kɑ tɛ̃ i ǹ ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑnu kɑnɛ kɑ nɛn yĩsiru. I bikio, i ko wɑ, kpɑ bɛɛn nuku dobu bu kɑ yibu.
À n sɑ̃ɑn nɑ yoo bɑ kɑ nun sokɑ, ɑ ku yeni ɡɑrisi. Adɑmɑ bɑ̀ n nun tii mɔru wɛ̃ ɑ mɔɔ.
Beyɑ bɑ kɑ kɑrɑnɑɑ nɑɑmɔ, bɑ ben tiin bwisikunu mɔ̀, bɑ ǹ Hunde Dɛɛro mɔ.
N mɑn biti kuɑ, wee, i yɛ̃ro derimɔ fuuku fuuku wi u bɛɛ sokɑ kɑ Kirisin durom, mɑ i kĩ i Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ ɡɑɑ swĩi.
I hɑniɑ koowo i n kɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɑ tɔmbu kpuro kpɑ i n wɑ̃ɑru dimɔ te tɑ dɛɛre, domi ɡoo sɑri wi u koo Yinni wɑ, win wɑ̃ɑru tɑ̀ kun dɛɛre.
Mɑ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, i bɛɛn yɑ̃ɑkororu kɔ̃ɔwɔ ɡoo ɡen nɔm ɡeuɔ, i ko ɡɑ̃ɑnu wɑ mi. Bɑ kuɑ mɛ, mɑ bɑ kpɑnɑ bu tu ɡɑwɑ swɛ̃ɛ dɑbirun sɔ̃.
Bɑnɡo nɡe bɑnɡo sɑriru, yen ɡɑɑ kun sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑnu, ɑdɑmɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑrin mɛm nɔɔbɑ bu sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu.
Wi u tɔmbu dɑm kɛ̃mɔ, u ku wɛ̃rɑ. Wi u kɛ̃nu wɛ̃ɛmɔ, u wɛ̃ɛyɔ kɑ ɡɔ̃ru tiɑ. Wiruɡii u win sɔmburu ko kɑ hɑniɑ. Wi u wɔnwɔndu mɔ̀, u koowo kɑ nuku dobu.
u bu bikiɑ u nɛɛ, Hunde Dɛɛro u duɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ sɑnɑm mɛ i nɑɑnɛ doke? Bɑ nùn wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, ɑɑwo sɑ ǹ mɑm nɔɔre mɑ Hunde Dɛɛro wɑ̃ɑ.
Goo ù n yinɑ u ɡɑri yi mɛm nɔɔwɑ yi sɑ yoruɑ tire teni sɔɔ, i n nùn lɑɑkɑri sɑ̃ɑ kpɑ i kun mɑɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu mɔɔsinɛ kɑ wi, n wɑ sekuru tu nùn mwɑ.
Nɛɡibu yeniwɑ nɑ ɡerumɔ, mɑ ye yɑ yɑɑ kɑ yɛm mɔ, yɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ yu bɔnu wɑ mi Gusunɔ u bɑndu swĩi. Ye yɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔɔɡiɑ yɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ yɑ n wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe mɔ.
I ku dĩɑ ni nu rɑ kɔ̃si tɔnɑn sɔmburu ko, ɑdɑmɑ i dĩɑ ni nu wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe wɛ̃ɛmɔn sɔmburu koowo. Dĩɑ niyɑ Tɔnun Bii u koo bɛɛ wɛ̃ yèn sɔ̃ wiyɑ Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ u win yiikon yĩreru dokeɑ.
Ì n mɑɑ bikiɑ i ku rɑ wɑ yèn sɔ̃ torɑrɑ i kɑ bikiɑmɔ kpɑ i kɑ ye dendi bɛɛn tii tiin kĩru sɔɔ.
I n Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ tɑkɑru mɔ̀ sɑɑ bɑɑyere ɡɑ̃ɑnu kpuron sɔ̃ kɑ bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisin yĩsiru. wɑ̃ɑsinɑɑ
Nɡe mɛ bɑ yoruɑ, “Aburɑhɑmu u Gusunɔ nɑɑnɛ doke, yen sɔ̃nɑ Gusunɔ u nùn ɡɑrisi ɡemɡii.”
Wuu ɡe, ɡɑ ǹ mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔ ǹ kun mɛ surun bukɑtɑ mɔ ɡɑ n kɑ yɑm dɛɛre, yèn sɔ̃ Gusunɔn yiikon ɡirimɑ bɑllimɔ ɡe sɔɔ, mɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm te, tɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡen fitilɑ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ, i ǹ mɑɑ bɛɛn dɑɑn wɑ̃ɑru wɑ̃ɑ mɑ n kun mɔ Gusunɔn Hundeɡiru yèn sɔ̃ win Hunde u wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ. Wunɛ wi ɑ kun Kirisin Hunde mɔ, ɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ wiɡii.
Be mɑɑ, bɑ̀ n ben nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɑriru deri, bɑ koo bu ɡɛrɛfe ko mi bɑ rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ domi Gusunɔ u koo kpĩ u kpɑm bu ɡɛrɛfe ko.
Goo kun weesu nɔɔre ben nɔɔn di, bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ tɑɑrɛ sɑriruɡibu.
Adɑmɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ teenɑ nɑ wurɑ wunɛn wuswɑɑɔ, nɑ Gusunɔ bɛsɛn sikɑdobɑn Yinni sɑ̃ɑmɔ kɑ swɑɑ ye beni bɑ sokumɔ weesuɡiɑ. Nɑ mɑɑ Mɔwisin woodɑ kpuro nɑɑnɛ doke kɑ mɑɑ Gusunɔn sɔmɔbun tirenu.
I kun ɡoon dibu nɛni mɑ n kun mɔ i n kĩɑnɛ, domi wi u win tɔnusi kĩ u woodɑ yibiɑwɑ.
Mɑ tɔmbɑ dɔ̃ɔ kpɑkirirɑ yɑm susu bɑkɑrun sɔ̃. Mɑ bɑ Gusunɔn yĩsiru ɡɑri kɑm ɡerusi wi u yiiko mɔ ɡbee swɑ̃ɑ nin wɔllɔ. Adɑmɑ bɑ yinɑ bu ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑ bu nùn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Mɑ ɡbɑ̃rɑ bɑkɑrɑ ɡu sikerenɛ te tɑ kɔnnɔsu wɔkurɑ yiru mɔ, mɑ wɔllun ɡɔrɑdobɑ wɔkurɑ yiru bɑ kɔnnɔ si kɔ̃su. Kɔnnɔ si sɔɔrɑ Isirelin bibun bwesenu wɔkurɑ yirun yĩsɑ yoruɑ.
Adɑmɑ Kirisi u sun yɑkiɑ sɑɑ woodɑn bɔ̃rin di sɑnɑm mɛ u kuɑ wi bɑ bɔ̃rusi bɛsɛn sɔ̃. Nɡe mɛ Gusunɔn ɡɑri yi ɡerumɔ, “Bɑɑwure wi bɑ bwɛ̃ dɑ̃ru sɔɔ, u kuɑ bɔ̃ruro.”
I nuɑ nɡe mɛ nɛn wɑ̃ɑrɑ rɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑmɔ nɡe mɛ Yuubɑ bɑ rɑ ko. Nɑ rɑ n Gusunɔn yiɡbɛru nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ n bɑndɑ n kɑ tu kɑm koosiɑ.
U yɑɑ binti binti te sɛ̃re ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑsɔn wɑɑ ye bɑ mɔ̀ Yibirisi kɑ Setɑm, mɑ u ye bɔkuɑ kɑ yɔni yi, sere wɔ̃ɔ nɔrɔbu (1.000).
Durɔ ɡoo wɑ̃ɑ wuu ɡe sɔɔ, wi bɑ rɑ nɛɛ Simɔɔ. U rɑ n kɑ dobo dobo mɑɑmɑɑki dɑbiru mɔ̀ Sɑmɑriɡibun wuswɑɑɔ, u mɑɑ tii ɡɑrisi tɔn boko.
Ye nɑ kĩ, yeyɑ n Kirisi ɡiɑ, kɑ mɑɑ dɑm mɛ u kɑ seewɑ ɡɔrin di kpɑ nɑ n bɔnu mɔ win wɑhɑlɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ n kɑ nùn weenɑ win ɡɔɔ sɔɔ,
A ku mɑɑ sɛndɑ ɑ kɑ ɡoo nɔmɑ sɔndi. Mɛyɑ, ɑ ku mɑɑ de ɑ n bɔnu mɔ ɡɑbun torɑnu sɔɔ. A tii nɛnuɔ dɛɛrɑru sɔɔ.
Mɛyɑ mɑɑ kurɔ tɔkɔnu, ɑ nu sɔ̃ɔwɔ nu de nin sɑnu sɑnusu su n dɛɛre, kpɑ nu kun sɑ̃ɑ tɔn wĩɔbu ǹ kun mɛ tɑm yobu. N weenɛwɑ nu n bwisi ɡee sɔ̃ɔsimɔ
Nɡe mɛyɑ wi u derɑ bɑ win bii wɔndiɑ kurɔ kpɑɑru suɑ u ɡeɑ kuɑ, ɑdɑmɑ wi u ǹ dere bɑ nùn sue, wiyɑ kuɑ n kere.
Adɑmɑ i de i ko ɡɑri yin kowobu, n ǹ mɔ yin nɔwɔbu tɔnɑ be bɑ tii nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ.
Amɛn biru Yesu u sĩimɔ Gɑlilen tem sɔɔ. U ǹ kĩ u dɑ Yudeɑn tem ɡiɑ yèn sɔ̃ Yuubɑ bɑ swɑɑ kɑsu bu kɑ nùn ɡo.
Adɑmɑ u derɑ i ɡbinnɛ kɑ Yesu Kirisi mɑ u nùn kuɑ bɛsɛn bwisi kɑ bɛsɛn ɡem. Wi sɔɔrɑ sɑ mɑɑ dɛɛrɑru kɑ yɑkiɑbu wɑ.
U nim sɔke ɡbɛ̃ɛru sɔɔ, u kɑ win bwɑ̃ɑbun nɑɑsu teɑmɔ, mɑ u si sunkumɔ kɑ yɑsɑ ye u sɛ̃ke.
Nɑ mɑɑ swɑɑ yen tɔmbu nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ ɡoo ɡookum, nɑ yen tɔn durɔbu kɑ tɔn kurɔbu mwɛɛrɑ nɑ bɔkuɑ nɑ pirisɔm doke.
Win sɔ̃nɑ sikirinɔ ɡɑ duɑ tɔn wɔru ɡe sɔɔ.
Nɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ, i Gusunɔn tɔn be bɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ kpɑro kɑ kĩru nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ u kĩ, n ǹ mɔ kɑ tilɑsi ǹ kun mɛ kɔsiɑ bɑkɑrun sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ i tii wɛ̃ɛyɔ bɛɛn sɔmburu sɔɔ.
Gɔɔn sɔsɔ dɛ̃ɛɡirɑ torɑru, torɑrun dɑm mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ woodɑ.
Wee, i ǹ sɔm kowobu ben ɡobi kɔsie be bɑ kɑ bɛɛ dĩɑnu ɡurɑ ɡberɔ, mɑ ɡobi yi, yi wuri mɔ̀. Dĩɑ ɡuro ben wuri mɑɑ dumɔ wɔllu kɑ tem Yinnin swɑɑ sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i kɔ̃sɑ kpuro derio kɑ weesu kpuro kɑ murɑfitiru, kɑ nisinu, kɑ tɔn yɑɑ kɑsikibu.
Tɔn kurɔ u ko n kɑ win durɔ ɡbinnɛwɑ win durɔn wɑ̃ɑrun tɔ̃ru kpuro sɔɔ, ɑdɑmɑ durɔ wi, ù n ɡu, kurɔ wi, u tii mɔ u kɑ durɔ kpɑo suɑ wi u kĩ, yɛ̃ro u n ɡesi sɑ̃ɑ Yinniɡii.
Bɑ ɡem swɑɑ deri mɑ bɑ ɡɑbun nɑɑnɛ dokebu surɑmɔ, domi bɑ nɛɛ, ɡɔribun seebu sɑrɑ kɔ.
Sɑ̀ n ɡbinnɛ kɑ Yesu Kirisi, bɑnɡo ǹ kun mɛ bɑnɡo sɑriru yɑ ǹ ɡɑ̃ɑnu. Ye n sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu yeyɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu bi bu sɔmburu mɔ̀ kɑ kĩru.
Ye u yibɑ u kpɑ, u kɑ fɑɑbɑ nɑ ye yɑ ku rɑ kpe, be kpuron sɔ̃ be bɑ nùn mɛm nɔɔwɑ.
Tɛ̃, ɡobin ɡɑri yi bɑ sɔkumɔ nɑɑnɛ dokeobun sɔ̃. N weenɛ i ko nɡe mɛ nɑ Yesun yiɡbɛnu sɔ̃ɔwɑ Gɑlɑtiɔ.
Bɛɛ kurɔbu, i bɛɛn durɔbu wiru kpĩiyɔ nɡe mɛ i ko Yinni kuɑ.
Yen biru Yesu u kpɑm kɑ tɔmbu ɡɑri kuɑ u nɛɛ, nɛnɑ hɑnduniɑn yɑm bururɑm. Wi u mɑn swĩi, u ko n yɑm bururɑm mɔ mɛ mu sɑ̃ɑ wɑ̃ɑru, u ǹ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ u sĩ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ nɛn kĩnɑsibu, n weenɛ i ɡɑri yi yɑɑyɑ yi bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu Kirisin ɡɔrobɑ rɑɑ ɡeruɑ.
Tɔmbun nɔmɑ kun kpɛ̃ yu nùn nɔɔri, domi u ǹ ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑnun bukɑtɑ mɔ. Win tii tiiwɑ u yɑbu bɑɑyere wɑ̃ɑru kɑ wɛ̃siɑru kɑ bukɑtɑ kpuro wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Bɛsɛ sɑ tɔmbun seedɑ wurɑmɔ, ɑdɑmɑ Gusunɔn seedɑ kpɑ̃ɑru kere mɛ, domi Gusunɔn seedɑ sɑ̃ɑ seedɑ ye u win Bii diiyɑ.
Adɑmɑ i Yinni Yesu Kirisin dɑɑ sebuo, kpɑ i ku bɛɛn tiin dɑɑn bwisikunu ko i kɑ yen binɛ wunɑ.
Nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃nɑ Yerikon ɡbɑ̃rɑrɑ kɑ wɔrumɑ ye Isirelibɑ bɑ wuu ɡe sikerenɑ sɔ̃ɔ nɔɔbɑ yiru.
Gusunɔ u Pɔlu dɑm wɛ̃ u kɑ sɔm mɑɑmɑɑki dɑmɡinu ko
Yesu u nɛɛ, ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, bɑɑwure wi u durum mɔ̀, wiyɑ durum yoo.
Nɛn kĩnɑsibu, Gusunɔ ù n sun kĩ too nɡe mɛ, n weenɛ bɛsɛn tii su mɑɑ kĩɑnɑ.
A mɑn wɑ̃ɑrun swɛɛ sɔ̃ɔsi. Nɑ̀ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wunɛ, ko nɑ n nuku dobu yibɑ.”
Sere n kɑ tunumɑ, ɑ n tɔmbu Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡɑriɑmmɛ kpɑ ɑ n bu dɑm kɛ̃mɔ kpɑ ɑ n bu keu sɔ̃ɔsimɔ.
Sɑ wɑhɑlɑ bwese bwesekɑ wɑɑmɔ ɑdɑmɑ sɑ ǹ wɔkɔnu wɔrɑ. Sɑ wurure ɑdɑmɑ sɑ ǹ kom yɑɑ bie.
Adɑmɑ ɡɑbu bɑ bu yɑɑkoru mɔ̀ bɑ nɛɛ, tɑmɑ tɔn be, bɑ nɔrɑ.
Bɑ wuu ɡen ɡbɑ̃rɑru kuɑwɑ kɑ kpee ɡobiɡinu ni nu nɔni bwese bwesekɑ mɔ mɑ bɑ wuu ɡen tii kuɑ kɑ wurɑn tii tii ye yɑ dɛɛre nɡe diki.
Wɔllun ɡɔrɑdobɑ nɔɔbɑ yiru be bɑ ɡbee swɑ̃ɑnu nɔɔbɑ yiru nɛni mi, bɑ yɑrɑ sɑ̃ɑ yee ten min di. Bɑ yɑ̃ɑ kpikinu sebuɑ ni nu dɛɛre wɑsɑ wɑsɑ mɑ bɑ kpɑki wurɑɡii sɛ̃ke ben ɡɑ̃ɑsɔ.
I bu domɑru kuo be bɑ bɛɛ nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ. I ku bu bɔ̃rusi.
Win nɑɑsu bɑllimɔwɑ nɡe sii ɡɑn te bɑ yɑniɑ bɑ teɑ, mɑ win nɔɔ ɡɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe surun bɑkɑru.
Nɑ bu wunɛn yĩsiru ɡiɑsiɑ, mɛyɑ kon kpɑm bu tu ɡiɑsiɑm sosi, kĩi te ɑ mɑn kĩɑ tɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ be sɔɔ, kpɑ nɑ n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ be sɔɔ.
Gusunɔ wi u kun win tiin Bii tii yiiye, ɑdɑmɑ u nùn wɛ̃ bɛsɛ kpuron sɔ̃, u ǹ koo mɑɑ sun kpuro kɛ̃ kɑ Bii wi sɑnnu kɔsiɑru sɑri?
Domi bɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔwɑ mɑ sɑnɑm dɑ̃ɑkim sɔɔ tɔn yɑɑko kowobɑ koo nɑ be Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ɛ sɑrirɑ koo de ben binɛ yɑ n bu kpɑre.
ɑ ku kɑ̃ɑsi yi woo kɑnɛ. À n woo kɑnɑmɔ, ɑ yɑɑyo mɑ n ǹ wunɛ ɑ ɡbinɑ sɔɔwɑ, ɡbinɑ yɑ nun sɔɔwɑ.
Sɑ ǹ kĩ su bɛɛ dɑm dɔre bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ, sɑ kĩwɑ su sɔmburu ko kɑ bɛɛ sɑnnu bɛɛn nuku dobun sɔ̃. Domi i yɔ̃ dim dim bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ.
N wee durɔ ɡoo wi bɑ rɑ soku Lɑsɑɑ wi u wɑ̃ɑ Betɑniɔ u bɑrɑ. Betɑni sɑ̃ɑwɑ Mɑɑri kɑ win mɔɔ Mɑɑtɑn wuu.
Yen sɔ̃, bɑɑwure wi u sɔ̃ɔsi te yinɑ, n ǹ tɔnun ɡere u yinɑ, Gusunɔn ɡerewɑ u yinɑ wi u bɛɛ win Hunde Dɛɛro kɑ̃.
Yenin min diyɑ i ko kpĩ i tubu be bɑ Gusunɔn Hunde mɔ. Bɑɑwure wi u wurɑ mɑ Yesu Kirisi u kuɑ tɔnu, wiyɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔɡii.
Kɑ mɛ, tɔn kɔ̃so be mɑɑ, ben bwisikunu sɔɔ bɑ kɑ torɑnu tii disi dokemɔ, bɑ ǹ wiruɡibu wiru kpĩiyɑmmɛ mɑ bɑ wɔllun yiikoɡibu wɔmmɔ.
U de u kɔ̃sɑ suuri kpɑ u ɡeɑ ko, kpɑ u n ɑlɑfiɑ nɑɑ ɡire.

i n tɛmɑnɛ i n tɑ̃sɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu sɔɔ dim dim, kpɑ i ku rɑ bɛɛn yĩiyɔbu deri bi i mɔ sɑɑ mìn di i Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ nuɑ, ye bɑ tɔnu bɑɑwure nɔɔsiɑ wi u wɑ̃ɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ. Nɛ Pɔlu nɑ mɑɑ kuɑ yen sɔmɔ. nɔmu sɔndiɑ Yesun yiɡbɛrun sɔ̃
Mɑ bɑ kpenu suɑ bu kɑ nùn kɑsuku, ɑdɑmɑ u kukurɑ u yɑrɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun di.
kpɑ i dɑɑ kpɑɑ sebe ye yɑ kɑ Gusunɔɡiɑ weenɛ mɑ yɑ sɔ̃ɔsirɑmɔ wɑ̃ɑ ɡeeru sɔɔ te tɑ dɛɛre mɑ tɑ wee sɑɑ ɡem ɡɑrin min di.
Gɑri yi sɔɔ, n weenɛ nɑɑnɛ dokeobu bu tɛmɑnɑ, be bɑ Gusunɔn woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑ mɑ bɑ Yesu nɑɑnɛ kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ u nùn seeyɑ ɡɔrin di.
Nɛn tiiwɑ yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro ɡeo. Yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro ɡeo u rɑ win wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃wɑ win yɑ̃ɑnun sɔ̃.
Nɑ yĩiyɔ kɑm kɑm mɑ i nuɑ kɔ nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ u mɑn durom kuɑ n kɑ sɔmbu teni ko bɛɛn ɑrufɑɑnin sɔ̃,
Wi u kɑrɑnɑɑ dokemɔ, ɑ nùn ɡerusio nɡe nɔn yiru ɑ sere nùn fɛ̃rɑ bee tiɑ.
Ye Yuubɑ bɑ yeni nuɑ, sikirinɔ ɡɑ kpɑm duɑ ben suunu sɔɔ ɡɑri yin sɔ̃.
Bɑɑwure wi u win ɑreru wurɑ, u seedɑ diwɑ mɑ Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑ ɡeeɡii.
Yen sɑɑbu kĩnɑsibu, nɡe mɛ i tɔ̃ɔ te mɑrɑ, i kookɑri koowo u kɑ bɛɛ deemɑ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ kpɑ i kun disinu kɑ torɑru mɔ.
Ye n tie nɛɡibu, i sun kɑnɑru kuo kpɑ Yinnin ɡɑri yi wɑ yi kpɑrɑrɑ fuuku, kpɑ yi n yiiko mɔ nɡe mɛ yi kuɑ bɛɛn suunu sɔɔ.
Sɑ yɛ̃ kɑ ɡem mɑ wi u Yinni Yesu seeyɑ ɡɔrin di, u koo mɑɑ sun seeyɑ kɑ Yesu sɑnnu kpɑ u de bɛsɛ kɑ bɛɛ su yinnɑ win wuswɑɑɔ.
Bɛɛn ɡoowɑ bɑrɔ? U Yesun yiɡbɛ tɔnwerobu sokusio. Berɑ bɑ koo nùn ɡum tɑ̃re kɑ Yinnin yĩsiru kpɑ bu nùn kɑnɑru koosi.
Sɑnɑm mɛ u wɔ̃ɔ weeru turɑ, u ɡɔ̃ru doke u win tɔmbu Isirelibɑ berɑm dɑ.
Yuubɑ bɑ durɔ wi mwɑwɑ, bɑ kĩ bu nùn ɡo. Ye nɑ ɡiɑ mɑ u sɑ̃ɑ Romuɡii, yeyɑ nɑ dɑ kɑ nɛn tɑbu kowobu nɑ nùn wɔrɑ. Yen biru nɑ kɑ nùn dɑ ben ɡuro ɡurobun wuswɑɑɔ.
Mɑ wuuɡibu kpuro bɑ burinɑmɔ. Tɔn wɔru ɡɑ duki dɑɑmɔ diru mi bɑ rɑ dwee. Mɑ bɑ Pɔlun kpɑɑsibu yiru ɡɑwɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ mi. Beyɑ Gɑyusi kɑ Aritɑɑki be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ Mɑsedɔniɡibu.
Adɑmɑ bɛɛ i nùn yinɑ wi, wi u sɑ̃ɑ tɔn dɛɛro kɑ ɡemɡii, mɑ i Pilɑti bikiɑ u bɛɛ tɔn ɡowo kɑrɑ.
U ǹ ɡɑ̃ɑnu wunɑnɛ bɛsɛ kɑ ben suunu sɔɔ. U mɑɑ ben ɡɔ̃rusu dɛɛrɑsiɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃ nɡe mɛ u sun kuɑ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, bɑɑwure u tii wɛ̃ɛri u sere pɛ̃ɛ ye di u mɑɑ kɑ sere nɔrɑ ye nɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ kĩnɑsibu, i yɔ̃ro dim dim kɑ tɛmɑnɑbu, i n hɑniɑ mɔ̀ Yinnin sɔmburu sɔɔ bɑɑdommɑ kpɑ i n yɛ̃ mɑ sɔmbu te i Yinni kuɑmmɛ tɑ ǹ kɑm mɔ̀.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, nɑ bɛɛ yiiremɔ i n dɑ mɑn sɑɑri.
Domi Gusunɔn bwisi sɔɔ u ǹ dere hɑnduniɑɡibu bɑ nùn ɡie kɑ ben tiin bwisi. Yen sɔ̃nɑ n nùn wɛ̃re u kɑ tɔmbu fɑɑbɑ ko be bɑ nùn nɑɑnɛ doke, kɑ win ɡɑrin wɑɑsu yi bɑ tɑmɑɑ wiirɑru.
Bɛɛ mɑɑ kurɔbu, i bɛɛn durɔbu wiru kpĩiyɔ, kpɑ bɑɑ ben ɡɑbu bɑ̀ kun Gusunɔn ɡɑri nɑɑnɛ doke, bɛɛn dɑɑ yu de bu nɑɑnɛ doke. N ǹ mɑɑ tilɑsi i ɡɑri ɡere,
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, sɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ Kirisin sɔmɔbu. N sɑ̃ɑre Gusunɔ win tii u bɛɛ sokumɔ bɛsɛn min di. Yen sɔ̃, sɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ kɑ Kirisin yĩsiru, i de i dorɑ kɑ Gusunɔ.
Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ u nùn wɔrɑ ɡɔɔn wɑhɑlɑn nɔmun di ye u kɑ nùn seeyɑ ɡɔrin di. Gɔɔ kun kpĩɑ u nùn nɛnuɑ win dɑm sɔɔ.
Beyɑ bɑ mɑɑ yĩsi ɡee te ɡɑri kɑm ɡerusimɔ te Gusunɔ u bɛɛ wɛ̃.
Kpɑ u kun sɑ̃ɑ tɑm nɔro ǹ kun mɛ sɑnnɔ kĩro ɑdɑmɑ u n sɑ̃ɑ suuruɡii wi u ɑlɑfiɑ kĩ, kpɑ u kun sɑ̃ɑ ɡobin kĩro.

Adɑmɑ bɑɑwure wi u koo nim nɔ, mɛ kon nùn kɛ̃, nim nɔru ɡɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɛ̃ro mɔ̀ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Domi nim mɛ nɑ kon nùn kɛ̃ mu koo ko bwiɑ yɛ̃ro sɔɔ, ye yɑ ko n nim sumɔ, mɛ mu tɔnu wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Adɑmɑ wi u win ɡɑri mɛm nɔɔwɑ, wi sɔɔrɑ Gusunɔn kĩrɑ yibɑ kɑ ɡem. Amɛniwɑ sɑ ko n kɑ yɛ̃ mɑ sɑ ɡbinnɛ kɑ wi.
Mɑ nɑ wɛrɛkunu itɑ wɑ ni nu tii ɡɔsiɑ nɡe surenu, nu yɑrimɔ yɑɑ binti binti ten nɔɔn di kɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ yen nɔɔn di kɑ mɑɑ sɔmɔ weesuɡiin nɔɔn di.
Kɑ ɡem, ɡeɑ i mɔ̀, ì n bɑn te Gusunɔ u swĩin woodɑ mɛm nɔɔwɑ nɡe mɛ Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡeruɑ yi nɛɛ, “A wunɛn tɔnusi kĩɔ nɡe wunɛn tii tii.”
Kɑ ɡem, n ǹ bɛsɛn tiin ɡɑri sɑ wɑɑsu mɔ̀. Sɑ ɡerumɔwɑ mɑ Yesu Kirisiwɑ sɑ̃ɑ Yinni mɑ bɛsɛ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn yobu Yesun sɔ̃.
I ku de bu bɛɛ nɔni wɔ̃ke. Kpɑɑsi kɔ̃sobɑ bɑ rɑ dɑɑ ɡeɑ sɑnku.
Gusunɔ wi u ɑlɑfiɑ wɛ̃ɛmɔ u bɛsɛn Yinni Yesu seeyɑ ɡɔrin di, mɑ Yesu wi, u kuɑ bɛsɛn yɑ̃ɑ kpɑro boko win yɛm sɔ̃ mɛ mu nɔɔ mwɛɛ te tɑ ku rɑ kpen ɡɑri sire.

I ɡesi de bɛɛn sɑnu sɑnusu su n kɑ Kirisin Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ weenɛ. Nɡe mɛyɑ, nɑ̀ n nɑ bɛɛn mi, ǹ kun mɛ nɑ̀ kun nɛ, kon bɛɛn bɑɑru nɔ mɑ i yɔ̃ dim dim i nɔɔ nɛ, mɑ i sunɑmɔ sɑnnu kɑ ɡɔ̃ru teu nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃ bi bu wee Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑn di.
Gusunɔ wi u Yinni seesiɑ, u koo mɑɑ sun seesiɑ kɑ win dɑm.
Yenin sɔ̃nɑ nɑ nun yɑɑyɑsiɑmɔ, ɑ kɛ̃ɛ te dɔ̃ɔ yɑbio te Gusunɔ u nun wɛ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ nɑ nun nɔmɑ sɔndi.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ bɑ rɑɑ bu Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ wɑɑsu kuɑ be bɑ ɡu kpɑ ben hunde yɑ n kɑ wɑsi nɡe mɛ Gusunɔ u wɑsi, bɑɑ mɛ bɑ bu siri nɡe tɔmbu hɑnduniɑn wɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. sɔmburu mɔ̀ dee dee
Bɑ bɛɛ dwɑ ɡeeru nɔru sɑri. Yen sɔ̃, i ku de i n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔmbun yobu.
Su ku mɑɑ wɔki nɡe mɛ ben ɡɑbu bɑ kuɑ, mɑ ɡɔɔn ɡɔrɑdo u bu ɡo.
Sɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe ɡɑbu be bɑ kɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri tenkuru mɔ̀. Adɑmɑ, yèn sɔ̃ Gusunɔwɑ u sun ɡɔrimɑ, yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ ɡɑri ɡerumɔ kɑ murɑfiti sɑriru win wuswɑɑɔ nɡe Kirisin sɔmɔbu.
Tɛ̃ bɛsɛ be sɑ dɑm mɔ, n weenɛ su be bɑ kun dɑm mɔn dɑm sɑriru sɔbe, kpɑ su ku ɡɔsi ye n ko n sun dore bɛsɛ tɔnɑ.
Nɑ nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ mɑ Yinni u koo de n nɑ bɛɛn mi nɛn tii ǹ n sosi.
Yen biruwɑ nɑ wɔllun ɡɔrɑdobɑ nnɛ wɑ bɑ yɔ̃ hɑnduniɑn ɡoonu nnɛ sɔɔ bɑ hɑnduniɑn wosu nnɛ nɛni, kpɑ woo ɡu ku kɑ ko tem sɔɔ, kɑ nimɔ, kpɑ ɡu ku dɑ̃ru ɡɑru yĩiri.
Geemɑ, ɡɑsɔn sɑɑ ye i rɑɑ di i kɑ kuɑ ye tɔn tukobɑ rɑ kɑ̃, yɑ turɑ. I rɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ sɔɔ kɑ binɛ kɑ ɑkɑ tɑm nɔrubu kɑ tɑm nɔrubun wɔrusu kɑ bũu sɑ̃ɑru te Gusunɔ u yinɑ.
Goo ù n kĩ u bu kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ, dɔ̃ɔwɑ rɑ yɑri ben nɔsun di u ben yibɛrɛbɑ kpeerɑsiɑ, nɡe mɛyɑ wi u kɑsu u bu kɔ̃sɑ kuɑ, u koo kɑ ɡbi.
Pɔlu u nɛɛ, mɛro bisibu nɑ ǹ yɛ̃ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwerowɑ. Domi Gusunɔn ɡɑri yi nɛɛ, “I ku bɛɛn tɔmbun wiruɡiin kɔ̃sɑ ɡere.”
Adɑmɑ kom kɔ̃sum kowobɑ kun duɔ wuu ɡe sɔɔ, kɑ dobo dobo kowobu kɑ sɑkɑrɑ kowobu kɑ tɔn ɡowobu kɑ bũu sɑ̃ɔbu kɑ bɑɑwure wi u weesu kĩ u mɔ̀.

Adɑmɑ kɑ mɛ, ɡɑ̃ɑnu fiiko ni nɑ nùn wɑɑsi wee, ɡɑbɑ nùn wɑ̃ɑsi be bɑ Bɑlɑmun sɔ̃ɔsiru swĩi. Bɑlɑmu wi, u rɑ n Bɑlɑki sɔ̃ɔsimɔ nɡe mɛ u koo ko u kɑ Isirelibɑ torɑsiɑ, kpɑ bu bũu sɑ̃ɑ dĩɑnu di, kpɑ bu kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑ tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ.
Bɛsɛɡibu, n weenɛ sɑ n Gusunɔ siɑrɑmɔ sɑɑ bɑɑyere bɛɛn sɔ̃. N wɑ̃ sɑ n mɔ̀ mɛ yèn sɔ̃ bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebu bu sosimɔ ɡem ɡem, mɑ kĩi te i mɔ bɛɛn tii tiinɛ sɔɔ tɑ mɑɑ kpɛ̃ɑmɔ tɑ sosimɔ.
I yɛ̃ mɑ sɑnɑm mɛ i ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃, bɑ rɑ n bɛɛ ɡɑwewɑ bũnun yirɑɔ, ni nu ku rɑ ɡɑri ɡere.
Bɛɛ mɑɑ durɔbu i bɛɛn kurɔbu kĩɔ, nɡe mɛ Kirisi u win yiɡbɛru kĩɑ mɑ u win wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ ten sɔ̃.
I ku ɡoo kɔ̃sɑ kɔsie. I ɡeɑ kɑsuo tɔmbu kpuron nɔni sɔɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i tii kɑwo kpɑ i tii deri Gusunɔn nɔm dɑmɡuuɔ, kpɑ u bɛɛ suɑ wɔllɔ sɑɑ ye u yi yɑ̀ n turɑ.
Adɑmɑ u ǹ tii deri seedɑ sɑri, u ɡeɑ kuɑ, u bɛɛ ɡurɑ nɛɛsiɑmmɛ i kɑ dĩɑnu wɑ ɡbeɑɔ nin sɑɑ sɔɔ, kpɑ i n kɑ nuku dobu mɔ.
Nɡe mɛyɑ n mɑɑ weenɛ kurɔbun tii bɑ n sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ koo bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃, kpɑ bɑ kun sɑ̃ɑ tɔn wĩɔbu mɑ n kun mɔ ɡɑyɑɡibu be bɑ nɑɑnɛ mɔ kpuro sɔɔ.
Nɑ nùn ɑyeru wɛ̃ u kɑ ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsiɑ ɑdɑmɑ u ǹ kĩ u win kom bɛrɛtɛkɛ deri.

N wee Herodu u kɑ Tiriɡibu kɑ Sidoniɡibu mɔru bɑrɑ ɡem ɡem. Yen sɔ̃nɑ tɔn be, bɑ kpɑrɑnɑ bɑ dɑ win mi sɑnnu. Gbiikɑɑ bɑ kɑ Bɑlɑtu bɔrɔnu kuɑ wi u sɑ̃ɑ sinɑ bokon yɛnun sɔm kowobun wiruɡii. Yen biru bɑ dɑ Herodun mi bu kɑ nùn suuru kɑnɑ, domi ben temɡibu bɑ ben dĩɑnu wɑɑmɔwɑ sɑɑ Herodun tem di.
Yesu u bu wisɑ u nɛɛ, nɑ ǹ wɛrɛkunu mɔ. Nɛn Bɑɑbɑwɑ nɑ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ ɑdɑmɑ bɛɛ i ǹ mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Wee dɑɑ bureru tɑ burinɑmɔ yèn sɔ̃ woo dɑmɡuu ɡɑ mɔ̀.
Nɑ ǹ sɑɑ yenin nɔni swɑ̃ɑru ɡɑrisi ɡɑ̃ɑnu yiiko ye sɑ ko rɑ wɑn sɔ̃.
Nɑ bɛɛ yoruɑmmɛ nɛn bibu, yèn sɔ̃ bɑ bɛɛ bɛɛn torɑnu kpeesiɑ Yesun yĩsirun sɔ̃.
Wiyɑ u sun fɑɑbɑ kuɑ mɑ u sun sokɑ sɑ n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ win tiin tɔmbu, n ǹ mɔ ye bɛsɛn tii sɑ kuɑn sɔ̃ mɑ n kun mɔ win himbɑ kɑ win durom sɔ̃ mɛ u sun kuɑ Yesu Kirisin min di sɑɑ toren di.

Sɑnɑm mɛ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwerobu kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔ̃sobu bɑ nùn wɑ, mɑ bɑ ɡbɑ̃sukum wɔri bɑ nɛɛ, ɑ nùn kpɑreo, ɑ nùn kpɑreo dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru sɔɔ. Pilɑti u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɛɛn tii i nùn mɔɔ kpɑ i nùn kpɑre dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru wɔllɔ kɑ bɛɛn tii. Domi nɛ nɑ kun torɑru ɡɑru wɑ wi sɔɔ.
Gusunɔn sɔmɔbu bɑ fɑɑbɑ yen ɡɑri mɛɛrɑ, bɑ yen sɑriɑ kɑsu, mɑ bɑ durom mɛn ɡɑri ɡeruɑ mɛ Gusunɔ u bɛɛ yiiye.
Dɑbirɑ bɑ yɑrinɛ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ bɑ tɔmbu swɑɑ nim wiɑmɔ. Bɑ ǹ wure mɑ Yesu Kirisi u nɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ u kuɑ tɔnu. Wi u sɑ̃ɑ nɡe mɛ, wiyɑ swɑɑ nim wio kɑ Kirisin yibɛrɛ.
Sɑ wɑ mɑ durɔ wini nɑɑnɑɑnuɡiiwɑ, u rɑ sɑnnɔsu seeyewɑ Yuubɑn suunu sɔɔ hɑnduniɑ kpuro sɔɔ. U mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ wuuru ɡɑrun wiruɡibun turo te bɑ rɑ soku Nɑsɑrenɛɡibu .

Kɑ ɡem, ɡoo sɑri wi u koo kpĩ u bɛsɛn sɑ̃ɑrun ɑsiri yen kpɑ̃ɑru siki. Gusunɔ u sɔ̃ɔsirɑ tɔnun wɑsi sɔɔ. Hunde Dɛɛro nùn ɡem wɛ̃. Wɔllun ɡɔrɑdobɑ bɑ mɑɑ nùn wɑ. Bɑ win ɡɑri bweseru bɑɑtere wɑɑsu kuɑ. Mɑ bɑ yi nɑɑnɛ doke hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ. Mɑ bɑ kpɑm nùn suɑ wɔllɔ u wurɑ win yiiko sɔɔ.
Yerɑ ɡuru kpee bɑkɑnu, nìn teerɑ kilo weeru turɑ, nu tɔmbu wɔriki wɔllun di. Mɑ bɑ Gusunɔ ɡɑri kɑm ɡerusi ɡuru kpee nin nɔni swɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃ domi nɔni swɑ̃ɑ te, tɑ bɑndɑ.
Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ u wɔn kpɑɑru kɑ tem kpɑm nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ mi ɡem ko n wɑ̃ɑ. Yerɑ sɑ mɑrɑ.
Mɑ wɔllɑ kururɑ nɡe tireru mɑ ɡuuru bɑɑtere kɑ tem bureru bɑɑtere nu sin yenu kɔsɑ.
Yesu Kirisi u Gusunɔn kĩi te kuɑ, yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ dɛɛrɑ bɛsɛn torɑnun di kɑ ɑbɔ te u kuɑ kɑ win wɑsi nɔn teeru.
Sɑ rɑ n Gusunɔ siɑrɑmɔ bɛɛ kpuron sɔ̃, sɑ rɑ n mɑɑ bɛɛ yɑɑye bɑɑdommɑ kɑnɑru sɔɔ.
Dumɑ ɡɑɑ kpɑm yɑrɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ dum swɑ̃ɑ. Wi u ye sɔni bɑ nùn dɑm kɑ̃ u kɑ tɑbu yɛ̃bi hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ kpɑ tɔmbu bu kɑ ɡoonɑ. Mɑ bɑ nùn tɑkobi bɑkɑ ɡɑɑ wɛ̃.
Be bɑ yoru dimɔ n weenɛ bu ben tiin yinnibu bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ ɡɑ̃ɑnu kpuro sɔɔ, kpɑ ɡoo u ku rɑɑ kɑ fɛɛ wɑ u Gusunɔn yĩsiru kɑ bɛsɛn sɔ̃ɔsinu ɡɑri kɑm ɡerusi.
I ku weesu kuɑnɑ domi i dɑɑ ɡurɑ kɑ yen kookoosu potɑ kɔ,
Adɑmɑ ye nɑ nùn wɑɑsi wee. Kurɔ wi bɑ mɔ̀ Yesɑbɛli wi u tii sokumɔ Gusunɔn sɔmɔ, u derɑ u nɛn sɔm kowobu swɑɑ nim wiɑ kɑ win sɔ̃ɔsiru bu kɑ kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑ tɑntɑnɑru sɔɔ kpɑ bu bũu sɑ̃ɑ dĩɑnu di.
Gusunɔn ɡɑri yi rɑɑ ɡeruɑ mɑ Gusunɔ u koo tɔn tukobu ɡem wɛ̃ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃. Yen sɔ̃nɑ yi Aburɑhɑmu Lɑbɑɑri ɡeɑ wɑɑsu kuɑ yellun di yi nɛɛ, “Wunɛn min diyɑ Gusunɔ u koo bwesenu kpuro domɑru kuɑ.”
I dɑm kɛ̃ɛ ɡɑri duɑri yi Gusunɔ u bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ nɡe win bibu? U nɛɛ, “Nɛn bii, ɑ ku Yinni Gusunɔn sɛɛyɑsiɑbu ɑtɑfiiru ko. A ku mɑɑ nuki sɑnkirɑ ù n nun ɡerusimɔ.

I bɛɛn swɑɑ ɡbiobu mɛm nɔɔwɔ kpɑ i bu wiru kpĩiyɑ. Domi bɛɛn hunden ɡɑriyɑ bɑ rɑ n kɑ wɑsire yèn sɔ̃ Gusunɔ u koo bu yen ɡɑri bikiɑ. I de bu kpĩ bu wisi kɑ nuku dobu, n kun kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu. Bɑ̀ n wisɑ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu, yɑ ǹ bɛɛ ɑrufɑɑni ɡɑɑ kuɑmmɛ.
U mɑɑ bwesenu nɔɔbɑ yiru kpeerɑsiɑ Kɑnɑnin tem sɔɔ, mɑ u nin tem win tɔmbu wɛ̃ mu n sɑ̃ɑ beɡim.
Bɑɑwure wi u sɔ̃ɔsi tukuru ɡɑru sɔ̃ɔsimɔ mɑ u yinɑ u bɛsɛn Yinni Yesun Kirisin ɡɑri ɡemɡii nɛnɛ, kɑ mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsi te tɑ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛbu sɔ̃ɔsimɔ,
Goo ù n nɑ bɛɛn mi, mɑ n kun kɑ Kirisin sɔ̃ɔsi te, i ku yɛ̃ro dɑm koosiɑ, i ku mɑɑ nùn domɑru kuɑ.
Nɡe mɛ bɛsɛn tii sɑ Kirisin nuku sɑnkirɑnu sɔɔ bɔnu mɔ n kpɑ̃, mɛyɑ mɑɑ sɑ dɑm kɛ̃ru wɑɑmɔ n kpɑ̃ Kirisin min di.
Nɔni swɑ̃ɑruɡibɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ. Domi bɑ Kɑɛnin yirɑ swĩi, bɑ tii sure torɑru sɔɔ bu kɑ ɑre wɑn sɔ̃ nɡe mɛ Bɑlɑmu u kuɑ, mɑ bɑ Gusunɔ seesi nɡe mɛ Kore u kuɑ, mɑ bɑ tii kɑm koosiɑ.
Adɑmɑ tɔn kɔ̃so be, ye yɑ kun bu yeeri yeyɑ bɑ wɔmmɔ, ye bɑ mɑɑ mɔ̀ kɑ mɑrumɑruru nɡe yɛɛ yeyɑ yɑ bu kɑm koosiɑmɔ.

Kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebɑ Nɔwɛ u Gusunɔn ɡɑri swɑɑ dɑki sɑnɑm mɛ u nùn kirɔ kuɑ ye yɑ sisin sɔ̃ ye u ǹ ɡinɑ wɑ. U Gusunɔ nɑsiɑ u nùn mɛm nɔɔwɑ mɑ u ɡoo nimkuu dɑ̃kɑ ɡè sɔɔ wi kɑ win yɛnuɡibu bɑ fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Nɡe mɛyɑ u hɑnduniɑɡibu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ mɑ u ɡem wɑ Gusunɔn nɔni sɔɔ nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɑɑbu.
Tɛ̃, bɑ̀ n ye kpuro yi yi nɡe mɛ, yerɑ yɑ̃ku kowobu bɑ rɑ du ɑdɛrɔ ɡe sɔɔ bu ben sɑ̃ɑrun sɔmburu ko.
Etiɛni u mɑɑ bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ deɡɑnɡɑmɡibu! Bɛɛn ɡɔ̃rusu kɑ bɛɛn swɑsu su sɑ̃ɑ nɡe be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ nɑsieɡisu, i rɑ n Hunde Dɛɛro yinɑmɔ, i mɔ̀wɑ nɡe bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ.

Kpɑ u n yɛ̃ mɑ bɑ ǹ woodɑ kue ɡemɡibun sɔ̃. Bɑ ye kuɑwɑ woodɑ sɑrobu kɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑriruɡibun sɔ̃, kɑ be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃, kɑ durumɡibu, kɑ mɑɑ tɔn be bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ kɑ ɡɑ̃ɑ dɛɛrɑnun bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃, kɑ sere be bɑ ben tundobu ǹ kun mɛ ben mɛrobu ɡoomɔ, kɑ mɑɑ tɔn ɡowobu ɡɑbu,
Nɑ bɛɛ tireru yoruɑ nɑ nɛɛ, i ku kɑ kurɔ dɑmɑ kowobu mɛnnɑ.
Adɑmɑ Gusunɔ u mɑn ɡɔsɑ bɑ sere mɑn mɑrɑ mɑ u mɑn sokɑ win durom sɔɔ.
Domi ye nɑ rɑ n mɔ̀ nɑ ku rɑ tubu. Ye nɑ kĩ nɑ ku rɑ ye ko, ɑdɑmɑ ye nɑ tusɑ yeyɑ nɑ rɑ ko.
Adɑmɑ i n kpɛ̃ɑmɔ bɛsɛn Yinni Fɑɑbɑ kowo Yesu Kirisin durom sɔɔ kpɑ i n nùn ɡiɑmɔ. Su nùn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ tɛ̃n di sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Ami.
Bɛsɛ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑri bɑkɑsu Kirisin sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ bɛɛ i sɑ̃ɑ bwisiɡibu Kirisi sɔɔ. Bɛsɛ sɑ ǹ dɑm mɔ, bɛɛyɑ i dɑm mɔ. I kuɑ ɑtɑsiribɑ mɑ bɛsɛ sɑ kuɑ bɛɛrɛ sɑribɑ.
I kɑ tii yinɔ win wuswɑɑɔ kɑ toro sindu nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃ kpɑ i n yɛ̃ mɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑ tenin bweserɑ tɑ bɛɛɡibu wɑ̃ɑsi be bɑ yɑrinɛ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ.
Bɛɛ yobu i bɛɛn yinnibu mɛm nɔɔwɔ kpuro sɔɔ hɑnduniɑ mi, n ǹ mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ bɛɛ yɔ̃re tɔnɑ, i kɑ bu tɔn ɡeeru sɔ̃ɔsi, ɑdɑmɑ i bu mɛm nɔɔwɔ n kun kɑ murɑfitiru yèn sɔ̃ i Yinni nɑsie.
Kɔbi wɔku te nɑ mɑɑ wɑ mi, tɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ sinɑmbu wɔkuru be bɑ kun ɡinɑ bɑndu dim kpɑ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ koo yiiko wɑ bu bɑndu di kɔbi tiɑ kɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye sɑnnu.
Win Hunde wiyɑ sɑ mwɑ, n ǹ mɔ hɑnduniɑn hunde, kpɑ sɑ n kɑ yɛ̃ ye Gusunɔ u sun kɑ̃ win durom sɔɔ.
Tɛ̃ bɛɛ dukiɑɡibu, i mɑn swɑɑ dɑkio. I swĩiyɔ kpɑ i n ɑrɑru mɔ̀ wɑhɑlɑ ye yɑ bɛɛ sisien sɔ̃.

U ku bɛrum ko nɔni swɑ̃ɑ te tɑ nùn sisien sɔ̃. Wee, Setɑm u koo de bu ben ɡɑbu pirisɔm doke u kɑ ben lɑɑkɑri mɛɛri. Bɑ koo wɑhɑlɑ wɑ sere sɔ̃ɔ wɔkuru. U de u n sɑ̃ɑ bɔrɔkini sere kɑ ɡɔɔwɔ, kpɑ n nùn wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ nɡe sinɑ furɔ.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ Gusunɔɡii, ɑ yeni kpuro dukɑ suurio kpɑ ɑ ɡem nɑɑ ɡirɑ kɑ mɑɑ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛbu kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ kĩru kɑ tɛmɑnɑbu kɑ sere dɑɑ duudwiɑ.
I bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑru di hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ kɑ dukiɑ bɑkɑ kɑ yɛ̃ɛribu. I dimɔ i bɔriɑmɔ nɡe yɑ̃ɑ sɑkɑ yɑ̃ɑru.
Mɑ sinɑ kitɑnu yɛndɑ nnɛ nu sinɑ kitɑ te kooro bure. Mɑ ɡuro ɡurobu yɛndɑ nnɛ bɑ sɔ̃ kitɑ nin wɔllɔ bɑ yɑ̃ɑ kpikinu doke kɑ furɔ wurɑɡisu.
I ye tɔ̃yɑ kɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu kɔsio, nɡe mɛ yɑ yen yiiko kɑ dukiɑn doo nɔɔru di. Domi yɑ yen tii sɔ̃ɔwɑ yɑ nɛɛ, wee, yɑ sɔ̃ nɡe sinɑ boko, yɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔmini. Mɛyɑ yɑ ǹ mɑɑ nuku sɑnkirɑnu wɑsi pɑi.

Bɛɛ mɑɑ durɔbu, i n wɑ̃ɑsinɛ kɑ bɛɛn kurɔbu i n yɑɑye mɑ bɑ ǹ bɛɛ dɑm turɑ. I bu bɛɛrɛn kookoosu kuo, domi Gusunɔ u koo mɑɑ bu wɑ̃ɑru kɛ̃ kɑ bɛɛ sɑnnu. I n mɔ̀ mɛ kpɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑnu nu ku bɛɛn kɑnɑru ɡbɑrɑ.
Nɑ ǹ wure tɔn kurɔ u keu sɔ̃ɔsi, ǹ kun mɛ u n sɑ̃ɑ tɔn durɔn wiruɡii ɑdɑmɑ u n dɑ n mɑɑri.
Gusunɔ nɑɑnɛɡiiwɑ, wi u bɛɛ sokɑ i n kɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ kɑ win Bii Yesu Kirisi bɛsɛn Yinni.
Nɛɡibu, bɑ bɛɛ sokɑwɑ i kɑ ko tii mɔwɔbu. Kɑ mɛ, i ku de bɛɛn tii mɔru tu de i n sĩimɔ kɑ wɑsin bɑɑ. Adɑmɑ i n sominɑmɔ kɑ kĩru.
I ɡɑri ɡeruo kpɑ i n mɔ̀ nɡe be Gusunɔ koo siri kɑ woodɑ ye yɑ tɔnu yɑkiɑmɔ.
Sɔm bwese bwesekɑwɑ wɑ̃ɑ, ɑdɑmɑ Yinni turo wiyɑ sɑ ko ye kuɑ.
Bɑ sɑ̃ɑ be Gusunɔ u ɡɔsɑ yellun di. Ben bweseru sɔɔn diyɑ Kirisi wi u kpuro kere u yɑrɑ nɡe tɔnu. U mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔ wi n weenɛ bu siɑrɑ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Ami.
Sɑ̀ n nuki sɑnkire bɛɛn sɔ̃nɑ, kpɑ i kɑ dɑm kɛ̃ru kɑ fɑɑbɑ wɑ. Sɑ̀ n mɑɑ dɑm wɑ bɛɛn sɔ̃nɑ, i kɑ mɑɑ dɑm wɑ mɛ mu koo de i kɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru tɛmɑnɑ te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ tiɑ kɑ te sɑ wɑɑmɔ.
Gusunɔ win tiiwɑ u sun tɑ̃sisiɑ kɑ bɛɛ sɑnnu Kirisi sɔɔ. Wiyɑ u mɑɑ sun ɡɔsɑ nɛnɛm.
Nɔɔ ɡe, ɡɑ kpɑm ɡeruɑ ɡɑ nɛɛ, ye Gusunɔ u sokumɔ diirɑ ɑ ku mɑɑ ye ɡɑrisi seseru.
Hɑnduniɑn sinɑmbu kpuro be bɑ kɑ ye kurɔ tɑnɔru kɑ dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ kuɑ bɑ koo swĩ, bɑ koo weeweenu ko yen sɔ̃, sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ yen dɔ̃ɔ mwɑɑrɑbun wiisu mɛɛrɑ.
Mɑ Yesu u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, bɑɑwure wi u mɑn kĩ u koo nɛn ɡɑri mɛm nɔɔwɑ. Nɛn Bɑɑbɑ u koo nùn kĩɑ, nɛ kɑ nɛn Bɑɑbɑ sɑ ko mɑɑ nɑ yɛ̃ron mi kpɑ su bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑ yeru ko wi sɔɔ.
Amɛniwɑ kĩi te, tɑ sɑ̃ɑ, n ǹ mɔ bɛsɛrɑ sɑ Gusunɔ kĩɑ, ɑdɑmɑ wiyɑ sun kĩɑ, mɑ u win Bii ɡɔrimɑ u kɑ ko ɑbɔru bɛsɛn torɑnun sɔ̃.
Adɑmɑ sɑ̀ n sĩimɔ yɑm bururɑm sɔɔ, nɡe mɛ win tii u wɑ̃ɑ yɑm bururɑm sɔɔ, sɑ ko n nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn tii tiinɛ. Win Bii Yesun yɛm mu mɑɑ sun dɛɛrɑsiɑmɔ sɑɑ torɑru kpuron di.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ɑ ǹ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ yoo, ɑ kuɑ bii. Tɛ̃ ye ɑ kɑ sɑ̃ɑ bii, Gusunɔ u mɑɑ nun kuɑ tubi dio.
Adɑmɑ win Biin sɔ̃nɑ u nɛɛ, “Gusunɔ, bɑ wunɛn bɑndu swĩi sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Gemɑ ɑ kɑ wunɛn bɑndu nɛni.
Yuubɑ bɑ nùn wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, sɑ ǹ nun kɑsukumɔ sɔm ɡeerun sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ yèn sɔ̃ ɑ Gusunɔ wɔmmɔ, yen sɔ̃nɑ. Wunɛ tɔnuwɑ, mɑ ɑ kĩ ɑ n tii mɔ̀ Gusunɔ.
Dɔ̃ɔ wi u nùn tɔ̃yɑ mɔ̀ win wiisu su ko su n seemɔwɑ wɔllɔ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ. Bɑ ǹ ko bɑ n mɑɑ wɛ̃rɑbu mɔ bururu kɑ yokɑ, be bɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye sɑ̃wɑ kɑ yen weenɑsiɑ, kɑ be bɑ yen yĩsirun yĩreru mɔ.
Gusunɔwɑ u sun sɔmbu te nɔmu bɛriɑ win durom sɔ̃. Yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ ǹ mwiɑ kpɑnɛ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ ko kpĩ su tororu so su nɛɛ, “Yinni Gusunɔwɑ sɑ̃ɑ wi u koo mɑn somi. Nɑ ǹ ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑnun bɛrum mɔ. Mbɑ tɔnu koo kpĩ u mɑn kuɑ.”
Wi u dimɔ u ku wi u kun dimɔ ɡɛm, kpɑ wi u kun dimɔ u ku wi u dimɔ tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃, domi Gusunɔ u yɛ̃ro wurɑ.
Gusunɔ wi u tɛmɑnɑbu kɑ dɑm kɛ̃nu wɛ̃ɛmɔ, u de i n nɔɔ nɛ bɛɛn tii tiinɛ sɔɔ nɡe mɛ i wɑ Kirisi u kuɑ.

U ǹ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwero beɔnɔ. U ǹ bɑɑdommɑn yɑ̃ku kobun bukɑtɑ mɔ, ɡbiikɑɑ win tiin torɑnun sɔ̃ kɑ sere ɡɑbuɡinu. U yɑ̃ku teeru kuɑ te tɑ turɑ sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u kɑ win tii ɑbɔru kuɑ.
Goo ù n dukiɑ mɔ hɑnduniɑ ye sɔɔ, mɑ u wɑ win beruse u yɑ̃ɑru mɔ, mɑ u nùn biru kisi, ɑmɔnɑ Gusunɔn kĩrɑ ko n kɑ wɑ̃ɑ yɛ̃ro sɔɔ.
Sɑ wɔruɡɔru mɔ, sɑ mɑɑ kĩru bo su wɑsi yini deri kpɑ su dɑ sɑ n wɑ̃ɑ Yinnin mi.
Kĩnɑsibu nɑ bɛɛ kɑnɑmɔ, bɛɛ be i sɑ̃ɑ nɡe sɔbu kɑ kpikobu hɑnduniɑ ye sɔɔ, i de i tii kpĩ kɑ wɑsin binɛ ye yɑ rɑ n tɑbu mɔ̀ kɑ bɛɛn hunde.
I tɔmbu kpuro bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛyɔ, i bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokeosibu kĩɔ, i Gusunɔ nɑsio, kpɑ i tem yɛ̃ro bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃. sun sɔ̃ɔsimɔ
U tɑmɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ win tɔmbɑ koo tubuwɑ mɑ Gusunɔwɑ nùn ɡɔrɑ u kɑ bu yɑkiɑ, ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ tubɑ.
I n tii sɛ kɑ kɔ̃sɑn kowobu be bɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe bɔ̃nu, mɑ bɑ wɑsin bɑnɡo nɑɑnɛ sɑ̃ɑ.
Bɑ ɡerumɔ kɑ nɔɔ bɑ Gusunɔ yɛ̃, ɑdɑmɑ ben kookoosu ben ɡɑri siki. Bɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔn kɔ̃sobu kɑ mɛm nɔɔ sɑriruɡibu, bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bu ɡɑ̃ɑ ɡeenu ɡɑnu ko.
Domi nɑ bu seedɑ yeni diiyɑmmɛ, bɑ hɑniɑ mɔ Gusunɔn sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ yɛ̃ru sɑri.
U sun dɑm kɛ̃mɔ bɛsɛn nuku sɑnkirɑnu kpuro sɔɔ, kpɑ bɛsɛn tii su kɑ kpĩ su be bɑ nuki sɑnkire dɑm kɛ̃ mɛ bɛsɛn tii sɑ wɑ Gusunɔn min di.
A hɑniɑ koowo ɑ n mɔ̀ ye kɑɑ kɑ siɑrɑbu wɑ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ, nɡe sɔm kowo wi sekurɑ kun mɔ̀ win sɔmburu sɔɔ, wi u rɑ n ɡem ɡɑri sɔ̃ɔsimɔ dee dee.
U koo tii suɑ n kpuro kere kpɑ u ye kpuro seesi ye bɑ sokumɔ Yinni kɑ ye bɑ sɑ̃ɑmɔ. U koo mɑm dɑ u sinɑ Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ kpɑ u tii soku Gusunɔ.
Bɛɛ tundobu i ku bɛɛn bibu mɔru bɑrɑsiɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i bu nɛnuɔ kɑ nɔni dokebu kpɑ i bu Yinnin ɡɑri keu ko.
Adɑmɑ ye kpuro sɔɔrɑ sɑ nɑsɑrɑ wɑ mɑm mɑm sɑɑ win min di wi u sun kĩɑ.
Bɛsɛ kpuro sɑ wɔrumɑ temɔ, mɑ nɑ nɔɔ ɡɑɡu nuɑ, ɡɑ kɑ mɑn ɡɑri mɔ̀ kɑ Heberum ɡɑ nɛɛ, Sɔɔlu Sɔɔlu, mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ ɑ mɑn nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ. Mɛɛrɑwɑ ɑ tii mɔ̀ nɡe nɑɑ kinɛ te tɑ ten yinnin dɛki nɔɔ sɛmɡiɑ tɛsumɔ.
nɑ win nɔni swɑ̃ɑru yɛ̃, nɑ mɑɑ win sɑ̃ɑru yɛ̃. Kɑ mɛ, u sɑ̃ɑ ɑtɑsiri. Nɑ yɛ̃ kɔ̃sɑ ye bɑ nùn ɡerusimɔ be bɑ tii sokumɔ Yuubɑ ɑdɑmɑ bɑ ǹ sɑ̃ɑ mɛ, Setɑm tɔmbɑ bɑ sɑ̃ɑ.
Wi u tɔnu kĩ u ku rɑ yɛ̃ɛri kɔ̃sɑn sɔ̃ mɑ n kun mɔ ɡem sɔ̃.
Yen sɔ̃, i dɑɑ disinuɡiɑ kɑ kom kɔ̃sum kpuro derio kpɑ i ɡɑri yi mwɑ kɑ tii kɑwɑbu yi Gusunɔ u duurɑ bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ domi yiyɑ yi koo kpĩ yi bɛɛn hunde fɑɑbɑ ko.
Nɛnɑ nɑ duurɑ, mɑ Apolo u nim yɛ̃kɑ, ɑdɑmɑ Gusunɔwɑ u kpɛ̃ɑsiɑmɔ.
Wɔllun ɡɔrɑdo yiruse u ɡbiikoo swĩi u nɛɛ, Bɑbiloni, wuu bɔkɔ ɡe, ɡɑ wɔrumɑ, ɡɑ wɔrumɑ, ɡe, ɡe ɡɑ tɔmbu kpuro tilɑsi kuɑ bɑ kɑ ɡen dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ bɑkɑn tɑm nɔrɑ.
Nɛn bɔrɔbɑrɑ bɛɛ i sɑ̃ɑ ì n mɔ̀ ye nɑ bɛɛ yiire.
Nɛn bibu, i n tii sɛ kɑ bũu sɑ̃ɑru.
Ben ɡɑbɑ ko n yɛnusu duurimɔ kpɑ bu kɑ ben ɡɑri tɔn kurɔ dɑm sɑriruɡibu kɑmiɑ, bèn durum yɑ derɑ bɑ kom yɑɑ bie mɑ bɑ kĩru bɑɑtere diiriɑmmɛ.
Adɑmɑ sɑ n ɡem kpɑrɑmɔ kɑ kĩru kpɑ su kpɛ̃ɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu kpuro sɔɔ su kɑ Kirisi kpɑ̃ɑru turi wi u sɑ̃ɑ wiru.
I hɑniɑ koowo i n kɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɑ̃ɑ ye yɑ wee Hunde Dɛɛron min di kpɑ i n ɡbinnɛ bɔri yɛndu sɔɔ.
Sɔɔlu u bikiɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni wunɑ were. Mɑ Yinni nɛɛ, nɛnɑ Yesu wi ɑ nɔni sɔ̃ɔmɔ.
Adɑmɑ i de Kirisi u n sɑ̃ɑ Yinni bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ. I n sɔɔru sɑ̃ɑ i kɑ bu wisi be bɑ bɛɛ bɛɛn yĩiyɔbun ɑsɑnsi bikiɑmɔ.
Yinni Gusunɔ nùn sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, u win sɑlubɑtɑ pweto, domi yɑm mi u yɔ̃ mi, yɑm dɛɛrɑmɑ.
Bɛɛ mɑɑ, i de ye i nuɑ sɑɑ toren di, yɑ n wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ruɔ, i ko n ɡbinnɛ kɑ Bii kɑ Bɑɑbɑ.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, bɑɑwure wi u nɛn ɡɑri mɛm nɔɔwɑ, yɛ̃ro u ǹ ɡɔɔ wɑsi pɑi.
Yerɑ nɑ mɑɑ sinɑ kitɑ kpiki bɑkɑru wɑ kɑ wi u sɔ̃ ten wɔllɔ. Mɑ tem kɑ wɔllɑ dukɑ doonɑ win wuswɑɑn di, yen ɡɑɑ kun mɑɑ wɑɑrɔ.
Dĩɑnu wɑ̃ɑwɑ nukurun sɔ̃, nukurɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ dĩɑnun sɔ̃, mɑ Gusunɔ u koo ye yiru kpeesiɑ. Adɑmɑ wɑsi kun wɑ̃ɑ kurɔ dɑmɑrun sɔ̃. Yi wɑ̃ɑwɑ Yinnin sɔ̃ mɑ Yinni mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ yin sɔ̃.
Mɛyɑ mɑɑ bɛɛn tii i tii ɡɑrisio ɡonu torɑrun wuswɑɑɔ, kpɑ i n sɑ̃ɑ wɑsobu Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ Kirisi Yesu sɔɔ.
Su Gusunɔ siɑrɑ. Domi u rɑ n sun ɡbiiye kɑ nɑsɑrɑ yèn sɔ̃ sɑ ɡbinnɛ kɑ Kirisi. U sun dendimɔ u kɑ tɔmbu Kirisi ɡiɑsiɑ yɑm kpuro nɡe turɑre yèn nuburu tɑ pusɑ bɑɑmɑ.
Lɑbɑɑri wee ye sɑ nuɑ sɑɑ Yesu Kirisi win min di, mɑ sɑ bɛɛ ye nɔɔsiɑmɔ. Gusunɔ sɑ̃ɑwɑ yɑm bururɑm, yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɑri win mi.
Bɑɑwure wi Bɑɑbɑ mɑn wɛ̃ u koo nɑ nɛn mi. Wi u mɑɑ nɑ nɛn mi, nɑ ǹ nùn yinɑmɔ, bɑɑ ǹ n kuɑ ɑmɔ.
I n dɑ n bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokeosibu kĩ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ u koo kpĩ u bu fɑɑbɑ ko tɛ̃n di kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ be bɑ Gusunɔ susimɔ win min di, domi u wɑ̃ɑwɑ u kɑ Gusunɔ suuru kɑnɑ ben sɔ̃.

Mɑ Yuubɑ bɑ ɡbɑ̃sukɑ wɔllɔ, i kɑ nùn doo, i kɑ nùn doo, i nùn kpɑreo dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru wɔllɔ. Mɑ Pilɑti u bu bikiɑ u nɛɛ, ɑmɔ ro! I kĩ n bɛɛn sunɔ kpɑre dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru wɔllɔ? Mɑ yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwerobɑ nùn wisɑ bɑ nɛɛ, bɛsɛ sɑ ǹ sunɔ ɡoo mɔ mɑ n kun mɔ tem yɛ̃ro.
Mɛyɑ n mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ sɑɑ yeni sɔɔ. Ben sukum wɑ̃ɑ be Gusunɔ u ɡɔsɑ win durom sɔ̃.
Hɑnduniɑn sinɑmbɑ kɑ kurɔ tɑnɔ kpoko wi dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛ kuɑ, mɑ kurɔ tɑnɔ win dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛn tɑm mu hɑnduniɑn tɔmbu lɑɑkɑri birɑ.
I n kĩɑnɛ nɡe wɔnɔ kɑ mɔɔ. I n kookɑri mɔ̀ i kɑ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛnɑ.
Domi be Gusunɔn Hunde u kpɑrɑmɔ, beyɑ bɑ Gusunɔn bibu.
Yerɑ yĩreru ɡɑrɑ kpɑm sɔ̃ɔsirɑ Gusunɔ wɔllɔ. Yɑɑ binti binti swɑ̃ɑru ɡɑru tɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, tɑ winu nɔɔbɑ yiru mɔ kɑ kɔbɑ wɔkuru mɑ tɑ sinɑ furɔsu nɔɔbɑ yiru doke.
Tɛ̃ yèn sɔ̃ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ win bibu sɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ tubi diobu, mɑ sɑ ko win tubi bɔnu ko kɑ Kirisi sɑnnu, domi sɑ̀ n Kirisin nɔni swɑ̃ɑru bɔnu kuɑ, sɑ ko mɑɑ win yiiko bɔnu ko.
Yen biru yiɡbɛrun ɡuro ɡuro be bɑ hɑniɑ mɔ̀ ben sɔmburu sɔɔ, n weenɛ bu bɛɛrɛ bɑkɑn ɑrufɑɑni di, n ku mɑm ko be bɑ rɑ sunɛ ɡem ɡem wɑɑsu kɑ keu sɔ̃ɔsibu sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ n ǹ tɔmbu kpuro bɑ yeni yɛ̃. Gɑbu be bɑ ɡinɑ bũu sɑ̃ɑrun dɔɔnɛ mɔ, bɑ yɑɑ ye temmɔ nɡe bũu sɑ̃ɑ dĩɑnu, mɑ ben ɡɔ̃ru dɑm sɑriruɡuu ɡɑ bu tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ.
Nɛn kɑ̃ɑsɑ bɑɑyere ye yɑ ku rɑ binu mɑ, yerɑ u rɑ bure u kɔ̃. Kɑ̃ɑsɑ bɑɑyere ye yɑ rɑ binu mɑ, u rɑ ye sɔmɛwɑ kpɑ yen mɑrum mu kɑ sosi.
I ku bu dɑm dɔre be bɑ bɛɛ nɔmu sɔndiɑ i kɔ̃su, ɑdɑmɑ i bu kom ɡem sɔ̃ɔsio mɛ bɑ koo swĩi.
Nɛɡibu, sɑ kĩ i ɡem ɡiɑ be bɑ ɡun sɔ̃, kpɑ i kun nuki sɑnkire nɡe be bɑ tie be bɑ kun yĩiyɔbu mɔ.
Kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebɑ Isirelibɑ bɑ nim wɔ̃ku ɡe bɑ mɔ̀ Nɑɑ yɑri tɔburɑ nɡe tem dirɑ. Adɑmɑ sɑnɑm mɛ Eɡibitiɡibɑ kĩɑ bu ko nɡe mɛ, bɑ nim diirɑ.
Sɑɑ ye sɔɔrɑ bɑ Mɔwisi mɑrɑ. Bii burɔwɑ wi u Gusunɔ wɛ̃remɔ. Bɑ nùn nɔɔri suru itɑ win tundon yɛnuɔ.
U koo kpĩ u suuru ko kɑ yɛ̃ru sɑriruɡibu kɑ be bɑ swɑɑ sɑre yèn sɔ̃ win tii u dɑm biɑre.
Wɔ̃kurɑ tondɑ, yɑm sɑ̃rerɑ turuku kuɑ. Yen sɔ̃, su wɔ̃kurun kookoosu deri kpɑ su yɑm bururɑm tɑbu yɑ̃nu sebe.
Yen sɔ̃, bɛɛ yinnibu i mɑɑ bɛɛn yobu kuo nɡe mɛ, i ku bu dɑm dɔre. I n yɛ̃ mɑ bɛɛ kɑ be, Yinni turowɑ i mɔ wɔllɔ wìn mi ɡoo kun ɡoo.
I kɑ bu nuku dobu koowo be bɑ nuku dobu mɔ̀, kpɑ i kɑ bu swĩ be bɑ sumɔ.
Adɑmɑ yèn sɔ̃ wunɛn ɡɔ̃ru ɡɑ bɔɔbu ɡɑ deɡɑnɡɑm yibɑ, ɑ wunɛn tii mɔru mɛnnɑmmɛwɑ Gusunɔn mɔrun tɔ̃run sɔ̃ tè sɔɔ u koo tɔmbu siri dee dee
Adɑmɑ Yuu ɡɑbɑ nɑ Antiɔsi kɑ Ikonimun di bɑ tɔn wɔru ɡe swɑɑ nim wiɑ, mɑ bɑ Pɔlu kpenu kɑsukɑ bɑ nùn ɡɑwɑ bɑ kɑ dɑ wuun biruɔ domi bɑ tɑmɑɑ u ɡuwɑ.
Ye Yesu u yeni ɡeruɑ u kpɑ, win ɡɔ̃ru ɡɑ sɑnkirɑ too too, mɑ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ kpɑsɑsɑ u nɛɛ, kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, ɡoo wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ wi u koo mɑn dɔmɛ.
Adɑmɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡerumɔ mɑ tɔmbu kpuro bɑ wɑ̃ɑ durum dɑm nɔmɑɔ, kpɑ kɛ̃ɛ tèn nɔɔ mwɛɛru Gusunɔ u kuɑ tɑ n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeɡiru yèn sɔ̃ bɑ Yesu Kirisi nɑɑnɛ doke.
Sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ koo seedɑ di bu kpe, yerɑ ɡbeeku yɑɑ ye yɑ yɑrɑ wɔru nɔru sɑriruɡuu ɡen min di yɑ koo kɑ bu tɑbu ko, yu bu kɑmiɑ kpɑ yu bu ɡo.
Geemɑ, sɑ kuɑ be bɑ ɡbinnɛ kɑ Kirisi sɑ̀ n toro sindu mɔ sere kɑ nɔrɔ te sɑ mɔ toren di.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, Kirisi ù n wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ, bɑɑ bɛɛn wɑsi yì n ɡu torɑrun sɔ̃, bɛɛn hunde yɑ wɑsi yèn sɔ̃ i ɡem wɑ Gusunɔn mi.
Gusunɔn sɔmɔ wɑrɑ bɛɛn bɑɑbɑbɑ bɑ ǹ nɔni sɔ̃ɔwɑ. Bɑ bu ɡo be bɑ Geeɡiin nɑɑrun ɡɑri kuɑ, mɑ tɛ̃, bɛɛn tii i Geeɡii wi kɔrumɔtɔnu kuɑ i nùn ɡo.
kɑ kinɛnu, kɑ tɑm nɔrubu, kɑ ɑkɑ dibu, yen bweseru kpuro ɡesi. Nɑ bɛɛ kirɔ mɔ̀ nɡe mɛ nɑ rɑɑ kuɑ nɑ nɛɛ, be bɑ yenin bweseru mɔ̀, bɑ ǹ kpɛ̃ bɑ n wɑ̃ɑ mi Gusunɔ u bɑndu swĩi.
Yen sɔ̃, i yɑm bururɑm mɛ nɑɑnɛ dokeo sɑɑ ye i mɛ mɔ kpɑ i kɑ ko yɑm bururɑm bibu. Ye Yesu u yeni ɡeruɑ u kpɑ, u doonɑ ben suunu sɔɔn di, u kukuɑ.
Wiyɑ u kɑ Gusunɔ turo yɔ̃rɑ wi u nùn ɡɔsɑ sɔmbu ten sɑɑbu nɡe mɛ Mɔwisi u kuɑ win sɔmburu sɔɔ Gusunɔn yɛnuɡibu kpuron suunu sɔɔ.
Domi Gusunɔ u sun Hunde Dɛɛro wi wɛ̃ n bɑndɑ Yesu Kirisi bɛsɛn Fɑɑbɑ kowon sɑɑbu,
Nɡe mɛyɑ Yosɛfu Lefi kuɑ wi bɑ mɑrɑ Sipuɔ, wi ɡɔrobɑ mɑɑ mɔ̀ Bɑɑnɑbɑsi, yĩsi ten tubusiɑnɑ dɑm kɛ̃ɔ.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, su ku wɑsirɑ ɡeɑn kobu sɔɔ, domi sɑ̀ kun kpɑnɛ, sɑ ko wɑ su ɡɛ̃ sɑnɑm mɛ sɑɑ yɑ turɑ.
Adɑmɑ ǹ n woodɑn sɔ̃n nɑ, yɑ ǹ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ nɛn wɔllɔ, yen tiiwɑ yɑ mɑn ɡo kpɑ nɑ n kɑ wɑ̃ɑru mɔ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ. Bɑ mɑn kpɑre dɑ̃ru sɔɔ kɑ Kirisi sɑnnu.
Yen biru, bɑ mɑn yĩirutiɑ ɡɑɑ wɛ̃, ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe dɛkɑ mɑ bɑ mɑn sɔ̃ɔwɑ bɑ nɛɛ, n seewo n dɑ n Gusunɔn sɑ̃ɑ yeru yĩire kɑ yɑ̃ku yeru, kpɑ n bu ɡɑri be bɑ sɑ̃ɑru mɔ̀ mi.

Tɔn be, bɑ sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ tii nɛnuɑ dɛɛrɑru sɔɔ, bɑ ǹ kurɔ dɑmɑru koore. Bɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm te swĩiwɑ bɑɑmɑ kpuro mi tɑ dɔɔ. Bɑ bu yɑkiɑwɑ sɑɑ tɔmbun suunu sɔɔn di bɑ n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe yɑ̃ku ɡbiikii te bɑ Gusunɔ kɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm te kuɑ.
Twee yi, yi sɑ̃ɑwɑ nɡe dumi yi bɑ sɔɔru kuɑ tɑbun sɔ̃. Yin winɔ ɡɑ̃ɑnu wɑ̃ɑ nɡe furɔ wurɑɡisu, mɑ yin wuswɛɛ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe tɔmbuɡii.
I tii kpɑro nɡe be bɑ tii mɔ, ɑdɑmɑ i ku bɛɛn tii mɔru dendi i kɑ kɔ̃sɑ wukiri. I n bɛɛn wɑ̃ɑru dimɔ nɡe Gusunɔn yobu.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ sɑ sunɑmɔ sɑ sɔmburu mɔ̀, domi sɑ bɛsɛn yĩiyɔbu doke Gusunɔ Yinni wɑso sɔɔ wi u sɑ̃ɑ tɔmbu kpuron Fɑɑbɑ kowo, su mɑm nɛɛre be bɑ nɑɑnɛ doke.

Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ɑmɔnɑ n ko n sɑ̃ɑ siribun sɑnɑm kɑ wi u Hunde duromɡii wɔnwɑ mɑ u Gusunɔn Bii ɡɛmɑ mɑ u win yɛm kɑm mɛɛrɑ mɛ Gusunɔ u kɑ win nɔɔ mwɛɛrun ɡɑri sire mɑ u kɑ yɛ̃ro dɛɛrɑsiɑ. I n yɛ̃ mɑ yɛ̃ro win sɛɛyɑsiɑbu koo kpɛ̃ɑ.
Mɑ Yesu u kpɑm bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, ɑlɑfiɑ yɑ n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɛɛ. Nɡe mɛ Bɑɑbɑ u mɑn ɡɔrimɑ nɡe mɛyɑ nɛ nɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ ɡɔrɑ.
Tɔn be, bɑ rɑ n wure, ɡɑ̃ɑnu sɑri ni nu rɑ bu wɛ̃re, ben binɛ bu kpɑre. Bɑ rɑ woo kɑnɑ ɡɑri ɡere, bɑ mɑɑ tɔmbu ɡɑri dori sɔ̃ɔmɔ bu kɑ yɛ̃robun ɡɑ̃ɑnu wɑ.
Sɑnɑm mɛyɑ hɑnduniɑn sinɑmbu kɑ tem yɛ̃robu kɑ tɑbu sinɑmbu kɑ ɑtɑsiribɑ kɑ dɑmɡibu, tɔmbu kpuro ɡesi, yobu kɑ tii mɔwɔbu, bɑ tii beruɑ kpee wɔrusɔ kɑ kpee bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ.

Adɑmɑ bɛrurobu kɑ nɑɑnɛ doke sɑriruɡibu kɑ kom kɔ̃sumɡibu kɑ tɔn ɡowobu kɑ sɑkɑrɑ kowobu kɑ dobo doboɡibu kɑ bũu sɑ̃ɔbu kɑ wee kowobu kpuro, bɑ koo ben bɔnu wɑ dɔ̃ɔ bwerɔ wi u mwɑɑmɔ kɑ sɔ̃ɔ bisu. Yerɑ yɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔɔ yiruse.
Tɛ̃, mbɑ n mɑɑ tie. N seewo bu mɑn bɑtɛmu ko, kpɑ n wobe n dɛɛrɑ nɛn torɑnun di nɑ n Yinnin yĩsiru sokumɔ. u kɑ tɔn tukobu wɑɑsu ko
Yin sɛrum sɑ̃ɑ nɡe tɔn kurɔbun seri, mɑ yin donnu sɑ̃ɑ nɡe ɡbee sunɔɡinu.
Wee n ǹ weenɛ Yinnin sɔm kowo u n sɑ̃ɑ nɔɔ ɡɔmunuɡii, ɑdɑmɑ u tɔmbu kpuro dɑɑ ɡeɑ kuo, u n sɑ̃ɑ wi u koo keu sɔ̃ɔsibu kpĩ kpɑ u n dɑ tɛmɑnɛ.
Domi bɑɑ nɛn wɑsin kuseru tɑ̀ kun wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛn mi, kɑ mɛ, nɛn hunde yɑ kɑ bɛɛ wɑ̃ɑ. Nɑ mɑɑ nuku dobu mɔ yèn sɔ̃ i wɑ̃ɑ nɔɔ tiɑ sɔɔ, mɑ bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ dokebu yɔ̃ dim dim Kirisi sɔɔ.
Domi ɡemɡibɑ Yinni Gusunɔ u nɔni wɛ̃ɛ. Mɑ u ben kɑnɑru swɑɑ dɑki. Adɑmɑ u kɔ̃sɑn kowobu nɔni mɛnimɔ.”

Nɛɡibu, bɛɛ be Yinni u kĩ, sɑ ǹ ko ko sɑ kun Gusunɔ siɑre bɛɛn sɔ̃ sɑɑ bɑɑyere. Domi Gusunɔ u bɛɛ ɡɔsɑ sɑɑ toren di i kɑ fɑɑbɑ wɑ kɑ Hunde Dɛɛron dɑm wi u bɛɛ kuɑ Gusunɔɡibu, kɑ mɑɑ bɛɛn nɑɑnɛ ye i mɔ ɡem sɔɔ.
Wi u kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ u n win kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀ u n bɔ. Wi u dɑɑ disinuɡiɑ mɔ̀, u n win dɑɑ disinuɡiɑ mɔ̀ u n bɔ. Wi u mɑɑ ɡeɑ mɔ̀ u n win ɡeɑ mɔ̀ u n bɔ. Wi u mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔn dɛɛro u de Gusunɔ u n mɑɑ nùn dɛɛrɑsiɑmɔ.
Piɛɛ u bu sɔ̃ɔwɑ u nɛɛ, bɛɛ kpuro, i bɛɛn ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsio, i bɑtɛmu ko kɑ Yesu Kirisin yĩsiru, i kɑ bɛɛn torɑnun suuru wɑ. I ko mɑɑ Gusunɔn kɛ̃ru mwɑ te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ Hunde Dɛɛro wi.
I lɑɑkɑri koowo i ku de ɡoo u win beruse kɔ̃sɑ kɔsiɑ, ɑdɑmɑ i n ɡeɑ kuɑnɑmmɛ kɑ mɑɑ be bɑ tie kpuro.
Mɛyɑ mɑɑ tɔn durɔbu bɑ kɔ̃ɔ mɛnnɑbu yinɑ kɑ tɔn kurɔbu, mɑ ben kĩrun kɔdɛ bɑndɑ ben tii tiinɛ sɔɔ. Bɑ sekuru sɑriru mɔ̀, tɔn durɔ kɑ tɔn durɔ, mɑ bɑ ɑre mwɑɑmɔ ben tii sɔɔ yi yi kɑ ben torɑru nɛ.
Nɡe mɛyɑ n mɑɑ weenɛ bɛɛ i n nuku dobu mɔ kpɑ i kɑ mɑn bɛɛn nuku dobu bɔnu ko.
Yen sɔ̃, i ɡɔ̃ru ɡɔsio i ɡɔsirɑ Gusunɔn mi, u kɑ bɛɛn torɑnu wunɑ,
Wuu ɡen kɔnnɔsu su ko su n kɛniɑrewɑ sɑɑ bɑɑyere, domi wɔ̃kurɑ kun mɑɑ koorɔ mi.
Domi bɑɑwure wi u nɛn yɑɑ temɑ, mɑ u nɛn yɛm nɔrɑ, u wɑ̃ɑru mɔ te tɑ ku rɑ kpe. Kon mɑɑ nùn seeyɑ ɡɔrin di sɑnɑm dɑ̃ɑkim sɔɔ.
Mɑ Yesu u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, ɑ ǹ dɑm ɡɑm mɔ nɛ sɔɔ bɑ̀ kun nun mɛ wɛ̃ wɔllun di. Yen sɔ̃nɑ wi u mɑn nun nɔmu sɔndiɑ, win tɑɑrɛ yɑ wunɛɡiɑ kere.
Nɡe mɛyɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu bù n wɑ̃ɑ bi tɔnɑ, bù kun sɔ̃ɔsire kɑ kookoosu, bu kuɑ kɑm.

Ye woodɑ kun kpĩɑ yɑ kue yèn sɔ̃ tɔnun dɑɑ yɑ yen dɑm kpeesiɑ, Gusunɔ u ye kuɑ. U torɑru tɑɑrɛ wɛ̃ te tɑ wɑ̃ɑ tɔnun dɑɑ sɔɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u win tiin Bii ɡɔrimɑ kɑ wɑsi yi yi kɑ tɔnun wɑsi torɑruɡii weenɛ, u kɑ ko ɑbɔru torɑrun sɔ̃.
Bɑɑ ì n nɔni swɑ̃ɑru wɑ ɡem sɔ̃, doo nɔɔruɡibɑ bɛɛ. I ku tɔmbun bɛrum ko, i ku mɑɑ wururɑ.
Bɛɛ mɑɑ tundobu i ku bɛɛn bibu mɔrun kookoosu kuɑ kpɑ ben nuki yi sɑnkirɑ.
U nɔɔɡiru suɑ u nɛɛ, yɑ wɔrumɑ, Bɑbiloni bɑkɑ ye, yɑ wɔrumɑ. Yɑ tɛ̃ kuɑ Setɑm bwɑ̃ɑbun wɑ̃ɑ yeru kɑ wɛrɛku kɔ̃su bɑɑɡeren kuku yeru kɑ ɡunɔ bɔrɔnuɡisu kɑ si su ɡɔbun wɑ̃ɑ yeru.
Wɑrɑ sɑ̃ɑ wee kowo mɑ n kun mɔ wi u nɛɛ Yesu kun sɑ̃ɑ Kirisi. Yɛ̃ro wi, Kirisin yibɛrɛwɑ wi u Gusunɔ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ win Bii yinɑmɔ.
Yen sɔ̃nɑ wi u Yinnin pɛ̃ɛ di, ǹ kun mɛ ù n kɑ win nɔrɑ nɔrɑ, mɑ u ǹ kue nɡe mɛ n weenɛ u ko, u Yinnin wɑsi kɑ win yɛm torɑriwɑ.
Adɑmɑ wunɛ lɑɑkɑri sɑriruɡii, ɑ ǹ tubɑ mɑ nɑɑnɛ doke bi bu ǹ sɔ̃ɔsire kookoosu sɔɔ bu sɑ̃ɑwɑ kɑm?
Yen sɔ̃nɑ Yudɑsi u dɑ mi kɑ tɑbu kowobu kɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerun kɔ̃sobu be yɑ̃ku kowo tɔnwerobu kɑ Fɑlisibɑ bɑ nùn wɛ̃. Bɑ ben tɑbu yɑ̃nu nɛni, kɑ fitilɑkunu kɑ wĩi bɔnnun dɔ̃ɔ.
Adɑmɑ Yinni u sɑ̃ɑ bɔrɔkini. U koo bɛɛ tɑ̃sisiɑ kpɑ u bɛɛ kɔ̃su tɔn kɔ̃so win sɔ̃.
Ye bɑ kɑ nùn dɑ bɑ kɔ̃, Eɡibitin sunɔn bii tɔn kurɔ u nùn suɑ u kuɑ nɡe win tiin bii.
Yerɑ ɡɔrɑdo wi, u turɑren bweebu ɡe suɑ u ɡu dɔ̃ɔ yibiɑ sɑɑ yɑ̃ku yeru min di, mɑ u ɡu kɔ̃ɔmɑ temɔ. Sɑnɑm mɛ sɔɔrɑ ɡuru ɡbɑ̃sukunu nɑ kɑ wurenu kɑ ɡuru mɑɑkinu kɑ mɑɑ tem yĩiribu.
Domi tem kpuron tɔmbu bɑ yen dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛn tɑm nɔrɑ. Hɑnduniɑn sinɑmbu bɑ kɑ ye kurɔ tɑnɔ kookoosu kuɑ, mɑ hɑnduniɑn tenkubɑ bɑ kuɑ ɡobiɡibu yen dɑɑ bɛrɛtɛkɛn kpɑ̃ɑrun sɔ̃.
Yenin sɑɑbuwɑ Yuu ɡɑbɑ mɑn mwɑ sɑ̃ɑ yerɔ bɑ kɑ swɑɑ kɑsu bu mɑn ɡo.
kpɑ bu ben swɑɑ sĩiyɑ sɑɑ ɡem di bu wurɑ ɡɑri yi tɔmbɑ sekɑ sɔɔ.
Kɑ mɛ, ɡɑbɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ be bɑ kun nɑɑnɛ doke. Domi Yesu u yɛ̃ sɑɑ yellun di be bɑ kun nùn nɑɑnɛ doke, kɑ wi u koo nùn dɔmɛ.
Yesu u nùn wisɑ u nɛɛ, wi nɑ kon dɔkɑ wɛ̃ ye nɑ kɑ kpee sɔ̃rɑ, wiyɑ mi. Mɑ u dɔkɑ kɑ kpee sɔ̃rɑ u Yudɑsi Isikɑriɔtu, Simɔɔn bii wɛ̃.
Timɔte, ɑ ye bɑ nun nɔmu sɔndiɑ nɛnuɔ n wɑ̃. A dɛsiro sɑɑ hɑnduniɑn ɡɑri kɑnkɑmɡiin di. A ku mɑɑ sikirinɑ kɑ be bɑ tɑmɑɑ bɑ yɛ̃ru mɔ.
Adɑmɑ Yuubɑ bɑ nisinu seewɑ mɑ bɑ tɔn bɛrɛtɛkɛbɑ mɛnnɑ wuu sɔɔ bɑ wuu kpuro burinɑ, mɑ be kpuro bɑ dɑ Yɑsonin yɛnuɔ bu wɑ bu Pɔlu kɑ Silɑsi yɑrɑmɑ tɔn wɔrun wuswɑɑɔ.

Goo ù n wɑ win beruse u torɑmɔ te tɑ kun sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔɔɡiru, u kɑnɑru koowo. Gusunɔ u koo bu wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ be bɑ torɑmɔ te tɑ kun sɑ̃ɑ ɡɔɔɡiru. Adɑmɑ torɑru ɡɑrɑ wɑ̃ɑ te tɑ rɑ ɡɔɔ mɑ. Nɑ ǹ ɡerumɔ ɡoo u kɑnɑru ko ten sɔ̃.
Kɑ ɡeemɑ nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, bɑɑwure wi u yɛ̃ro wurɑ wi nɑ ɡɔrɑ, nɛnɑ u wurɑ. Bɑɑwure wi u mɑɑ mɑn wurɑ, u wi u mɑn ɡɔrimɑ wurɑwɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, su Gusunɔ siɑrɑ domi sɑ bɑndu mɔ te tɑ ǹ yĩirurɔ kpɑ su nùn sɑ̃ nɡe mɛ u kĩ kɑ bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛbu kɑ nɑsiɑru.
Yuu be bɑ bɔsu bɑɑmɑ kpuro bɑ wɛrɛkunu yɑrɑmɔ, ben ɡɑbɑ mɑɑ kĩ bu Yinni Yesun yĩsiru soku be bɑ wɛrɛkunu mɔn sɔ̃ bu nɛɛ, nɑ nun woodɑ wɛ̃ɛmɔ kɑ Yesun yĩsiru, wi Pɔlu u kɑ wɑɑsu mɔ̀, ɑ yɑrio.
Pɔlu u Silɑsi ɡɔsɑ, mɑ nɑɑnɛ dokeobu bɑ bu kɑnɑru kuɑ bɑ nɛɛ, Gusunɔn durom mu n kɑ bu wɑ̃ɑ. Mɑ bɑ ben sɑnum wɔri.
I tii lɑɑkɑri koowo, kpɑ i ku bɛsɛn sɔmburun ɑre kɔ̃, i de i ten ɑrufɑɑni wɑ.
Bɑ dɑm mɔ bu kɑ wɔllu kɛnɛ, ɡurɑ yu ku kɑ nɛ sɑɑ ye bɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑri ɡerumɔ. Bɑ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ nim wɔllɔ bu kɑ mu ɡɔsiɑ yɛm. Bɑ mɑɑ kpɑm dɑm mɔ bu kɑ hɑnduniɑ bɑrɑ bwese bwesekɑ kpɛ̃ɛ nɡe mɛn nɔɔ bɑ kĩ.
A ǹ kpɛ̃ ɑ n nɔmɑ mɔ sɔmbu te sɔɔ, domi wunɛn ɡɔ̃ru ɡɑ ǹ dee dee sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔn wuswɑɑɔ.
Nɛɡibu kpuro bɑ sɑ̃ɑwɑ wunɛɡibu mɑ wunɛɡibu kpuro bɑ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɛɡibu, nɛn yiiko mɑɑ sɔ̃ɔsirɑ be sɔɔ.
Be kpurowɑ bɑ kɔ̃ɔre. Be kpurowɑ bɑ sɑnkire. Be kpurowɑ bɑ kɔ̃sɑ mɔ̀. Bɑɑ ben turo kun ɡeɑ mɔ̀.
I ku ɡɑ̃ɑnu ko kinɛnun sɔ̃, ǹ kun mɛ tii suɑbun sɔ̃, ɑdɑmɑ i tii kɑwo kpɑ i wurɑ mɑ ɡɑbɑ bɛɛ kere.
Mɑ nɑ ɡoo wɑ nɡe tɔnun bii u yɔ̃ dɑbu nin suunu sɔɔ. U yɑberu sebuɑ tɑ wɑ̃ɑ sere win nɑɑ kɔɔnɔ mɑ u kpɑki wurɑɡiɑ sɛ̃ke win ɡɑ̃ɑsɔ.
Bɔ̃ri ɡɛɛ kun ko n mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ wuu ɡe sɔɔ. Gusunɔ kɑ Yɑ̃ɑ kinɛ kpɛm ten sinɑ turɑrɑ tɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ mi, kpɑ win sɔm kowobu bu nùn sɑ̃.
Bɑɑyere kpuron kpeeru tɑ turuku kuɑ. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, i tii nɛnuɔ kɑ lɑɑkɑri, kpɑ i se i yɔ̃rɑ i kɑ kpĩ i kɑnɑru ko.
Min di, bɑ ɡoo nimkuu duɑ bu kɑ kpɑm wurɑ Antiɔsiɔ, Sirin wuu mi, mi bɑ rɑɑ bu Gusunɔ nɔmu sɔndiɑ u kɑ bu durom kɛ̃ sɔmbu ten sɔ̃ te bɑ kuɑ bɑ kpɑ.
Adɑmɑ ɑ̀ n kurɔ suɑ, ɑ ǹ tore. Wɔndiɑ ù n mɑɑ durɔ suɑ, u ǹ tore. Adɑmɑ be bɑ suɑnɑ, bɑ ko n nɔni swɑ̃ɑru mɔ ben wɑ̃ɑru sɔɔ. Nɑ ǹ mɑɑ kĩ n sɑ̃ɑ mɛ bɛɛn mi.
Domi n ǹ mɔ tɔmbɑ sɑ kɑ ɡɑbirinɑmɔ, mɑ n kun mɔ kɑ wɔllun wiruɡibu kɑ yiikoɡibu, kɑ yɑm wɔ̃kurun sinɑ bibu, kɑ mɑɑ wom dirum siini kɔ̃si.
Bwisi yì n bɛɛn ɡoo kɔmiɛ u Gusunɔ bikio, u koo nùn yi wɛ̃ domi Gusunɔ wiyɑ u yi tɔmbu kpuro wɛ̃ɛmɔ kɑ nuku tiɑ ɡerusibu sɑri.
I ku Hunde Dɛɛro yinɑri u sɔmburu ko bɛɛ sɔɔ.
Bɑ kuu bekuruɡiru ɡirɑ. Ten ɑdɛrɔwɑ bɑ sokɑ dii dɛɛrɑru. Miyɑ fitilɑ ɡɑ wɑ̃ɑ kɑ tɑbulu kɑ Yinni Gusunɔn pɛ̃ɛ.

Yen sɑɑbuwɑ nɑ nùn bwisi kɛ̃mɔ, u de u wurɑ dwe nɛn mi ye dɔ̃ɔ sɔnwɑ, kpɑ u kɑ ko dukiɑɡii. U mɑɑ kpɑm yɑ̃ɑ kpikinu dweo ni u koo kɑ win tereru bere kpɑ u kun mɑɑ sekuru mɔ̀. U kpɑm mɑɑ nɔnin tibu dweo u doke kpɑ u yɑm wɑ.
Nɑ bɛɛ yeni yoruɑwɑ bɛɛ be i Gusunɔn Biin yĩsiru nɑɑnɛ doke, kpɑ i n kɑ yɛ̃ mɑ i wɑ̃ɑru te tɑ ku rɑ kpe mɔ.
Goo wi u ɡɑri ɡerumɔ kɑ win tiin yiiko, u win tiin bɛɛrɛ kɑsuwɑ. Adɑmɑ wi u bɛɛrɛ kɑsu ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ wi u nùn ɡɔrimɑɡiɑ, siiwɑ ɡemɡii, tɑki sɑri wi sɔɔ.
Adɑmɑ bɛsɛ be sɑ hunden dukiɑ ye mɔ, sɑ ye mɔ bɛsɛn wɑsi sɔɔ yi yi sɑ̃ɑ nɡe tem mɔndu kpɑ dɑm bɑkɑm mɛ, mu n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ Gusunɔɡim, n ǹ mɔ bɛsɛn tiiɡim.
Kĩnɑsibu, i ku mɑɑ mɔru kɔsiɑ bɛɛn tii, ɑdɑmɑ i de Gusunɔ u bɛɛ mɔru kɔsiɑ, domi bɑ yoruɑ, Gusunɔ u nɛɛ, “Wiyɑ u koo bu mɔru kɔsie. Kpɑ u bu sɛɛyɑsiɑ.”
Yesu u nɛɛ, nɑ̀ n nɛn tii bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, nɛn bɛɛrɛ kun ɡɑ̃ɑnu sɑ̃ɑ. Nɛn Bɑɑbɑwɑ u mɑn bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, wi bɛɛ i sokumɔ bɛɛn Yinni.
A ku Gusunɔn sɔmburu kpeerɑsiɑ dĩɑnun sɔ̃. Geemɑ, kpuro n dɛɛre, ɑdɑmɑ n ǹ wɑ̃ tɔnu u ɡɑ̃ɑnu di ni nu koo de ɡoo u torɑ.
Durɔ be yiru bɑ Yesun ɡoru suɑ mɑ bɑ tu bekuru wukiri kɑ turɑre sɑnnu. Domi nɡe mɛyɑ Yuubɑ bɑ rɑ kɑ ben ɡoru sike.
Geemɑ, i kɑ pirisɔmbɑ nɔni swɑ̃ɑru bɔnu kuɑ. Ye bɑ mɑɑ bɛɛ bɛɛn dukiɑ wɔrɑri, i wurɑ kɑ nuku dobu, domi i yɛ̃ mɑ i dukiɑ mɔ ye yɑ bɛɛrɛ bo ye yɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ.
Dɑfidi win bweserun diyɑ, Yesu u yɑrɑ wi Gusunɔ u kuɑ Isirelibɑn Fɑɑbɑ kowo nɡe mɛ u nɔɔ mwɛɛru kuɑ.
Adɑmɑ nɡe mɛ bɑ yoruɑ, “Ye nɔni kun wɑɑre, ye swɑɑ kun nɔɔre, ye yɑ ǹ mɑɑ duure tɔnun ɡɔ̃ru sɔɔ, yeyɑ Gusunɔ u bu sɔɔru kuɑ be bɑ nùn kĩ.”
Gusunɔ wi u Yesu seeyɑ ɡɔrin di, win Hundewɑ wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ wi u Yesu Kirisi seeyɑ ɡɔrin di u koo mɑɑ bɛɛn wɑsi ɡɔɔɡii wɑ̃ɑru wɛ̃ sɑɑ win Hunden min di, wi u wɑ̃ɑ bɛɛ sɔɔ.
Gusunɔn Hunden tii u bɛsɛn hunde sɔ̃ɔmɔ mɑ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ win bibu.
I ku tii torɑsiɑ. Bɑ ku rɑ Gusunɔ yɑɑkoru ko. Domi ye tɔnu u duurumɔ, yeyɑ u koo ɡɛ̃.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, ɑ Gusunɔn tɔn ɡeeru kɑ mɑɑ win sɛ̃sɔ mɛɛrio. U sɛ̃ kɑ be bɑ wɔrumɑ, ɑdɑmɑ u sɑ̃ɑ tɔn ɡeo wunɛn mi, ɑ̀ n ɡesi yɔ̃ dim dim win tɔn ɡeeru sɔɔ. Mɑ n kun mɛ, bɑ koo mɑɑ wunɛn tii burɑ.
Yen sɔ̃, nɛɡibu, i tɛmɑnɔ sere Yinni u kɑ wurɑmɑ. I mɛɛrio nɡe mɛ ɡbee wuko rɑ n suuru sɑ̃ɑ u n kɑ tem mɑrɑ mu nùn dĩɑ ɡeenu mɑruɑ. U rɑ n ɡuri ɡbiikii kɑ dɑ̃ɑki mɑrɑ.
Kpɑ Yinni u Onɛsifun yɛnuɡibu wɔnwɔndu kuɑ domi u mɑn dɑm kɑ̃ nɔn dɑbinu. U ǹ mɑɑ nɛn pirisɔm sekuru kue.
Tɛ̃ nɛn bibu, i n mɑninɛ kɑ wi, kpɑ sɑ n kɑ wɔruɡɔru mɔ sɑnɑm mɛ u koo kurɑmɑ, kpɑ su ku tii bere sekurun sɔ̃ tɔ̃ɔ te u koo nɑ.
Ye nɑ ɡerumɔ wee, i de Gusunɔn Hunde u bɛɛ kpɑrɑ. Ǹ n koorɑ mɛ, i ǹ ko mɑɑ bɛɛn tii tiin kĩru kɑnkɑm ko.
Gɑri nɑɑnɛɡii yi yi weenɛ i nɔmɑ ɡɑ̃ri i mwɑ mɑm mɑm yiyɑ, Yesu Kirisi u nɑ hɑnduniɑ sɔɔ u kɑ durumɡibu fɑɑbɑ ko bè sɔɔ nɑ sɑ̃ɑ ben kpoko.
Ye yɑ tie nɑ kĩ n bɛɛ sɔ̃ wee. Bɛɛ kɑ Yinnin ɡbinnɑɑ sɔɔ i de win dɑm bɑkɑm mu bɛɛ dɑm kɛ̃.
Yen sɔ̃, wi u tɑmɑɑ u yɔ̃ sim sim, u de u n tii sɛ kpɑ u ku rɑɑ wɔrumɛ.
Domi kɑ ɑbɔ teerɑ u bu dɛɛrɑsiɑ mɑm mɑm sere kɑ bɑɑdommɑɔ be Gusunɔ u kuɑ wiɡibu.
Mɑ Yuubɑ bɑ kpɑm kpenu dɔburɑ bu kɑ nùn kɑsuku.
Adɑmɑ nɑ kĩ i n yɛ̃ mɑ Kirisiwɑ tɔn durɔ bɑɑwuren wiruɡii, tɔn durɔ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔn kurɔ bɑɑwuren wiruɡii, Gusunɔwɑ mɑɑ Kirisin wiruɡii.
Bɑ mɑɑ kpɑm ɡɑbu yɑɑkoru kuɑ, bɑ bu sɛni so. Bɑ ɡɑbu bɔkuɑ kɑ yɔni bɑ doke pirisɔm sɔɔ.
Yĩiyɔ bi, bu bɛsɛn ɡɔ̃ru nɛni sim sim nɡe ɡoo nimkuun mɑrutiɑ ɡu ku kɑ kɔ̃ɔrɑ. Bu dɑm mɔ, bu ǹ sikɑ mɔ, mɑ bu duɑ sere Gusunɔn wɑ̃ɑ yerun suunu sɔɔ.
I ku tii kpɛ̃ɛ kookoo kɑmɡisu sɔɔ si tɔmbɑ mɔ̀ yɑm wɔ̃kuru sɔɔ. Adɑmɑ i su terɑsio yɑm bururɑm sɔɔ.

Nɛɡibu, i ku kɔ̃sɑ mɑninɑ. Wi u win winsim kɔ̃sɑ ɡerumɔ, ǹ kun mɛ wi u nùn sirimɔ, woodɑn kɔ̃sɑ u ɡerumɔ mɑ u ye sirimɔ. Wee, ɑ̀ n woodɑ sirimɔ, ɑ ǹ mɑɑ sɑ̃ɑ wi u rɑ ye mɛm nɔɔwɛ mɑ n kun mɔ wi u ye sirimɔ.
Mɑ bɑ ɡɑmbobɑ wɔkurɑ yiru kuɑ kɑ kpee kpiki ɡobi bɛkɛɡinu wɔkurɑ yiru. Bɑ ɡɑmbo bɑɑyere kuɑ kɑ kpee kpiki nin teeru. Mɑ bɑ wuu ɡen swɑɑ kuɑ kɑ wurɑn tii tii ye yɑ sɑ̃ɑ nɡe diki kpikɑ.
Adɑmɑ Kirisi u sɑ̃ɑ Bii nɑɑnɛɡii wi Gusunɔ u kuɑ win yɛnu yɛ̃ro. Bɛsɛrɑ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ win yɛnuɡibu sɑ̀ n yĩiyɔbu mɔ sere kɑ nɔrɔ kɑ toro sindu kɑ nɑɑnɛ. wɛ̃ɛmɔ
I ku de bɛɛn kĩru tɑ n murɑfitiru mɔ. I kɔ̃sɑ dɛsirɑrio, kpɑ i ɡeɑ mɑni dim dim.

Mii mii mɑ tem yĩirɑ ɡem ɡem, mɑ wuu ɡen bɔnu wɔkuruse yɑ wɔrumɑ. Tɔn be bɑ ɡu tem yĩiru bi sɔɔ, ben ɡeerɑ sɑ̃ɑ tɔnu nɔrɔbun subɑ nɔɔbɑ yiru (7.000). Tɔn be bɑ tie, mɑ bɑ nɑndɑ ɡem ɡem, mɑ bɑ Wɔrukoo bɛɛrɛ wɛ̃.
Adɑmɑ tɔn turo ù n ɡɑ̃ɑnu mɔ̀ u ǹ sɔmɔ ɡoon bukɑtɑ mɔ. Wee Gusunɔ turowɑ u nɔɔ mwɛɛ te kuɑ.
Mɑ Pilɑti u nùn bikiɑ u nɛɛ, nɛnɑ ɑ ǹ kɑ sere ɡɑri mɔ̀? A ǹ yɛ̃ mɑ nɑ dɑm mɔ n kɑ nun kɑrɑ, nɑ mɑɑ dɑm mɔ n kɑ nun kpɑre dɑ̃ɑ bunɑnɑru sɔɔ?
Ye wee ye durɔ wi, u ɡɑrimɔ sɑɑ Gusunɔn ɡɑrin di. “Bɑ kɑ nùn dɑ nɡe yɑ̃ɑ te bɑ koo sɑkɑ. Nɡe yɑ̃ɑ buu ɡe ɡɑ mɑɑri sɛ̃ɛ sɑnɑm mɛ bɑ ɡen sɑnsu burɑmɔ, nɡe mɛyɑ u ǹ win nɔɔ bɑɑye.
Yerɑ bɑ sunɔ bikiɑ mɑ Gusunɔ u bu Sɔɔlu Kisin bii wɛ̃, sɑɑ Bɛnyɑmɛɛn bweserun di, mɑ u bɑndu di wɔ̃ɔ weeru.
Domi tɔn bɛrɛtɛkɛ dɑbinu wɑ̃ɑ kɑ wiirɑ ɡɑri ɡerobu kɑ be bɑ tɔmbu nɔni wɔ̃kumɔ, n kun mɑm ko Yuubɑ.
Te sɔɔ, yɛɛ bwese bwesekɑwɑ wɑ̃ɑ mi, yi yi nɑɑsu nnɛ mɔ kɑ yi yi kɑbirimɔ kɑ ɡunɔsu.
Yiiko ye ɑ mɑn wɛ̃, yeyɑ nɑ mɑɑ bu wɛ̃, kpɑ bɑ n kɑ sɑ̃ɑ tiɑ nɡe mɛ nɛ kɑ wunɛ sɑ sɑ̃ɑ tiɑ.
A nɛn sɔ̃ɔsiru nɛnuɔ kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu Yesu Kirisi sɔɔ kɑ kĩi te ɑ mɔ win min di. Sɔ̃ɔsi te, tɑ sɑ̃ɑ ɡɑri ɡee yi nɑ nun nɔɔsiɑ.
N deemɑ boosu nɔɔbɑ tiɑ su wɑ̃ɑ mi, mì sɔɔ Yuubɑ bɑ rɑ nim doke wɑsin sɑ̃rɑsiɑbun sɔ̃. Gen bɑɑɡere ɡɑ koo ditiri wunɔbun (100) sɑkɑ mwɑ.
I de bɛɛn lɑɑkɑri ɡeɑ yu wurɑmɑ nɡe mɛ n weenɛ, kpɑ i kookoo kɔ̃susu deri. Bɛɛn ɡɑbu bɑ ǹ Gusunɔ yɛ̃. Nɑ yeni ɡerumɔ mɑ bɛɛn sekurɑ.
I de i n sĩimɔ kɑ tii kɑwɑbu, kɑ dɑɑ duudwiɑ, kɑ suuru, kpɑ i n kĩru sɔ̃ɔsinɑmɔ kɑ tɛmɑnɑbu.
I n ɡɑbu ɡɑwɑmɔ dɔ̃ɔ sɔɔn di i n bu fɑɑbɑ mɔ̀. I mɑɑ ɡɑbun wɔnwɔndu wɑɑwo tɑ n kɑ bɛrum mɛnnɛ, ɑdɑmɑ i n ben torɑnu tusɑ sere kɑ ben yɑbenɔ ni ben dɑɑ yɑ disinu tɛɛni.
Domi sɑ yɛ̃ mɑ bɑɑyere kpuro sɔɔ ye yɑ rɑ tɔnu deemɛ, Gusunɔ u sɔmburu mɔ̀ u kɑ bu ɡeɑ kuɑ be u sokɑ win himbɑ sɔɔ, mɑ bɑ nùn kĩ.
Ǹ n bɛɛn sɔ̃n nɑ, tɔmbu kpuro bɑ bɛɛn mɛm nɔɔbu yɛ̃ kɔ. Yen sɔ̃nɑ nɛn nukurɑ do kɑ bɛɛ. Adɑmɑ nɑ kĩ i n sɑ̃ɑ bwisiɡibu ɡeɑn kobu sɔɔ, kpɑ i n sɑ̃ɑ be bɑ kun kɔ̃sɑn kobu yɛ̃.

Miyɑ kpɑkororɑ wɑ̃ɑ te bɑ wurɑ pote tèn wɔllɔ bɑ rɑ turɑre dɔ̃ɔ doke. Miyɑ mɑɑ woodɑn kpɑkororɑ wɑ̃ɑ te bɑ mɑɑ wurɑ pote. Kpɑkoro te sɔɔ, weke wurɑɡirɑ wɑ̃ɑ, mi bɑ mɑnnɑ doke kɑ Aronin dɛkɑ ye yɑ kpɑrɑ kɑ kpee bɛsi mi bɑ woodɑn ɡɑri yorusi.
Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, mbɑ tɔnu u koo kɑ woo kɑnɑ. Sɑri. Mbɑn sɔ̃nɑ. Woodɑn mɛm nɔɔbun sɔ̃? Aɑwo. Nɑɑnɛ dokebun sɔ̃nɑ.
A ǹ nɑɑnɛ doke mɑ nɑ wɑ̃ɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɔɔ, Bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ wɑ̃ɑ nɛ sɔ̃ɔ? Gɑri yi nɑ bɛɛ sɔ̃ɔmɔ, nɑ ǹ ɡerumɔ kɑ nɛn tiin yiiko. Bɑɑbɑ wi u wɑ̃ɑ nɛ sɔɔ, wiyɑ u win sɔmburu mɔ̀.
Mɑ tɔn wɔru ɡɑ bu mɔru seesi, mɑ wiruɡibu bɑ Pɔlu kɑ Silɑsin yɑbenu kɑsukɑ, mɑ bɑ woodɑ wɛ̃ bu be dɑ̃ɑ so.
Woodɑ kpɑɑ nɑ bɛɛ wɛ̃ɛmɔ, i kĩɑnɔ. I de i kĩru sɔ̃ɔsinɑ nɡe mɛ nɑ bɛɛ kĩru sɔ̃ɔsi.
Sɑ yɛ̃ kɑ ɡem mɑ bɛsɛn kuru te tɑ sɑ̃ɑ bɛsɛn wɑ̃ɑ yeru tem mɛ sɔɔ, tɑ̀ n wɔrumɑ, Gusunɔ u sun wɑ̃ɑ yeru yiiye wɔllɔ te win tii u kuɑ, te tɑ ko n wɑ̃ɑ kɑ bɑɑdommɑ. Bɑ ǹ tu kue kɑ nɔmɑ.
Mɑ Yesu u ɡbɑ̃rɑ u nɛɛ, bɑɑwure wi u mɑn nɑɑnɛ doke, n ǹ mɔ nɛnɑ u nɑɑnɛ doke, wi u mɑn ɡɔrimɑwɑ u nɑɑnɛ doke.
Anɑniɑ u nɛɛ, Yinni tɔn dɑbinɑ nu mɑn durɔ win lɑbɑɑri sɔ̃ɔwɑ, kɑ kɔ̃sɑ kpuro ye u wunɛn tɔmbu kuɑ Yerusɑlɛmuɔ.

Tɔmbu bɑ ko n ben tii tɔnɑn ɑrufɑɑni kɑsu, ɡobin kĩrɑ ko n bu nɛni, bɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ woo kɑnɔbu kɑ tii suobu kpɑ bɑ n Gusunɔ ɡɑri kɑm ɡerusimɔ. Bibu bɑ ǹ koo ben mɔwɔbu mɛm nɔɔwɑ, tɔmbɑ ko n sɑ̃ɑ ɡuturubɑ kɑ Gusunɔn bɛɛrɛ yɛ̃ru sɑriruɡibu.
Tɛ̃, win yɛm sɔ̃nɑ sɑ kuɑ ɡemɡibu. Ǹ n mɛn nɑ, sikɑ sɑri u koo mɑɑ sun fɑɑbɑ ko Gusunɔn mɔrun di.
Nɑ yɛ̃ kɑm kɑm sɑɑ Yinni Yesun min di mɑ ɡɑ̃ɑnu sɑri ni nu kun dɛɛre nin tii, ɑdɑmɑ ɡoo ù n ɡɑ̃ɑnu ɡɑrisi nɡe ni nu kun dɛɛre, yɛ̃ro sɔɔrɑ nu ǹ dɛɛre.
Wee, ɑ̀ n nɑɑnɛ dokeobu bwisi yini kɛ̃mɔ kɑɑ n sɑ̃ɑwɑ Yesu Kirisin sɔm kowo ɡeo, kɑɑ n mɑɑ wunɛn tiin hunde diisiɑmɔ kɑ nɑɑnɛ dokebu kɑ sɔ̃ɔsi ɡeerun ɡɑri yi ɑ swĩi.
